atk-s0508a12:3_0: Dukanipāte natthi koci bhavo niccotiādikā āyasmato uttarattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti?
atk-s0508a12:3_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ puññaṁ upacinanto
atk-s0508a12:3_2: sumedhassa bhagavato kāle vijjādharo hutvā ākāsena vicarati. Tena ca samayena satthā
atk-s0508a12:3_3: tassa anuggaṇhanatthaṁ vanantare aññatarasmiṁ rukkhamūle nisīdi chabbaṇṇabuddharaṁsiyo
atk-s0508a12:3_4: vissajjento. So antalikkhena gacchanto bhagavantaṁ disvā pasannacitto ākāsato oruyha
atk-s0508a12:3_5: suvisuddhehi vipulehi kaṇikārapupphehi bhagavantaṁ pūjesi, pupphāni buddhānubhāvena
atk-s0508a12:3_6: satthu upari chattākārena aṭṭhaṁsu, so tena bhiyyosomattāya pasannacitto hutvā aparabhāge
atk-s0508a12:3_7: kālaṁ katvā tāvatiṁse nibbattitvā uḷāraṁ dibbasampattiṁ anubhavanto yāvatāyukaṁ tattha
atk-s0508a12:3_8: ṭhatvā tato cuto devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇamahāsālaputto
atk-s0508a12:3_9: hutvā nibbatti, uttarotissa nāmaṁ ahosi. So viññutaṁ patto brāhmaṇavijjāsu nipphattiṁ
atk-s0508a12:3_10: gantvā jātiyā rūpena vijjāya vayena sīlācārena ca lokassa sambhāvanīyo jāto. Tassa
atk-s0508a12:3_11: taṁ sampattiṁ disvā vassakāro magadhamahāmatto attano dhītaraṁ dātukāmo hutvā attano
atk-s0508a12:3_12: adhippāyaṁ pavedesi. So nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya taṁ paṭikkhipitvā kālena kālaṁ dhammasenāpatiṁ
atk-s0508a12:3_13: payirupāsanto tassa santike dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vattasampanno
atk-s0508a12:4_0: Tena ca samayena therassa aññataro ābādho uppanno, tassa bhesajjatthāya uttaro sāmaṇero
atk-s0508a12:4_1: pātova pattacīvaramādāya vihārato nikkhanto antarāmagge taḷākassa tīre pattaṁ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0508a12:4_2: udakasamīpaṁ gantvā mukhaṁ dhovati. Atha aññataro umaṅgacoro ārakkhapurisehi anubaddho
atk-s0508a12:4_3: aggadvāreneva nagarato nikkhamitvā palāyanto attanā gahitaṁ ratanabhaṇḍikaṁ sāmaṇerassa
atk-s0508a12:4_4: patte pakkhipitvā palāyi. Sāmaṇero pattasamīpaṁ upagato. Coraṁ anubandhantā rājapurisā
atk-s0508a12:4_5: sāmaṇerassa patte bhaṇḍikaṁ disvā, ‘‘ayaṁ coro, iminā coriyaṁ kata’’nti sāmaṇeraṁ
atk-s0508a12:4_6: pacchābāhaṁ bandhitvā vassakārassa brāhmaṇassa dassesuṁ. Vassakāro ca tadā rañño
atk-s0508a12:4_7: vinicchaye niyutto hutvā chejjabhejjaṁ anusāsati. So ‘‘pubbe mama vacanaṁ nādiyi,
atk-s0508a12:4_8: suddhapāsaṇḍiyesu pabbajī’’ti ca baddhāghātattā kammaṁ asodhetvāva jīvantameva taṁ sūle uttāsesi.
atk-s0508a12:5_0: Athassa bhagavā ñāṇaparipākaṁ oloketvā taṁ ṭhānaṁ gantvā vipphurantahatthanakhamaṇimayūkhasambhinnasitābhatāya
atk-s0508a12:5_2: uttarassa sīse ṭhapetvā, ‘‘uttara, idaṁ te purimakammassa phalaṁ uppannaṁ, tattha
atk-s0508a12:5_3: tayā paccavekkhaṇabalena adhivāsanā kātabbā’’ti vatvā ajjhāsayānurūpaṁ dhammaṁ desesi.
atk-s0508a12:5_5: uḷāraṁ pītipāmojjaṁ paṭilabhitvā yathāparicitaṁ vipassanāmaggaṁ samārūḷho ñāṇassa
atk-s0508a12:5_6: paripākaṁ gatattā satthu ca desanāvilāsena tāvadeva maggapaṭipāṭiyā sabbakilese khepetvā
atk-s0508a12:5_7: chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 2.56.55-92) –
atk-s0508a12:11: Tisūlaṁ sugataṁ gayha, gacchāmi ambare tadā.
atk-s0508a12:38: ‘‘Tattha bhutvā pivitvā ca, modāmi tidase tadā;
atk-s0508a12:44: Bhoge me ūnatā natthi, buddhapūjāyidaṁ phalaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:46: Aññaṁ gatiṁ na jānāmi, buddhapūjāyidaṁ phalaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:48: Nīce kule na jānāmi, buddhapūjāyidaṁ phalaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:57: ‘‘Imaṁ khāda imaṁ bhuñja, imamhi sayane saya;
atk-s0508a12:62: ‘‘Sītaṁ uṇhaṁ na jānāmi, pariḷāho na vijjati;
atk-s0508a12:63: Atho cetasikaṁ dukkhaṁ, hadaye me na vijjati.
atk-s0508a12:79_0: Chaḷabhiñño puna hutvā sūlato uṭṭhahitvā parānuddayāya ākāse ṭhatvā pāṭihāriyaṁ dassesi.
atk-s0508a12:79_1: Mahājano acchariyabbhutacittajāto ahosi. Tāvadevassa vaṇo saṁrūḷhi, so bhikkhūhi,
atk-s0508a12:79_2: ‘‘āvuso, tādisaṁ dukkhaṁ anubhavanto kathaṁ tvaṁ vipassanaṁ anuyuñjituṁ asakkhī’’ti
atk-s0508a12:79_3: puṭṭho, ‘‘pageva me, āvuso, saṁsāre ādīnavo, saṅkhārānañca sabhāvo sudiṭṭho, evāhaṁ
atk-s0508a12:79_4: tādisaṁ dukkhaṁ anubhavantopi asakkhiṁ vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā visesaṁ adhigantu’’nti dassento –
atk-s0508a12:81: ‘‘Natthi koci bhavo nicco, saṅkhārā vāpi sassatā;
atk-s0508a12:82: Uppajjanti ca te khandhā, cavanti aparāparaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:87_0: Tattha natthi koci bhavo niccoti kammabhavo upapattibhavo kāmabhavo rūpabhavo arūpabhavo
atk-s0508a12:87_1: saññībhavo asaññībhavo nevasaññīnāsaññībhavo ekavokārabhavo catuvokārabhavo pañcavokārabhavoti
atk-s0508a12:87_2: evaṁbhedo, tatthāpi hīno majjhimo ukkaṭṭho dīghāyuko sukhabahulo vomissasukhadukkhoti
atk-s0508a12:87_3: evaṁvibhāgo yokoci nicco dhuvo thiro apalokiyadhammo natthi taṁ taṁ kāraṇaṁ paṭicca
atk-s0508a12:87_4: samuppannattā. Yasmā ca etadevaṁ, tasmā saṅkhārā vāpi sassatā natthīti yojanā. Paccayehi
atk-s0508a12:87_5: saṅkhatattā ‘‘saṅkhārā’’ti laddhanāme hi pañcakkhandhe upādāya bhavasamaññāya saṅkhārāva
atk-s0508a12:87_6: hutvā sambhūtā jarāmaraṇena ca vipariṇamantīti asassatā vipariṇāmadhammā. Tathā hi
atk-s0508a12:87_7: te ‘‘saṅkhārā’’ti vuccanti. Tenāha uppajjanti ca te khandhā, cavanti aparāparanti.
atk-s0508a12:87_8: Te bhavapariyāyena saṅkhārapariyāyena ca vuttā pañcakkhandhā yathāpaccayaṁ aparāparaṁ
atk-s0508a12:87_9: uppajjanti, uppannā ca jarāya paripīḷitā hutvā cavanti paribhijjantīti attho. Etena
atk-s0508a12:87_10: ‘‘bhavo, saṅkhārā’’ti ca laddhavohārā pañcakkhandhā udayabbayasabhāvāti dasseti.
atk-s0508a12:87_11: Yasmā tilakkhaṇaṁ āropetvā saṅkhāre sammasantassa tayopi bhavā ādittaṁ viya saṅkhate
atk-s0508a12:87_12: ādīnavaṁ dosaṁ pageva vipassanāpaññāya jānitvā aniccalakkhaṇehi diṭṭhā saṅkhārā dukkhānattā
atk-s0508a12:87_13: vibhūtatarā upaṭṭhahanti, tenāha bhagavā – ‘‘yadaniccaṁ taṁ dukkhaṁ, yaṁ dukkhaṁ
atk-s0508a12:88_0: Yasmā tilakkhaṇaṁ āropetvā saṅkhāre sammasantassa tayopi bhavā ādittaṁ viya agāraṁ
atk-s0508a12:88_1: sappaṭibhayā upaṭṭhahanti, tasmā āha ‘‘bhavenamhi anatthiko’’ti. Evaṁ pana sabbaso
atk-s0508a12:88_2: bhavehi vinivattiyamānassa kāmesu apekkhāya lesopi na sambhavatiyeva, tenāha ‘‘nissaṭo
atk-s0508a12:88_3: sabbakāmehī’’ti, amhīti yojanā. Mānusehi viya dibbehipi kāmehi nivattitacittosmīti
atk-s0508a12:88_4: attho. Patto me āsavakkhayoti yasmā evaṁ suparimajjitasaṅkhāro bhavesu suparidiṭṭhādīnavo
atk-s0508a12:88_5: kāmesu ca anāsattamānaso tasmā sūlamatthake nisinnenāpi me mayā patto adhigato āsavakkhayo
atk-s0508a12:88_6: nibbānaṁ arahattañcāti. Aññehi ca sabrahmacārīhi appattamānasehi tadadhigamāya ussāho
atk-s0508a12:91_0: Nayidaṁanayenātiādikā āyasmato piṇḍolabhāradvājattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṁ
atk-s0508a12:91_1: kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle sīhayoniyaṁ nibbattitvā pabbataguhāyaṁ viharati.
atk-s0508a12:91_2: Bhagavā tassa anuggahaṁ kātuṁ gocarāya pakkantakāle sayanaguhaṁ pavisitvā nirodhaṁ
atk-s0508a12:91_3: samāpajjitvā nisīdi. Sīho gocaraṁ gahetvā nivatto guhādvāre bhagavantaṁ disvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho
atk-s0508a12:91_4: jalajathalajapupphehi pūjaṁ katvā cittaṁ pasādento bhagavato ārakkhatthāya araññe
atk-s0508a12:91_5: vāḷamige apanetuṁ tīsu velāsu sīhanādaṁ nadanto buddhagatāya satiyā aṭṭhāsi. Yathā
atk-s0508a12:91_6: paṭhamadivasaṁ, evaṁ sattāhaṁ pūjesi. Bhagavā sattāhaccayena nirodhā vuṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0508a12:91_7: ‘‘vattissati imassa ettako upanissayo’’ti tassa passantasseva ākāsaṁ pakkhanditvā
atk-s0508a12:91_8: vihārameva gato. Sīho pālileyyakahatthī viya buddhaviyogadukkhaṁ adhivāsetuṁ asakkonto
atk-s0508a12:91_9: kālaṁ katvā haṁsavatīnagare mahābhogakule nibbattitvā vayappatto nagaravāsīhi saddhiṁ
atk-s0508a12:91_10: vihāraṁ gato dhammadesanaṁ sutvā sattāhaṁ mahādānaṁ pavattetvā yāvajīvaṁ puññāni
atk-s0508a12:91_11: katvā aparāparaṁ devamanussesu saṁsaranto amhākaṁ bhagavato kāle kosambiyaṁ rañño
atk-s0508a12:91_12: utenassa purohitaputto hutvā nibbatti bhāradvājo nāma nāmena. So vayappatto tayo
atk-s0508a12:91_13: vede uggahetvā pañca māṇavakasatāni mante vācento mahagghasabhāvena ananurūpācārattā
atk-s0508a12:91_14: tehi pariccajjanto rājagahaṁ gantvā bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca lābhasakkāraṁ disvā
atk-s0508a12:91_15: sāsane pabbajitvā bhojane amattaññū hutvā vicaranto satthārā upāyena mattaññutāya
atk-s0508a12:91_16: patiṭṭhāpito vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne
atk-s0508a12:96: ‘‘Ekatiṁse ito kappe, yaṁ phalaṁ adadiṁ tadā;
atk-s0508a12:99_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā ‘‘bhagavato sammukhā yaṁ sāvakehi pattabbaṁ, taṁ mayā patta’’nti,
atk-s0508a12:99_1: bhikkhusaṅghe ca ‘‘yassa magge vā phale vā kaṅkhā atthi, so maṁ pucchatū’’ti sīhanādaṁ
atk-s0508a12:99_2: nadi. Tena taṁ bhagavā, ‘‘etadaggaṁ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ sīhanādikānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:99_3: yadidaṁ piṇḍolabhāradvājo’’ti (a. ni. 1.188, 195) etadagge ṭhapesi. So ekadivasaṁ
atk-s0508a12:99_4: attano santikaṁ upagataṁ gihikāle sahāyabhūtaṁ macchariṁ micchādiṭṭhibrāhmaṇaṁ anukampamāno
atk-s0508a12:99_5: tassa dānakathaṁ kathetvā tena ca ‘‘ayaṁ mama dhanaṁ vināsetukāmo’’ti bhakuṭiṁ katvāpi
atk-s0508a12:99_6: ‘‘tuyhaṁ ekabhattaṁ demī’’ti vutte, ‘‘taṁ saṅghassa dehi mā mayha’’nti saṅghassa
atk-s0508a12:99_7: pariṇāmesi. Puna brāhmaṇena ‘‘ayaṁ maṁ bahūnaṁ dāpetukāmo’’ti appaccaye pakāsite
atk-s0508a12:99_9: taṁ pasādetvā, ‘‘ayaṁ brāhmaṇo ‘āhāragedhena maṁ dāne nīyojesī’ti maññati, āhārassa
atk-s0508a12:99_10: pana mayā sabbaso pariññātabhāvaṁ na jānāti, handa naṁ jānāpemī’’ti –
atk-s0508a12:102: Āhāraṭṭhitiko samussayo, iti disvāna carāmi esanaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:104: ‘‘Paṅkoti hi naṁ avedayuṁ, yāyaṁ vandanapūjanā kulesu;
atk-s0508a12:105: Sukhumaṁ sallaṁ durubbahaṁ, sakkāro kāpurisena dujjaho’’ti. –
atk-s0508a12:107_0: Tattha nayidaṁ anayena jīvitanti idaṁ mama jīvitaṁ anayena añāyena veḷudānapupphadānādianesanāya
atk-s0508a12:107_1: na hoti jīvitanikantiyā abhāvato. Nāhāro hadayassa santikoti āhāro ca āhariyamāno
atk-s0508a12:107_2: maggaphalañāṇaṁ viya hadayassa cittassa santikaro na hoti, kevalaṁ pana sajjukaṁ
atk-s0508a12:107_3: khudāpaṭighātamattaṁ karotīti adhippāyo. Atha vā nāhāro hadayassa santikoti āhāro
atk-s0508a12:107_4: rasataṇhāvatthu me hadayassa santiko āsatto na hoti rasataṇhāya eva abhāvato. ‘‘Santike’’tipi
atk-s0508a12:107_5: paṭhanti. Yo hi āhāragiddho lābhasakkārappasuto vicarati, tassa āhāro hadayassa santike
atk-s0508a12:107_6: nāma abhiṇhaṁ manasikātabbato. Yo pana pariññātāhāro, so tattha pahīnacchandarāgo,
atk-s0508a12:107_7: na tassāhāro hadayassa santike nāma – ‘‘kathaṁ nu kho labheyya’’ntiādimanasikaraṇasseva
atk-s0508a12:107_8: abhāvato. Yadi hi jīvitanikanti āhārarasataṇhā ca natthi, atha kasmā piṇḍāya carasīti
atk-s0508a12:107_9: anuyogaṁ manasi katvā āha ‘‘āhāraṭṭhitiko samussayo, iti disvāna carāmi esana’’nti.
atk-s0508a12:107_10: Āhāro bhojanaṁ ṭhiti ṭhānaṁ paccayo etassāti āhāraṭṭhitiko. ‘‘Āhārapaṭibaddhavuttiko
atk-s0508a12:107_11: samussayo kāyo’’iti disvāna evaṁ ñatvā imamatthaṁ buddhiyaṁ ṭhapetvā carāmi esanaṁ,
atk-s0508a12:108_0: Paccayanimittaṁ kulāni upasaṅkamanto tattha vandanapūjanāhi lābhasakkārehi ca bajjhatīti
atk-s0508a12:108_1: evaṁ mādisesu na cintetabbanti dassento ‘‘paṅko’’tigāthaṁ abhāsi. Tassattho – yā
atk-s0508a12:108_2: ayaṁ paccayanimittaṁ upagatānaṁ pabbajitānaṁ kulesu gehavāsīsu pavattissati guṇasambhāvanā
atk-s0508a12:108_3: pūjanā ca, yasmā taṁ abhāvitattānaṁ osīdāpanaṭṭhena malīnabhāvakaraṇena ca paṅko
atk-s0508a12:108_4: kaddamoti buddhādayo avedayuṁ abbhaññāsuṁ pavedesuṁ vā, tasmā sā sappurisānaṁ bandhāya
atk-s0508a12:108_5: na hoti sakkārāsāya pageva pahīnattā. Asappurisassa pana sakkārāsā duviññeyyasabhāvatāya
atk-s0508a12:108_6: pīḷājananato anto tudanato uddharituṁ asakkuṇeyyato ca sukhumaṁ sallaṁ durubbahaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:108_7: Tato eva tena sakkāro kāpurisena dujjaho durubbaheyyo tassa pahānapaṭipattiyā appaṭipajjanato,
atk-s0508a12:108_8: sakkārāsāpahānena pahīno hotīti. Taṁ sutvā brāhmaṇo there abhippasanno ahosi.
atk-s0508a12:111_0: Makkaṭo pañcadvārāyantiādikā āyasmato valliyattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a12:111_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito ekatiṁse kappe
atk-s0508a12:111_2: kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ kenacideva karaṇīyena araññaṁ gato
atk-s0508a12:111_3: tattha nāradaṁ nāma paccekasambuddhaṁ rukkhamūle vasantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso naḷehi
atk-s0508a12:111_4: sālaṁ katvā tiṇehi chādetvā adāsi. Caṅkamanaṭṭhānañcassa sodhetvā vālukā okiritvā
atk-s0508a12:111_5: adāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṁ
atk-s0508a12:111_6: brāhmaṇamahāsālassa putto hutvā nibbatti, valliyotissa nāmaṁ ahosi. So vayappatto
atk-s0508a12:111_7: yobbanamanuppatto indriyavasiko hutvā vicaranto kalyāṇamittasaṁsaggena bhagavantaṁ
atk-s0508a12:111_8: upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva
atk-s0508a12:111_9: arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 2.50.93-103) –
atk-s0508a12:113: Sayambhū nārado nāma, rukkhamūle vasī tadā.
atk-s0508a12:129: Arahattaṁ pana patvā puthujjanakāle attano cittassa rūpādiārammaṇesu yathākāmappavattiyā, idāni ariyamaggena niggahitabhāvassa ca vibhāvanena aññaṁ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a12:134: ‘‘Tiṭṭha makkaṭa mā dhāvi, na hi te taṁ yathā pure;
atk-s0508a12:135: Niggahītosi paññāya, neva dūraṁ gamissasī’’ti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:136_0: Tattha ghaṭṭayantoti attano lolabhāvena rukkhassa aññaṁ sākhaṁ muñcitvā aññassa gahaṇena
atk-s0508a12:136_1: anekavāraṁ tattha rukkhaṁ cālento phalūpabhogamakkaṭo viya tena tena cakkhādidvārena
atk-s0508a12:136_2: rūpādiārammaṇesu aññaṁ muñcitvā aññaṁ gaṇhanto cittasantānassa samādānavasena niccalaṁ
atk-s0508a12:136_3: ṭhātuṁ appadānena abhikkhaṇaṁ ghaṭṭayanto cālento tasmiṁyeva rūpādiārammaṇe anuparivattati
atk-s0508a12:136_4: yathākāmaṁ vicarati. Vattamānasamīpatāya cettha vattamānavacanaṁ. Evaṁ anupariyanto
atk-s0508a12:136_5: ca tiṭṭha, makkaṭa, mā dhāvi tvaṁ, cittamakkaṭa, idāni tiṭṭha mā dhāvi, ito paṭṭhāya
atk-s0508a12:136_6: te dhāvituṁ na sakkā, tasmā na hi te taṁ yathā pūre yasmā taṁ attabhāvagehaṁ pubbe
atk-s0508a12:136_7: viya na te sevitaṁ pihitadvārabhāvato, kiñca niggahītosi paññāya sayañca idāni maggapaññāya
atk-s0508a12:136_8: kilesābhisaṅkhārasaṅkhātānaṁ pādānaṁ chedanena accantikaṁ niggahaṁ pattosi, tasmā
atk-s0508a12:136_9: neva dūraṁ gamissasi ito attabhāvato dūraṁ dutiyādiattabhāvaṁ neva gamissasi yāvacarimakacittaṁ
atk-s0508a12:136_10: eva te gamananti dasseti. ‘‘Neto dūra’’ntipi pāṭho, so evattho.
atk-s0508a12:139_0: Tiṇṇaṁ me tālapattānantiādikā āyasmato gaṅgātīriyattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṁ
atk-s0508a12:139_1: kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto sāsane abhippasanno
atk-s0508a12:139_2: hutvā bhikkhusaṅghassa pānīyamadāsi. So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ
atk-s0508a12:139_3: puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṁ aññatarassa
atk-s0508a12:139_4: gahapatissa putto hutvā nibbatti, ‘‘datto’’tissa nāmaṁ ahosi. So vayappatto gharāvāsaṁ
atk-s0508a12:139_5: vasanto agamanīyaṭṭhānabhāvaṁ ajānitvā vītikkamaṁ katvā puna agamanīyaṭṭhānabhāvaṁ
atk-s0508a12:139_6: ñatvā saṁvegajāto pabbajitvā taṁ kammaṁ jigucchitvā lūkhapaṭipattiṁ anutiṭṭhanto
atk-s0508a12:139_7: paṁsukūlacīvaraṁ chavasittasadisaṁ mattikāpattañca gahetvā gaṅgātīre tīhi tālapattehi
atk-s0508a12:139_8: kuṭikaṁ katvā vihāsi, tenevassa gaṅgātīriyoti samaññā ahosi. So ‘‘arahattaṁ appatvā
atk-s0508a12:139_9: na kenaci sallapissāmī’’ti cittaṁ adhiṭṭhāya paṭhamaṁ saṁvaccharaṁ tuṇhībhūto vacībhedaṁ
atk-s0508a12:139_10: akarontova vihāsi. Dutiye saṁvacchare gocaragāme aññatarāya itthiyā ‘‘mūgo nu kho
atk-s0508a12:139_11: no’’ti vīmaṁsitukāmāya patte khīraṁ āsiñcantiyā hatthavihāre katepi okirite, ‘‘alaṁ,
atk-s0508a12:139_12: bhaginī’’ti vācaṁ nicchari. Tatiye pana saṁvacchare antaravasseva ghaṭayanto vāyamanto
atk-s0508a12:139_13: arahattaṁ pāpuṇi, tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 2.50.51-56) –
atk-s0508a12:147: Arahā pana hutvā attano pubbabhāgapaṭipattiyā vibhāvanamukhena aññaṁ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a12:153: Tatiye antaravassamhi, tamokhandho padālito’’ti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:154_0: Tattha tiṇṇaṁ me tālapattānaṁ, gaṅgātīre kuṭī katāti tālarukkhato pahitehi tīhi tālapaṇṇehi
atk-s0508a12:154_1: mayhaṁ vassanapariharaṇatthaṁ gaṅgāya nadiyā tīre kuṭikā katā. Tena attano senāsanasantosaṁ
atk-s0508a12:156: Alaṁ phāsuvihārāya, pahitattassa bhikkhuno’’ti. (theragā. 985; mi. pa. 6.1.1);
atk-s0508a12:157_0: ‘‘Tālapattīna’’ntipi pāṭho, so evattho. Chavasittova me pattoti mayhaṁ patto chavasittasadiso,
atk-s0508a12:157_1: matānaṁ khīrasecanakuṇḍasadisoti attho . Paṁsukūlañca cīvaranti cīvarañca me antaramaggasusānādīsu
atk-s0508a12:157_2: chaḍḍitanantakehi kataṁ paṁsukūlaṁ. Padadvayena parikkhārasantosaṁ dasseti.
atk-s0508a12:158_1: Ekā vācā me bhāsitāti ekā, ‘‘alaṁ, bhaginī’’ti khīrapaṭikkhepavācā eva mayā vuttā,
atk-s0508a12:158_2: añño tattha vacībhedo nāhosi. Tena ukkaṁsagataṁ kāyavacīsaṁyamaṁ dasseti. Tatiye
atk-s0508a12:158_3: antaravassamhīti tatiyassa saṁvaccharassa abbhantare, tasmiṁ aparipuṇṇeyeva. Tamokhandho
atk-s0508a12:158_4: padālitoti aggamaggena tamokhandho bhinno, avijjānusayo samucchinnoti attho. Tena
atk-s0508a12:161_0: Api ce hoti tevijjotiādikā āyasmato ajinattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a12:161_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto buddhasuññe loke kulagehe nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a12:161_2: viññutaṁ patto kenacideva karaṇīyena araññaṁ gato tattha sucintitaṁ nāma paccekasambuddhaṁ
atk-s0508a12:161_3: ābādhena pīḷitaṁ nisinnaṁ disvā upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā bhesajjatthāya pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a12:161_4: ghatamaṇḍaṁ adāsi. So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ puññāni katvā
atk-s0508a12:161_5: sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṁ aññatarassa daliddabrāhmaṇassa
atk-s0508a12:161_6: gehe paṭisandhiṁ gaṇhi. Taṁ vijāyanakāle ajinacammena sampaṭicchiṁsu. Tenassa ajinotveva
atk-s0508a12:161_7: nāmaṁ akaṁsu. So bhogasaṁvattaniyassa kammassa akatattā daliddakule nibbatto vayappattopi
atk-s0508a12:161_8: appannapānabhojano hutvā vicaranto jetavanapaṭiggahaṇe buddhānubhāvaṁ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a12:161_9: pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ
atk-s0508a12:165: Katattā ācitattā ca, gaṅgā bhāgīrathī ayaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:177_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvāpi purimakammanissandena appalābhī appaññātova ahosi. Uddesabhattasalākabhattānipi
atk-s0508a12:177_1: lāmakāneva pāpuṇanti. Kammaphaleneva ca naṁ puthujjanā bhikkhū sāmaṇerā ca ‘‘appaññāto’’ti
atk-s0508a12:182: ‘‘Yo ca kho annapānassa, lābhī hotīdha puggalo;
atk-s0508a12:183: Pāpadhammopi ce hoti, so nesaṁ hoti sakkato’’ti. –
atk-s0508a12:185_0: Tattha apīti sambhāvane nipāto. Ceti parikappane. Hotīti bhavati. Tisso vijjā etassāti
atk-s0508a12:185_1: tevijjo. Maccuṁ pajahatīti maccuhāyī. Kāmāsavādīnaṁ abhāvena anāsavo. Idaṁ vuttaṁ
atk-s0508a12:185_2: hoti – dibbacakkhuñāṇaṁ pubbenivāsañāṇaṁ āsavakkhayañāṇanti imāsaṁ tissannaṁ vijjānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:185_3: adhigatattā tevijjo tato eva sabbaso kāmāsavādīnaṁ parikkhīṇattā anāsavo āyatiṁ punabbhavassa
atk-s0508a12:185_4: aggahaṇato maraṇābhāvena maccuhāyī yadipi hoti, evaṁ santepi appaññātoti naṁ bālā
atk-s0508a12:185_5: avajānanti yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti, taṁ sadatthaṁ
atk-s0508a12:185_6: anupāpuṇitvā ṭhitampi naṁ uttamaṁ purisaṁ ‘‘dhutavādo bahussuto dhammakathiko’’ti
atk-s0508a12:185_7: uppannalābhassa abhāvato ‘‘na paññāto na pākaṭo’’ti bālā dummedhapuggalā avajānanti,
atk-s0508a12:185_8: kasmā? Ajānatā ajānanakāraṇā guṇānaṁ ajānanameva tattha kāraṇanti dasseti.
atk-s0508a12:186_0: Yathā ca guṇānaṁ ajānanato bālā lābhagarutāya sambhāvanīyampi avajānanti, evaṁ guṇānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:186_1: ajānanato lābhagarutāya evaṁ avajānitabbampi sambhāventīti dassento dutiyaṁ gāthaṁ
atk-s0508a12:186_2: āha. Tattha yoti aniyamavacanaṁ. Ca-saddo byatireke, tena yathāvuttapuggalato imassa
atk-s0508a12:186_3: puggalassa vuccamānaṁyeva visesaṁ janeti. Khoti avadhāraṇe. Annapānassāti nidassanamattaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:186_4: Lābhīti lābhavā. Idhāti imasmiṁ loke. Jarāmaraṇehi tassa tassa sattāvāsassa pūraṇato
atk-s0508a12:186_5: galanato ca puggalo. Pāpadhammoti lāmakadhammo. Ayañhettha attho – yo pana puggalo
atk-s0508a12:186_6: cīvarādipaccayamattasseva lābhī hoti, na jhānādīnaṁ, so pāpicchatāya dussīlabhāvena
atk-s0508a12:186_7: hīnadhammopi samāno idha imasmiṁ loke bālānaṁ lābhagarutāya sakkato garukato hotīti.
atk-s0508a12:189_0: Yadāhaṁdhammamassosintiādikā āyasmato meḷajinattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a12:189_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a12:189_2: kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ bhagavantaṁ piṇḍāya gacchantaṁ
atk-s0508a12:189_3: disvā pasannamānaso madhuraṁ āmodaphalaṁ adāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0508a12:189_4: saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde bārāṇasiyaṁ khattiyakule nibbattitvā meḷajinoti laddhanāmo
atk-s0508a12:189_5: vijjāsippesu nipphattiṁ gato paṇḍito byatto disāsu pākaṭo ahosi. So bhagavati bārāṇasiyaṁ
atk-s0508a12:189_6: isipatane viharante vihāraṁ gantvā satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a12:189_7: pabbajitvā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā tadaheva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne
atk-s0508a12:197: Arahattaṁ pana patvā aparabhāge bhikkhūhi, ‘‘āvuso, kiṁ tayā uttarimanussadhammo adhigato’’ti puṭṭho sīhanādaṁ nadanto –
atk-s0508a12:203: Magge paṭipadāyaṁ vā, kaṅkhā mayhaṁ na vijjatī’’ti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:204_0: Tattha yadāti yasmiṁ kāle. Ahanti attānaṁ niddisati. Dhammanti catusaccadhammaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:204_1: Assosinti suṇiṁ. Satthunoti diṭṭhadhammikādiatthehi veneyyānaṁ sāsanaṭṭhena satthuno.
atk-s0508a12:204_2: Kaṅkhanti saṁsayaṁ. Saṅkhatamasaṅkhatañca anavasesato jānanaṭṭhena sabbaññū. Kutocipi
atk-s0508a12:204_3: parājitā bhāvena aparājite. Veneyyasattānaṁ saṁsārakantārato nibbānaṁ paṭivāhanaṭṭhena
atk-s0508a12:204_4: satthavāhe. Idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti – yato pabhuti ahaṁ satthuno dhammaṁ desentassa catusaccadhammaṁ
atk-s0508a12:204_5: assosiṁ sotadvārānusārena upadhāresiṁ upalabhiṁ, tato paṭṭhāya anavasesasaṅkhatāsaṅkhatasammutidhammānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:204_6: sayambhūñāṇena jānanato sabbaññū anāvaraṇadassāvimhi, pañcannampi mārānaṁ abhibhavanato
atk-s0508a12:204_7: tehi aparājitattā sadevake loke appaṭihatadhammacakkattā ca aparājite, veneyyasattānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:204_8: lobhakantārādito vāhanaṭṭhena satthavāhe, mahāvikkantatāya mahāvīre, aññehi duddamānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:204_9: purisadammānaṁ saraṇato accantikena damathena damanato sārathīnaṁ pavarabhūte uttame
atk-s0508a12:204_10: sammāsambuddhe , ‘‘buddho nu kho no nu kho’’ti kaṅkhaṁ nābhijānāmi aparappaccayabhāvato.
atk-s0508a12:204_11: Tathārūpe desite ariyamagge tadupādāyabhūtāya ca sīlādipaṭipadāya ‘‘niyyāniko nu
atk-s0508a12:204_12: kho na nu kho’’ti kaṅkhā vicikicchā na vijjati natthīti. Ettha ca ariyadhamme saṁsayābhāvakathanena
atk-s0508a12:204_13: ariyasaṅghepi saṁsayābhāvo kathitoyevāti daṭṭhabbaṁ tattha patiṭṭhitassa anaññathābhāvatoti.
atk-s0508a12:207_0: Yathā agāraṁ ducchannantiādikā āyasmato rādhattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṁ kira
atk-s0508a12:207_1: padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṁsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto
atk-s0508a12:207_2: vihāraṁ gantvā satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṁ nisinno satthārā ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ
atk-s0508a12:207_3: paṭibhāneyyakānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapiyamānaṁ disvā sayaṁ taṁ ṭhānantaraṁ patthetvā mahādānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:207_4: pavattesi. Satthu uḷārañca pūjaṁ akāsi. So evaṁ katapaṇidhāno tato cuto tattha tattha
atk-s0508a12:207_5: bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ
atk-s0508a12:207_6: patto ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ piṇḍāya gacchantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso madhurāni ambaphalānī
atk-s0508a12:207_7: adāsi. So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ puññāni katvā devamanussesu
atk-s0508a12:207_8: saṁsaranto amhākaṁ bhagavato kāle rājagahe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā rādhoti laddhanāmo
atk-s0508a12:207_9: vayappatto hutvā gharāvāsaṁ vasanto mahallakakāle puttadārehi apasādito, ‘‘kiṁ me
atk-s0508a12:207_10: gharāvāsena, pabbajissāmī’’ti vihāraṁ gantvā there bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṁ
atk-s0508a12:207_11: yācitvā tehi ‘‘ayaṁ brāhmaṇo jiṇṇo na sakkoti vattapaṭivattaṁ pūretu’’nti paṭikkhitto
atk-s0508a12:207_12: satthu santikaṁ gantvā attano ajjhāsayaṁ pavedetvā satthārā upanissayasampattiṁ oloketvā
atk-s0508a12:207_13: āṇattena dhammasenāpatinā pabbājito vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṁ
atk-s0508a12:213_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā satthu santikāvacaro hutvā vicaranto satthu dhammadesanāpaṭibhānassa
atk-s0508a12:213_1: paccayabhūtānaṁ paṭibhānajānanakānaṁ aggo jāto. Therassa hi diṭṭhisamudācārañca āgamma
atk-s0508a12:213_2: dasabalassa navanavā dhammadesanā paṭibhāti. Tenāha bhagavā – ‘‘etadaggaṁ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0508a12:213_3: mama sāvakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ paṭibhāneyyakānaṁ yadidaṁ rādho’’ti (a. ni. 1.219, 233).
atk-s0508a12:213_4: So ekadivasaṁ ‘‘ime sattā abhāvanāya rāgena abhibhuyyanti, bhāvanāya sati taṁ natthī’’ti
atk-s0508a12:214_0: 133-4. Tattha agāranti yaṁkiñci gehaṁ. Ducchannanti viraḷacchannaṁ chiddāvachiddaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:214_1: Samativijjhatīti vassavuṭṭhi vinivijjhati. Abhāvitanti taṁ agāraṁ vuṭṭhi viya bhāvanāya
atk-s0508a12:214_2: rahitattā abhāvitaṁ cittaṁ. Rāgo samativijjhatīti na kevalaṁ rāgova dosamohamānādayopi
atk-s0508a12:214_3: sabbakilesā tathārūpaṁ cittaṁ ativijjhantiyeva. Subhāvitanti samathavipassanābhāvanāhi
atk-s0508a12:214_4: suṭṭhu bhāvitaṁ, evarūpaṁ cittaṁ succhannaṁ gehaṁ vuṭṭhi viya rāgādayo kilesā ativijjhituṁ na sakkontīti.
atk-s0508a12:217_0: Khīṇāhi mayhaṁ jātītiādikā āyasmato surādhattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a12:217_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a12:217_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ disvā pasannamānaso mātuluṅgaphalaṁ
atk-s0508a12:217_3: adāsi. So tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva
atk-s0508a12:217_4: saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde anantaraṁ vuttassa rādhattherassa kaniṭṭho hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0508a12:217_5: surādhotissa nāmaṁ ahosi. So jeṭṭhabhātari rādhe pabbajite sayampi pabbajitvā vipassanāya
atk-s0508a12:217_6: kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 2.51.68-72) –
atk-s0508a12:222: ‘‘Ekatiṁse ito kappe, yaṁ phalaṁ adadiṁ tadā;
atk-s0508a12:225: Arahattaṁ pana patvā sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvadassanatthaṁ aññaṁ byākaronto ‘‘khīṇā hī mayha’’ntiādinā gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0508a12:226_0: 135-6. Tattha khīṇāti khayaṁ pariyosānaṁ gatā. Jātīti bhavo bhavanibbatti vā. Vusitaṁ
atk-s0508a12:226_1: jinasāsananti jinassa sammāsambuddhassa sāsanaṁ maggabrahmacariyaṁ vuṭṭhaṁ parivuṭṭhaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:226_2: Pahīno jālasaṅkhātoti sattasantānassa ottharaṇato nissarituṁ appadānato ca ‘‘jālasaṅkhāto’’ti
atk-s0508a12:226_3: ca laddhanāmā diṭṭhi avijjā ca pahīnā maggena samucchinnā. Bhavanetti samūhatāti
atk-s0508a12:226_4: kāmabhavādikassa bhavassa nayanato pavattanato bhavanettisaññitā taṇhā samugghāṭitā.
atk-s0508a12:226_5: Yassatthāya pabbajitoti yassa atthāya yadatthaṁ ahaṁ agārasmā gehato anagāriyaṁ pabbajjaṁ
atk-s0508a12:226_6: pabbajito upagato. So sabbesaṁ orambhāgiyuddhambhāgiyappabhedānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ bandhanānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:226_7: khayabhūto attho nibbānasaṅkhāto paramattho arahattasaṅkhāto sadattho ca mayā anuppatto adhigatoti attho.
atk-s0508a12:229_0: Sukhaṁsupantīti āyasmato gotamattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a12:229_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ puññaṁ upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato
atk-s0508a12:229_2: kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ bhagavantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a12:229_3: āmodaphalamadāsi. Tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ puññāni katvā
atk-s0508a12:229_4: sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā gotamoti
atk-s0508a12:229_5: laddhanāmo sattavassikakāle upanayanaṁ katvā ratanabhikkhaṁ caritvā sahassaṁ labhitvā
atk-s0508a12:229_6: taṁ tādise ṭhāne ṭhapetvā vataṁ caranto soḷasasattarasavassuddesikakāle akalyāṇamittehi
atk-s0508a12:229_7: kāmesu parinīyamāno ekissā rūpūpajīviniyā taṁ sahassabhaṇḍikaṁ datvā brahmacariyavināsaṁ
atk-s0508a12:229_8: patvā tāya cassa brahmacārirūpaṁ disvā virattākāre dassite ekarattivāseneva nibbinnarūpo
atk-s0508a12:229_9: attano brahmacariyanivāsaṁ dhanajāniñca saritvā ‘‘ayuttaṁ mayā kata’’nti vippaṭisārī
atk-s0508a12:229_10: ahosi. Satthā tassa hetusampattiṁ cittācārañca ñatvā tassa āsannaṭṭhāne attānaṁ dassesi.
atk-s0508a12:229_11: So satthāraṁ disvā pasannamānaso upasaṅkami, tassa bhagavā dhammaṁ desesi. So dhammaṁ
atk-s0508a12:229_12: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajanto khuraggeyeva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne
atk-s0508a12:235_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā jhānasukhena phalasukhena vītināmentaṁ eko gihisahāyo upagantvā,
atk-s0508a12:235_1: ‘‘āvuso, tayā ratanabhikkhāya laddhaṁ pabbajanto kiṁ akāsī’’ti pucchi. Taṁ sutvā
atk-s0508a12:235_2: thero ‘‘idaṁ nāma kata’’nti anācikkhitvā mātugāme dosaṁ pakāsetvā attano vītarāgabhāvena
atk-s0508a12:236_0: 137. Tattha sukhaṁ supanti munayo, ye itthīsu na bajjhareti ye itthīsu visayabhūtāsu
atk-s0508a12:236_1: nimittabhūtāsu vā rāgabandhanena na bajjhanti, te munayo tapassino saṁyatindriyā
atk-s0508a12:236_2: sukhaṁ supanti sukhaṁ viharanti, natthi tesaṁ dukkhanti adhippāyo. ‘‘Supantī’’ti
atk-s0508a12:236_3: hi nidassanamattametaṁ. Sadā verakkhitabbāsūti ekaṁsena sabbakālaṁ rakkhitabbāsu.
atk-s0508a12:236_4: Itthiyo hi sattabhūmike nippurise pāsāde uparibhūmiyaṁ vasāpetvāpi, kucchiyaṁ pakkhipitvāpi
atk-s0508a12:236_5: na sakkā rakkhituṁ, tasmā tā kiṭṭhādigāviyo viya sabbakālaṁ rakkhaṇīyā honti. Bahucittatāya
atk-s0508a12:236_6: vā sāmikena vatthālaṅkārānuppadānādinā cittaññathattato sabbakālaṁ rakkhitabbā. Sarīrasabhāvaṁ
atk-s0508a12:236_7: vā mālāgandhādīhi paṭicchādanavasena rakkhitabbacittatāya rakkhitabbāti. Yāsu saccaṁ
atk-s0508a12:236_8: sudullabhanti yāsu saccavacanaṁ laddhuṁ na sakkā, itthiyo hi aggimpi pavisanti, visampi
atk-s0508a12:236_9: khādanti, satthampi āharanti, ubbandhitvāpi kālaṁ karonti, na pana sacce ṭhātuṁ sakkonti.
atk-s0508a12:236_10: Tasmā evarūpā itthiyo vajjetvā ṭhitā munayo sukhitā vatāti dasseti.
atk-s0508a12:237_0: 138. Idāni yassa appahīnattā evarūpāsu itthīsupi bajjhanti, tassa kāmassa attano
atk-s0508a12:237_1: suppahīnataṁ accantaniṭṭhitatañca dassento dutiyaṁ gāthamāha. Vadhaṁ carimha te kāmāti
atk-s0508a12:237_2: ambho kāma, tava vadhaṁ accantasamucchedaṁ ariyamaggena carimha, ‘‘vadhaṁ carimhase’’tipi
atk-s0508a12:237_3: pāṭho, vadhāya pahānāya maggabrahmacariyaṁ acarimhāti attho. Anaṇā dāni te mayanti
atk-s0508a12:237_4: idāni aggamaggapattito paṭṭhāya iṇabhāvakarāya pahīnattā kāma te anaṇā mayaṁ, na
atk-s0508a12:237_5: tuyhaṁ iṇaṁ dhārema. Avītarāgo hi rāgassa vase vattanato tassa iṇaṁ dhārento viya
atk-s0508a12:237_6: hoti, vītarāgo pana taṁ atikkamitvā paramena cittissariyena samannāgato. Anaṇattā
atk-s0508a12:237_7: eva gacchāma dāni nibbānaṁ, yattha gantvā na socati yasmiṁ nibbāne gamanahetu sabbaso
atk-s0508a12:237_8: sokahetūnaṁ abhāvato na socati, taṁ anupādisesanibbānameva idāni gacchāma anupāpuṇāmāti attho.
atk-s0508a12:240_0: Pubbe hanati attānanti āyasmato vasabhattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a12:240_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto buddhasuññe loke brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0508a12:240_2: nibbattitvā vayappatto brāhmaṇānaṁ vijjāsippesu nipphattiṁ gantvā nekkhammajjhāsayatāya
atk-s0508a12:240_3: gharāvāsaṁ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā cuddasasahassatāpasaparivāro himavantassa
atk-s0508a12:240_4: avidūre samagge nāma pabbate assamaṁ kāretvā vasanto jhānābhiññāyo nibbattetvā tāpasānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:240_5: ovādānusāsaniyo dento ekadivasaṁ evaṁ cintesi – ‘‘ahaṁ kho dāni imehi tāpasehi sakkato
atk-s0508a12:240_6: garukato pūjito viharāmi, mayā pana pūjetabbo na upalabbhati, dukkho kho panāyaṁ
atk-s0508a12:240_7: loke yadidaṁ agaruvāso’’ti. Evaṁ pana cintetvā purimabuddhesu katādhikāratāya purimabuddhānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:240_8: cetiye attanā kataṁ pūjāsakkāraṁ anussaritvā ‘‘yaṁnūnāhaṁ purimabuddhe uddissa pulinacetiyaṁ
atk-s0508a12:240_9: katvā pūjaṁ kareyya’’nti haṭṭhatuṭṭho iddhiyā pulinathūpaṁ suvaṇṇamayaṁ māpetvā suvaṇṇamayādīhi
atk-s0508a12:240_10: tisahassamattehi pupphehi devasikaṁ pūjaṁ karonto yāvatāyukaṁ puññāni katvā aparihīnajjhāno
atk-s0508a12:240_11: kālaṁ katvā brahmaloke nibbatto. Tatthapi yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā tato cuto tāvatiṁse
atk-s0508a12:240_12: nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde vesāliyaṁ licchavirājakule
atk-s0508a12:240_13: nibbattitvā vasabhoti laddhanāmo vayappatto bhagavato vesāligamane buddhānubhāvaṁ
atk-s0508a12:240_14: disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a12:246: Sabbo jano maṁ pūjeti, nāhaṁ pūjemi kiñcanaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:247: ‘‘Na me ovādako atthi, vattā koci na vijjati;
atk-s0508a12:250: So me ācariyo natthi, vanavāso niratthako.
atk-s0508a12:258: Tesaṁ etādiso thūpo, taṁ nimittaṁ karomahaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:266: Kilese saṁvaseyyāsi, na yuttaṁ tava mārisa.
atk-s0508a12:267: ‘‘Saha āvajjite thūpe, gāravaṁ hoti me tadā;
atk-s0508a12:278: Gatte sedā na muccanti, suppabhāso bhavāmahaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:280: Thūpaṁ katvāna pulinaṁ, pattomhi acalaṁ padaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:282: Natthi khettaṁ akhettaṁ vā, paṭipattīva sādhakā.
atk-s0508a12:287: ‘‘Tatheva me kataṁ kammaṁ, parittaṁ thokakañca yaṁ;
atk-s0508a12:291: ‘‘Saddhā mātā pitā mayhaṁ, buddhassa saraṇaṁ gatā;
atk-s0508a12:308_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā dāyakānuggahaṁ karonto tehi upanīte paccaye na paṭikkhipati,
atk-s0508a12:308_1: yathāladdheyeva paribhuñjati. Taṁ puthujjanā ‘‘ayaṁ kāyadaḷhibahulo arakkhitacitto’’ti
atk-s0508a12:308_2: maññamānā avamaññanti. Thero taṁ agaṇentova viharati. Tassa pana avidūre aññataro
atk-s0508a12:308_3: kuhakabhikkhu pāpiccho samāno appiccho viya santuṭṭho viya attānaṁ dassento lokaṁ
atk-s0508a12:308_4: vañcento viharati. Mahājano taṁ arahantaṁ viya sambhāveti. Athassa sakko devānamindo
atk-s0508a12:308_5: taṁ pavattiṁ ñatvā theraṁ upasaṅkamitvā, ‘‘bhante, kiṁ nāma kuhako karotī’’ti pucchi.
atk-s0508a12:310: ‘‘Pubbe hanati attānaṁ, pacchā hanati so pare;
atk-s0508a12:314: Yasmiṁ pāpāni kammāni, sa ve kaṇho sujampatī’’ti. – gāthādvayamāha;
atk-s0508a12:315_0: Tattha pubbe hanati attānanti kuhakapuggalo attano kuhakavuttiyā lokaṁ vañcento pāpicchatādīhi
atk-s0508a12:315_1: pāpadhammehi paṭhamameva attānaṁ hanati, attano kusalakoṭṭhāsaṁ vināseti. Pacchā
atk-s0508a12:315_2: hanati so pareti so kuhako paṭhamaṁ tāva vuttanayena attānaṁ hantvā pacchā pare yehi
atk-s0508a12:315_3: ‘‘ayaṁ bhikkhu pesalo ariyo’’ti vā sambhāventehi kārā katā, te hanati tesaṁ kārāni
atk-s0508a12:315_4: attani katāni amahapphalāni katvā paccayavināsanena vināseti. Satipi kuhakassa ubhayahanane
atk-s0508a12:315_5: attahanane pana ayaṁ visesoti dassento āha suhataṁ hanti attānanti. So kuhako attānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:315_6: hananto suhataṁ katvā hanti vināseti, yathā kiṁ? Vītaṁseneva pakkhimāti, vītaṁsoti
atk-s0508a12:315_7: dīpakasakuṇo, tena. Pakkhimāti sākuṇiko. Yathā tena vītaṁsasakuṇena aññe sakuṇe vañcetvā
atk-s0508a12:315_8: hananto attānaṁ idha lokepi hanati viññugarahasāvajjasabhāvādinā, samparāyaṁ pana
atk-s0508a12:315_9: duggatiparikkilesena hanatiyeva, na pana te sakuṇe pacchā hantuṁ sakkoti, evaṁ kuhakopi
atk-s0508a12:315_10: kohaññena lokaṁ vañcetvā idha lokepi attānaṁ hanati vippaṭisāraviññugarahādīhi, paralokepi
atk-s0508a12:315_11: duggatiparikkilesehi, na pana te paccayadāyake apāyadukkhaṁ pāpeti. Apica kuhako
atk-s0508a12:315_12: dakkhiṇāya amahapphalabhāvakaraṇeneva dāyakaṁ hanatīti vutto, na nipphalabhāvakaraṇena.
atk-s0508a12:315_13: Vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā – ‘‘dussīlassa manussabhūtassa dānaṁ datvā sahassaguṇā dakkhiṇā
atk-s0508a12:316_0: Evaṁ bāhiraparimajjanamatte ṭhitā puggalā suddhā nāma na honti, abbhantarasuddhiyā
atk-s0508a12:316_1: eva pana suddhā hontīti dassento ‘‘na brāhmaṇo’’ti dutiyaṁ gāthamāha. Tassattho –
atk-s0508a12:316_2: iriyāpathasaṇṭhapanādibahisampattimattena brāhmaṇo na hoti. Sampattiattho hi idha
atk-s0508a12:316_3: vaṇṇa-saddo. Abbhantare pana sīlādisampattiyā brāhmaṇo hoti, ‘‘bāhitapāpo brāhmaṇo’’ti
atk-s0508a12:316_4: katvā. Tasmā ‘‘yasmiṁ pāpāni lāmakāni kammāni saṁvijjanti, ekaṁsena so kaṇho nihīnapuggalo’’ti
atk-s0508a12:316_5: sujampati, devānaminda, jānāhi. Taṁ sutvā sakko kuhakabhikkhuṁ tajjetvā ‘‘dhamme
atk-s0508a12:321_0: Sussūsāti āyasmato mahācundattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro
atk-s0508a12:321_1: tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kumbhakārakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a12:321_2: viññutaṁ patto kumbhakārakammena jīvanto ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a12:321_3: ekaṁ mattikāpattaṁ svābhisaṅkhataṁ katvā bhagavato adāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0508a12:321_4: saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe nālakagāme rūpasāriyā brāhmaṇiyā putto
atk-s0508a12:321_5: sāriputtattherassa kaniṭṭhabhātā hutvā nibbatti, cundotissa nāmaṁ ahosi. So vayappatto
atk-s0508a12:321_6: dhammasenāpatiṁ anupabbajitvā taṁ nissāya vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā ghaṭento vāyamanto
atk-s0508a12:321_7: nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 2.51.39-50) –
atk-s0508a12:327: Rūpimaye ca sovaṇṇe, taṭṭike ca maṇīmaye.
atk-s0508a12:334: ‘‘Yāvatā khettā vijjanti, saṅghāpi ca gaṇāpi ca;
atk-s0508a12:341: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā attanā paṭiladdhasampattiyā kāraṇabhūtaṁ garūpanissayaṁ vivekavāsañca kittento –
atk-s0508a12:344: Paññāya atthaṁ jānāti, ñāto attho sukhāvaho.
atk-s0508a12:347: Sace ratiṁ nādhigaccheyya tattha, saṅghe vase rakkhitatto satīmā’’ti. –
atk-s0508a12:349_0: Tattha sussūsāti sotabbayuttassa sabbasutassa sotumicchā, garusannivāsopi. Diṭṭhadhammikādibhedañhi
atk-s0508a12:349_1: atthaṁ sotumicchantena kalyāṇamitte upasaṅkamitvā vattakaraṇena payirupāsitvā yadā
atk-s0508a12:349_2: te payirupāsanāya ārādhitacittā kañci upanisīditukāmā honti, atha ne upanisīditvā
atk-s0508a12:349_3: adhigatāya sotumicchāya ohitasotena sotabbaṁ hotīti garusannivāsopi sussūsāhetutāya
atk-s0508a12:349_4: ‘‘sussūsā’’ti vuccati. Sā panāyaṁ sussūsā saccapaṭiccasamuppādādipaṭisaṁyuttaṁ sutaṁ
atk-s0508a12:349_5: taṁsamaṅgino puggalassa vaḍḍheti brūhetīti sutavaddhanī, bāhusaccakārīti attho. Sutaṁ
atk-s0508a12:349_6: paññāya vaddhananti yaṁ taṁ ‘‘sutadharo sutasannicayo’’ti (ma. ni. 1.339; a. ni.
atk-s0508a12:349_7: 4.22) ‘‘idhekaccassa bahukaṁ sutaṁ hoti suttaṁ geyyaṁ veyyākaraṇa’’nti (a. ni. 4.6)
atk-s0508a12:349_8: ca evamādinā nayena vuttaṁ bāhusaccaṁ, taṁ akusalappahānakusalādhigamanahetubhūtaṁ
atk-s0508a12:349_9: paññaṁ vaddhetīti sutaṁ paññāya vaddhanaṁ, vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā –
atk-s0508a12:350: ‘‘Sutāvudho kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako akusalaṁ pajahati, kusalaṁ bhāveti, sāvajjaṁ pajahati, anavajjaṁ bhāveti, suddhaṁ attānaṁ pariharatī’’ti (a. ni. 7.67).
atk-s0508a12:351_0: Paññāya atthaṁ jānātīti bahussuto sutamayañāṇe ṭhito taṁ paṭipattiṁ paṭipajjanto
atk-s0508a12:351_1: sutānusārena atthūpaparikkhāya dhammanijjhānena bhāvanāya ca lokiyalokuttarabhedaṁ
atk-s0508a12:351_2: diṭṭhadhammādivibhāgaṁ dukkhādivibhāgañca atthaṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti ca paṭivijjhati
atk-s0508a12:352: ‘‘Sutassa yathāpariyattassa atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hotī’’ti (a. ni. 4.6).
atk-s0508a12:353_0: ‘‘Dhatānaṁ dhammānaṁ atthaṁ upaparikkhati, atthaṁ upaparikkhato dhammā nijjhānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:353_1: khamanti, dhammanijjhānakkhantiyā sati chando jāyati, chandajāto ussahati, ussahitvā
atk-s0508a12:353_2: tuleti, tulayitvā padahati, pahitatto samāno kāyena ceva paramasaccaṁ sacchikaroti,
atk-s0508a12:353_3: paññāya ca naṁ ativijjha passatī’’ti (ma. ni. 2.432) ca.
atk-s0508a12:354: Ñāto attho sukhāvahoti yathāvutto diṭṭhadhammikādiattho ceva dukkhādiattho ca yāthāvato ñāto adhigato lokiyalokuttarabhedaṁ sukhaṁ āvahati nipphādetīti attho.
atk-s0508a12:355_0: Ṭhitāya bhāvanāpaññāya sutamatteneva na sijjhatīti tassā paṭipajjanavidhiṁ dassento
atk-s0508a12:355_1: ‘‘sevetha…pe…vippamokkha’’nti āha. Tattha sevetha pantāni senāsanānīti kāyavivekamāha.
atk-s0508a12:355_2: Tena saṁyojanappahānassa ca vakkhamānattā vivekārahasseva vivekavāsoti sīlasaṁvarādayo
atk-s0508a12:355_3: idha avuttasiddhā veditabbā. Careyya saṁyojanavippamokkhanti yathā saṁyojanehi cittaṁ
atk-s0508a12:355_4: vippamuccati, tathā vipassanābhāvanaṁ maggabhāvanañca careyya paṭipajjeyyāti attho.
atk-s0508a12:355_5: Sace ratiṁ nādhigaccheyya tatthāti tesu pantasenāsanesu yathāladdhesu adhikusaladhammesu
atk-s0508a12:355_6: ca ratiṁ pubbenāparaṁ visesassa alābhato abhiratiṁ na labheyya, saṅghe bhikkhusamūhe
atk-s0508a12:355_7: rakkhitatto kammaṭṭhānaparigaṇhanato rakkhitacitto chasu dvāresu satiārakkhāya upaṭṭhapanena
atk-s0508a12:355_8: satimā vaseyya vihareyya, evaṁ viharantassa ca api nāma saṁyojanavippamokkho bhaveyyāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a12:358_0: Ye kho teti āyasmato jotidāsattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro
atk-s0508a12:358_1: tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a12:358_2: viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ piṇḍāya gacchantaṁ disvā pasannacitto kāsumārikaphalaṁ
atk-s0508a12:358_3: adāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde pādiyatthajanapade
atk-s0508a12:358_4: vibhavasampannassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti, jotidāsotissa nāmaṁ ahosi. So
atk-s0508a12:358_5: viññutaṁ patvā gharamāvasanto ekadivasaṁ mahākassapattheraṁ attano gāme piṇḍāya carantaṁ
atk-s0508a12:358_6: disvā pasannacitto bhojetvā therassa santike dhammaṁ sutvā attano gāmasamīpe pabbate
atk-s0508a12:358_7: mahantaṁ vihāraṁ kāretvā theraṁ tattha vāsetvā catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahanto therassa
atk-s0508a12:358_8: dhammadesanāya paṭiladdhasaṁvego pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva
atk-s0508a12:358_9: chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 2.51.51-56) –
atk-s0508a12:363: ‘‘Ekatiṁse ito kappe, yaṁ phalaṁ adadiṁ tadā;
atk-s0508a12:366_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā visesato vinayapiṭake sukusalabhāvaṁ
atk-s0508a12:366_1: patvā dasavassiko parisupaṭṭhāko ca hutvā bahūhi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ bhagavantaṁ vandituṁ
atk-s0508a12:366_2: sāvatthiṁ gacchanto antarāmagge addhānaparissamavinodanatthaṁ titthiyānaṁ ārāmaṁ
atk-s0508a12:366_3: pavisitvā ekamantaṁ nisinno ekaṁ pañcatapaṁ tapantaṁ brāhmaṇaṁ disvā, ‘‘kiṁ, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0508a12:366_4: aññasmiṁ tapanīye aññaṁ tapatī’’ti āha. Taṁ sutvā brāhmaṇo kupito, ‘‘bho, muṇḍaka,
atk-s0508a12:366_5: kiṁ aññaṁ tapanīya’’nti āha. Thero tassa –
atk-s0508a12:367: ‘‘Kopo ca issā paraheṭhanā ca, māno ca sārambhamado pamādo;
atk-s0508a12:368: Taṇhā avijjā bhavasaṅgatī ca, te tappanīyā na hi rūpakhandho’’ti. –
atk-s0508a12:369_0: Gāthāya dhammaṁ desesi. Taṁ sutvā so brāhmaṇo tasmiṁ titthiyārāme sabbe aññatitthiyā
atk-s0508a12:369_1: ca therassa santike pabbajiṁsu. Thero tehi saddhiṁ sāvatthiṁ gantvā bhagavantaṁ vanditvā
atk-s0508a12:369_2: katipāhaṁ tattha vasitvā attano jātibhūmiṁyeva gato dassanatthaṁ upagatesu ñātakesu
atk-s0508a12:371: ‘‘Ye kho te veṭhamissena, nānattena ca kammunā;
atk-s0508a12:373: Tepi tattheva kīranti, na hi kammaṁ panassati.
atk-s0508a12:375: ‘‘Yaṁ karoti naro kammaṁ, kalyāṇaṁ yadi pāpakaṁ;
atk-s0508a12:376: Tassa tasseva dāyādo, yaṁ yaṁ kammaṁ pakubbatī’’ti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:377_0: Tattha yeti aniyamuddeso. Teti aniyamato eva paṭiniddeso. Padadvayassāpi ‘‘janā’’ti
atk-s0508a12:377_1: iminā sambandho. Khoti nipātamattaṁ. Veṭhamissenāti varattakhaṇḍādinā sīsādīsu veṭhadānena.
atk-s0508a12:377_2: ‘‘Vedhamissenā’’tipi pāḷi, so evattho. Nānattena ca kammunāti hananaghātanahatthapādādicchedanena
atk-s0508a12:377_3: khuddakaseḷadānādinā ca nānāvidhena parūpaghātakammena. Manusseti nidassanamattaṁ,
atk-s0508a12:377_4: tasmā ye keci satteti adhippāyo. Uparundhantīti vibādhenti. Pharusūpakkamāti dāruṇapayogā,
atk-s0508a12:377_5: kurūrakammantāti attho. Janāti sattā. Tepi tattheva kīrantīti te vuttappakārā puggalā
atk-s0508a12:377_6: yāhi kammakāraṇāhi aññe bādhiṁsu. Tattheva tāsuyeva kāraṇāsu sayampi kīranti pakkhipīyanti,
atk-s0508a12:377_7: tathārūpaṁyeva dukkhaṁ anubhavantīti attho. ‘‘Tatheva kīrantī’’ti ca pāṭho, yathā
atk-s0508a12:377_8: sayaṁ aññesaṁ dukkhaṁ akaṁsu, tatheva aññehi karīyanti, dukkhaṁ pāpīyantīti attho,
atk-s0508a12:377_9: kasmā? Na hi kammaṁ panassati kammañhi ekantaṁ upacitaṁ vipākaṁ adatvā na vigacchati,
atk-s0508a12:378_0: Idāni ‘‘na hi kammaṁ panassatī’’ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṁ vibhajitvā sattānaṁ kammassakataṁ
atk-s0508a12:378_1: vibhāvetuṁ ‘‘yaṁ karotī’’ti gāthaṁ abhāsi. Tassattho yaṁ kammaṁ kalyāṇaṁ kusalaṁ,
atk-s0508a12:378_2: yadi vā pāpakaṁ akusalaṁ satto karoti, karonto ca tattha yaṁ kammaṁ yathā phaladānasamatthaṁ
atk-s0508a12:378_3: hoti, tathā pakubbati upacinoti. Tassa tasseva dāyādoti tassa tasseva kammaphalassa
atk-s0508a12:378_4: gaṇhanato tena tena kammena dātabbavipākassa bhāgī hotīti attho. Tenāha bhagavā –
atk-s0508a12:378_5: ‘‘kammassakā, māṇava, sattā kammadāyādā’’tiādi (ma. ni. 3.289). Imā gāthā sutvā therassa
atk-s0508a12:381_0: Accayantiahorattāti āyasmato heraññakānittherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṁ kira padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a12:381_1: bhagavato kāle haṁsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto paresaṁ bhatako
atk-s0508a12:381_2: hutvā jīvanto ekadivasaṁ sujātassa nāma satthusāvakassa paṁsukūlaṁ pariyesantassa
atk-s0508a12:381_3: upaḍḍhadussaṁ pariccaji. So tena puññakammena tāvatiṁsesu nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ
atk-s0508a12:381_4: devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde kosalarañño gāmabhojakassa coravosāsakassa
atk-s0508a12:381_5: putto hutvā nibbatti, heraññakānītissa nāmaṁ ahosi. So vayappatto pitu accayena raññā
atk-s0508a12:381_6: tasmiṁyeva gāmabhojakaṭṭhāne ṭhapito jetavanapaṭiggahaṇe buddhānubhāvaṁ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a12:381_7: attano kaniṭṭhassa taṁ ṭhānantaraṁ dāpetvā rājānaṁ āpucchitvā pabbajitvā vipassanaṁ
atk-s0508a12:381_8: paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 2.50.31-40) –
atk-s0508a12:397: Arahattaṁ pana patvā attano kaniṭṭhabhātaraṁ tato kammato nivattetukāmo tasmiṁyeva kamme abhirataṁ disvā taṁ codento –
atk-s0508a12:402: ‘‘Atha pāpāni kammāni, karaṁ bālo na bujjhati;
atk-s0508a12:403: Pacchāssa kaṭukaṁ hoti, vipāko hissa pāpako’’ti. –
atk-s0508a12:405_0: Tattha accayantīti atikkamanti, lahuṁ lahuṁ apagacchantīti attho. Ahorattāti rattindivā.
atk-s0508a12:405_1: Jīvitaṁ uparujjhatīti jīvitindriyañca khaṇikanirodhavasena nirujjhati. Vuttañhi ‘‘khaṇe
atk-s0508a12:405_2: khaṇe, tvaṁ bhikkhu, jāyasi ca jiyyasi ca miyyasi ca cavasi ca upapajjasi cā’’ti.
atk-s0508a12:405_3: Āyu khīyati maccānanti maritabbasabhāvattā maccāti laddhanāmānaṁ imesaṁ sattānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:405_4: āyu ‘‘yo ciraṁ jīvati, so vassasataṁ appaṁ vā bhiyyo’’ti (dī. ni. 2.91; saṁ. ni.
atk-s0508a12:405_5: 2.143; a. ni. 7.74) evaṁ paricchinnakālaparamāyu khīyati khayañca sambhedañca gacchati,
atk-s0508a12:405_6: yathā kiṁ? Kunnadīnaṁva odakaṁ yathā nāma kunnadīnaṁ pabbateyyānaṁ khuddakanadīnaṁ
atk-s0508a12:405_7: udakaṁ ciraṁ na tiṭṭhati, lahutaraṁ khīyati, āgatamattaṁyeva vigacchati, evaṁ sattānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:405_8: āyu lahutaraṁ khīyati khayaṁ gacchati. Ettha ca udakameva ‘‘odaka’’nti vuttaṁ, yathā manoyeva mānasanti.
atk-s0508a12:406_0: Athapāpāni kammāni, karaṁ bālo na bujjhatīti evaṁ saṁsāre aniccepi samāne bālo lobhavasena
atk-s0508a12:406_1: vā kodhavasena vā pāpāni kammāni karoti, karontopi na bujjhati, pāpaṁ karonto ca
atk-s0508a12:406_2: ‘‘pāpaṁ karomī’’ti abujjhanako nāma natthi, ‘‘imassa kammassa evarūpo dukkho vipāko’’ti
atk-s0508a12:406_3: pana ajānanato ‘‘na bujjhatī’’ti vuttaṁ. Pacchāssa kaṭukaṁ hotīti yadipi pāpassa
atk-s0508a12:406_4: kammassa āyūhanakkhaṇe ‘‘imassa kammassa evarūpo vipāko’’ti na bujjhati, tato pacchā
atk-s0508a12:406_5: pana nirayādīsu nibbattassa assa bālassa kaṭukaṁ aniṭṭhaṁ dukkhameva hoti. Vipāko
atk-s0508a12:406_6: hissa pāpako yasmā assa pāpakammassa nāma vipāko pāpako nihīno aniṭṭho evāti. Imaṁ
atk-s0508a12:406_7: pana ovādaṁ sutvā therassa kaniṭṭhabhātā rājānaṁ āpucchitvā pabbajitvā nacirasseva
atk-s0508a12:409_0: Parittaṁdārunti āyasmato somamittattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a12:409_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a12:409_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto buddhaguṇe sutvā pasannamānaso ekadivasaṁ kiṁsukarukkhaṁ
atk-s0508a12:409_3: pupphitaṁ disvā pupphāni gahetvā satthāraṁ uddissa ākāse khipitvā pūjesi. So tena
atk-s0508a12:409_4: puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde bārāṇasiyaṁ brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0508a12:409_5: nibbattitvā somamittoti laddhanāmo tiṇṇaṁ vedānaṁ pāragū hutvā vimalena nāma therena
atk-s0508a12:409_6: kataparicayattā abhiṇhaṁ tassa santikaṁ gacchanto dhammaṁ sutvā sāsane laddhappasādo
atk-s0508a12:409_7: pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado vattapaṭivattaṁ pūrento vicarati. Vimalatthero pana kusīto
atk-s0508a12:409_8: middhabahulo rattindivaṁ vītināmeti. Somamitto ‘‘kusītaṁ nāma nissāya ko guṇo’’ti
atk-s0508a12:409_9: taṁ pahāya mahākassapattheraṁ upasaṅkamitvā tassa ovāde ṭhatvā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0508a12:409_10: nacirasseva arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 2.50.25-30) –
atk-s0508a12:418: ‘‘Svāgataṁ vata me āsi, mama buddhassa santike;
atk-s0508a12:419: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṁ buddhassa sāsana’’nti.
atk-s0508a12:420: Arahattaṁ pana patvā vimalattheraṁ ovādena tajjento –
atk-s0508a12:427: Niccaṁ āraddhavīriyehi, paṇḍitehi sahāvase’’ti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:428_0: Tattha parittaṁ dārumāruyha, yathā sīde mahaṇṇaveti pesalopi kulaputto kusītaṁ alasapuggalaṁ
atk-s0508a12:428_1: nissāya sīdati saṁsāre patati, na tassa pāraṁ nibbānaṁ gacchati. Yasmā etadevaṁ,
atk-s0508a12:428_2: tasmā taṁ adhikusaladhammavasena sīsaṁ anukkhipitvā kucchitaṁ sīdanato kusītaṁ vīriyārambhābhāvato
atk-s0508a12:428_3: hīnavīriyaṁ puggalaṁ sabbathā vajjeyya, na tassa diṭṭhānugatiṁ āpajjeyyāti attho.
atk-s0508a12:429_0: Evaṁ puggalādhiṭṭhānāya gāthāya kosajje ādīnavaṁ dassetvā idāni vīriyārambhe ānisaṁse
atk-s0508a12:429_1: dassetuṁ ‘‘pavivittehī’’tiādi vuttaṁ. Tassattho – ye pana kāyavivekasambhavena pavivittā,
atk-s0508a12:429_2: tato eva kilesehi ārakattā ariyā, nibbānaṁ patipesitattatāya pahitattā ārammaṇūpanijjhānavasena
atk-s0508a12:429_3: lakkhaṇūpanijjhānavasena ca jhāyino, sabbakālaṁ paggahitavīriyatāya āraddhavīriyā,
atk-s0508a12:429_4: lokiyalokuttarabhedāya paññāya samannāgatattā paṇḍitā, tehiyeva saha āvaseyya sadatthaṁ
atk-s0508a12:429_5: nipphādetukāmo saṁvaseyyāti. Taṁ sutvā vimalatthero saṁviggamānaso vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0508a12:432_0: Jano janamhi sambaddhoti āyasmato sabbamittattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a12:432_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito dvānavute kappe tissassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a12:432_2: kāle nesādakule nibbattitvā vanacāriko hutvā vane mige vadhitvā maṁsaṁ khādanto jīvati.
atk-s0508a12:432_3: Athassa bhagavā anuggaṇhanatthaṁ vasanaṭṭhānasamīpe tīṇi padacetiyāni dassetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0508a12:432_4: So atītakāle sammāsambuddhesu kataparicayattā cakkaṅkitāni disvā pasannamānaso koraṇḍapupphehi
atk-s0508a12:432_5: pūjaṁ katvā tena puññakammena tāvatiṁsabhavane nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ sugatīsuyeva
atk-s0508a12:432_6: saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthinagare brāhmaṇakule nibbatti, sabbamittotissa
atk-s0508a12:432_7: nāmaṁ ahosi. So viññutaṁ patto jetavanapaṭiggahaṇe buddhānubhāvaṁ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a12:432_8: pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā araññe viharanto vassaṁ upagantvā vuṭṭhavasso bhagavantaṁ
atk-s0508a12:432_9: vandituṁ sāvatthiṁ gacchanto antarāmagge māgavikehi oḍḍite pāse migapotakaṁ baddhaṁ
atk-s0508a12:432_10: addasa. Mātā panassa migī pāsaṁ appaviṭṭhāpi puttasinehena dūraṁ na gacchati, maraṇabhayena
atk-s0508a12:432_11: pāsasamīpampi na upagacchati migapotako ca bhīto ito cito ca parivattento karuṇaṁ
atk-s0508a12:432_12: vilapati, taṁ disvā thero , ‘‘aho sattānaṁ snehahetukaṁ dukkha’’nti gacchanto tato
atk-s0508a12:432_13: paraṁ sambahule core ekaṁ purisaṁ jīvagāhaṁ gahetvā palālaveṇiyā sarīraṁ veṭhetvā
atk-s0508a12:432_14: jhāpente, tañca mahāviravaṁ viravantaṁ disvā tadubhayaṁ nissāya sañjātasaṁvego tesaṁ
atk-s0508a12:435: Jano janena heṭhīyati, heṭheti ca jano janaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:437: ‘‘Ko hi tassa janenattho, janena janitena vā;
atk-s0508a12:438: Janaṁ ohāya gacchaṁ taṁ, heṭhayitvā bahuṁ jana’’nti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:439_0: Tattha janoti andhabālajano. Janamhīti aññe jane. Sambaddhoti taṇhābandhanena baddho.
atk-s0508a12:439_1: ‘‘Ayaṁ me putto, mātā’’tiādinā paṭibaddho. Ayameva vā pāṭho, ‘‘ime maṁ posenti, ahaṁ
atk-s0508a12:439_2: ime nissāya jīvāmī’’ti paṭibaddhacittoti attho. Janamevassito janoti ‘‘ayaṁ me putto,
atk-s0508a12:439_3: dhītā’’tiādinā aññameva janaṁ añño jano assito taṇhāya allīno pariggayha ṭhito. Jano
atk-s0508a12:439_4: janena heṭhīyati, heṭheti ca jano jananti kammassakatāya yathābhūtāvabodhassa ca
atk-s0508a12:439_5: abhāvato ajjhupekkhanaṁ akatvā lobhavasena yathā jano janaṁ assito, evaṁ dosavasena
atk-s0508a12:439_6: jano janena heṭhīyati vibādhīyati. ‘‘Tayidaṁ mayhaṁva upari heṭhanaphalavasena paripatissatī’’ti
atk-s0508a12:440_0: Ko hi tassa janenatthoti tassa aññajanassa aññena janena taṇhāvasena assitena dosavasena
atk-s0508a12:440_1: heṭhitena vā ko attho. Janena janitena vāti mātāpitā hutvā tena aññena janena janitena
atk-s0508a12:440_2: vā ko attho. Janaṁ ohāya gacchaṁ taṁ, heṭhayitvā bahuṁ jananti yasmā saṁsāre carato
atk-s0508a12:440_3: janassa ayamevānurūpā paṭipatti, tasmā taṁ janaṁ, tassa ca bādhikā yā sā taṇhā ca,
atk-s0508a12:440_4: yo ca so doso eva bahuṁ janaṁ bādhayitvā ṭhito, tañca ohāya sabbaso pahāya pariccajitvā
atk-s0508a12:440_5: gacchaṁ, tehi anupaddutaṁ ṭhānaṁ gaccheyyaṁ pāpuṇeyyanti attho. Evaṁ pana vatvā thero
atk-s0508a12:440_6: tāvadeva vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā arahattamapāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 2.50.15-24) –
atk-s0508a12:442: Pasumārena jīvāmi, kusalaṁ me na vijjati.
atk-s0508a12:446: Haṭṭho haṭṭhena cittena, pade cittaṁ pasādayiṁ.
atk-s0508a12:456: Te pana corā therassa santike dhammaṁ sutvā saṁvegajātā pabbajitvā dhammānudhammaṁ paṭipajjiṁsūti.
atk-s0508a12:459_0: Kāḷīitthīti āyasmato mahākāḷattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro
atk-s0508a12:459_1: tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito ekanavute kappe kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ
atk-s0508a12:459_2: patto kenacideva karaṇīyena araññaṁ gato tattha aññatarassa rukkhassa sākhāya olambamānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:459_3: paṁsukūlacīvaraṁ disvā ‘‘ariyaddhajo olambatī’’ti pasannacitto kiṅkaṇipupphāni gahetvā
atk-s0508a12:459_4: paṁsukūlaṁ pūjesi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a12:459_5: setabyanagare satthavāhakule nibbattitvā mahākāḷoti laddhanāmo viññutaṁ patvā gharāvāsaṁ
atk-s0508a12:459_6: vasanto pañcahi sakaṭasatehi bhaṇḍaṁ gahetvā vāṇijjavasena sāvatthiṁ gato ekamantaṁ
atk-s0508a12:459_7: sakaṭasatthaṁ nivesetvā addhānaparissamaṁ vinodetvā attano parisāya saddhiṁ nisinno
atk-s0508a12:459_8: sāyanhasamayaṁ gandhamālādihatthe upāsake jetavanaṁ gacchante disvā sayampi tehi
atk-s0508a12:459_9: saddhiṁ vihāraṁ gantvā satthu santike dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā sosānikaṅgaṁ
atk-s0508a12:459_10: adhiṭṭhāya susāne vasati. Athekadivasaṁ kāḷī nāma ekā itthī chavaḍāhikā therassa
atk-s0508a12:459_11: kammaṭṭhānatthāya aciramatasarīraṁ ubho satthī bhinditvā ubho ca bāhū bhinditvā sīsañca
atk-s0508a12:459_12: dadhithālakaṁ viya bhinditvā sabbaṁ aṅgapaccaṅgaṁ sambandhameva katvā therassa oloketuṁ
atk-s0508a12:459_13: yogyaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Thero taṁ disvā attānaṁ ovadanto –
atk-s0508a12:461: ‘‘Kāḷī itthī brahatī dhaṅkarūpā, satthiñca bhetvā aparañca satthiṁ;
atk-s0508a12:462: Bāhañca bhetvā aparañca bāhaṁ, sīsañca bhetvā dadhithālakaṁva;
atk-s0508a12:465: ‘‘Yo ve avidvā upadhiṁ karoti, punappunaṁ dukkhamupeti mando;
atk-s0508a12:466: Tasmā pajānaṁ upadhiṁ na kayirā, māhaṁ puna bhinnasiro sayissa’’nti. –
atk-s0508a12:468_0: Tattha kāḷīti tassā nāmaṁ, kāḷavaṇṇattā vā evaṁ vuttaṁ. Brahatīti mahāsarīrā ārohapariṇāhavatī.
atk-s0508a12:468_1: Dhaṅkarūpāti kāḷavaṇṇattā eva kākasadisarūpā. Satthiñca bhetvāti matasarīrassa satthiṁ
atk-s0508a12:468_2: jaṇṇubhedanena bhañjitvā. Aparañca satthinti itarañca satthiṁ bhañjitvā. Bāhañca
atk-s0508a12:468_3: bhetvāti bāhaṭṭhiñca aggabāhaṭṭhāneyeva bhañjitvā. Sīsañca bhetvā dadhithālakaṁvāti
atk-s0508a12:468_4: matasarīrassa sīsaṁ bhinditvā bhinnattā eva leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi paggharantaṁ dadhithālakaṁ
atk-s0508a12:468_5: viya, paggharantaṁ matthaluṅgaṁ katvāti attho. Esā nisinnā abhisandahitvāti chinnabhinnāvayavaṁ
atk-s0508a12:468_6: matasarīraṁ te avayave yathāṭhāneyeva ṭhapanena sandahitvā sahitaṁ katvā maṁsāpaṇaṁ
atk-s0508a12:469_0: Yo ve avidvā upadhiṁ karotīti yo imāya upaṭṭhāpitaṁ kammaṭṭhānaṁ disvāpi avidvā akusalo
atk-s0508a12:469_1: kammaṭṭhānaṁ chaḍḍetvā ayonisomanasikārena kilesūpadhiṁ uppādeti, so mando mandapañño
atk-s0508a12:469_2: saṁsārassa anativattanato punappunaṁ aparāparaṁ nirayādīsu dukkhaṁ upeti. Tasmā pajānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:469_3: upadhiṁ na kayirāti tasmāti yasmā cetadevaṁ, tasmā. Pajānaṁ upadhinti ‘‘idha yaṁ
atk-s0508a12:469_4: dukkhaṁ sambhotī’’ti pajānanto yoniso manasikaronto kilesūpadhiṁ na kayirā na uppādeyya.
atk-s0508a12:469_5: Kasmā? Māhaṁ puna bhinnasiro sayissanti yathayidaṁ matasarīraṁ bhinnasarīraṁ sayati,
atk-s0508a12:469_6: evaṁ kilesūpadhīhi saṁsāre punappunaṁ uppattiyā kaṭasivaḍḍhako hutvā bhinnasiro ahaṁ
atk-s0508a12:469_7: mā sayissanti. Evaṁ vadanto eva thero vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena
atk-s0508a12:481_0: Bahūsapatte labhatīti āyasmato tissattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a12:481_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ puññaṁ upacinanto piyadassissa
atk-s0508a12:481_2: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto sippesu nipphattiṁ gantvā
atk-s0508a12:481_3: kāmesu ādīnavaṁ disvā gharāvāsaṁ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā araññāyatane sālavane
atk-s0508a12:481_4: assamaṁ kāretvā vasati. Bhagavā tassa anuggaṇhanatthaṁ assamassa avidūre sālavane
atk-s0508a12:481_5: nirodhaṁ samāpajjitvā nisīdi. So assamato nikkhamitvā phalāphalatthāya gacchanto
atk-s0508a12:481_6: bhagavantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso cattāro daṇḍe ṭhapetvā bhagavato upari pupphitāhi
atk-s0508a12:481_7: sālasākhāhi sākhāmaṇḍapaṁ katvā sattāhaṁ navanavehi sālapupphehi bhagavantaṁ pūjento
atk-s0508a12:481_8: aṭṭhāsi buddhārammaṇaṁ pītiṁ avijahanto. Satthā sattāhassa accayena nirodhato vuṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0508a12:481_9: bhikkhusaṅghaṁ cintesi. Tāvadeva satasahassamattā khīṇāsavā satthāraṁ parivāresuṁ.
atk-s0508a12:481_10: Bhagavā tassa bhāviniṁ sampattiṁ vibhāvento anumodanaṁ vatvā pakkāmi. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a12:481_11: devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṁ sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde rājagahe
atk-s0508a12:481_12: brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā tissoti laddhanāmo vayappatto tiṇṇaṁ vedānaṁ pāragū hutvā
atk-s0508a12:481_13: pañcamattāni māṇavakasatāni mante vācento lābhaggayasaggappatto hutvā satthu rājagahagamane
atk-s0508a12:481_14: buddhānubhāvaṁ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva
atk-s0508a12:481_15: arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 2.49.190-220) –
atk-s0508a12:502: ‘‘Ko nu kho bhagavā hetu, sitakammassa satthuno;
atk-s0508a12:505: Tassa kammaṁ saritvāna, sitaṁ pātukariṁ ahaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:507: Devaloke manusse vā, okāsova na sammati.
atk-s0508a12:521: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a12:539_0: So arahattaṁ pana patvā visesato lābhaggayasaggappatto ahosi. Tattha keci puthujjanabhikkhū
atk-s0508a12:539_1: therassa lābhasakkāraṁ disvā bālabhāvena asahanākāraṁ pavedesuṁ. Thero taṁ ñatvā
atk-s0508a12:539_2: lābhasakkāre ādīnavaṁ tattha attano alaggabhāvañca pakāsento –
atk-s0508a12:542: Lābhī annassa pānassa, vatthassa sayanassa ca.
atk-s0508a12:547_0: Tassattho – sikhampi asesetvā muṇḍitakesatāya muṇḍo, chinditvā saṅghāṭitakāsāvadhāritāya
atk-s0508a12:547_1: saṅghāṭipāruto, evaṁ vevaṇṇiyaṁ ajjhupagato parāyattavuttiko pabbajito sace annapānādīnaṁ
atk-s0508a12:547_2: lābhī hoti, sopi bahū sapatte labhati, tassa usūyantā bahū sambhavanti. Tasmā etaṁ
atk-s0508a12:547_3: evarūpaṁ lābhasakkāresumahabbhayaṁ vipulabhayaṁ ādīnavaṁ dosaṁ viditvā appicchataṁ
atk-s0508a12:547_4: santosañca hadaye ṭhapetvā anavajjuppādassāpi uppannassa lābhassa parivajjanena appalābho,
atk-s0508a12:547_5: tato eva tattha taṇhāvassutābhāvena anavassuto, saṁsāre bhayassa ikkhanato bhinnakilesatāya
atk-s0508a12:547_6: vā bhikkhu santuṭṭhiṭṭhānīyassa satisampajaññassa vasena sato hutvā paribbaje careyya
atk-s0508a12:547_7: vihareyyāti. Taṁ sutvā te bhikkhū tāvadeva theraṁ khamāpesuṁ.
atk-s0508a12:550_0: Pācīnavaṁsadāyamhītiādikā āyasmato kimilattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Tassa pubbayogo
atk-s0508a12:550_1: saṁveguppatti pabbajjā ca ekakanipāte ‘‘abhisatto’’ti gāthāya saṁvaṇṇanāyaṁ vuttāyeva.
atk-s0508a12:550_2: Tāya ca gāthāya therena attano visesādhigamassa kāraṇaṁ dassitaṁ. Idha pana adhigatavisesassa
atk-s0508a12:550_3: attano āyasmatā ca anuruddhena āyasmatā ca nandiyena saha samaggavāso dassitoti veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:550_4: Samaggavāsaṁ pana vasantā te yathā ca vasiṁsu, taṁ dassento –
atk-s0508a12:556: Ramanti dhammaratiyā, hitvāna lokiyaṁ rati’’nti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:557_0: Tattha pācīnavaṁsadāyamhīti pācīnavaṁsanāmake rakkhitagopite sahaparicchede vane.
atk-s0508a12:557_1: Tañhi vanaṁ gāmassa pācīnadisāyaṁ ṭhitattā vaṁsagumbaparikkhittattā ca ‘‘pācīnavaṁsadāyo’’ti
atk-s0508a12:557_2: vutto, vaṁsavanabhāvena vāti. Sakyaputtāti anuruddhattherādayo sakyarājakumārā. Sahāyakāti
atk-s0508a12:557_4: Pahāyānappake bhogeti uḷārena puññānubhāvena adhigate kulaparamparāgate ca mahante
atk-s0508a12:557_5: bhogakkhandhe chaḍḍetvā. ‘‘Sahāyānappake’’tipi pāḷi. Uñche pattāgate ratāti uñchācariyāya
atk-s0508a12:557_6: ābhatattā uñche patte āgatattā pattāgate pattapariyāpanne ratā abhiratā, saṅghabhattādiatirekalābhaṁ
atk-s0508a12:557_7: paṭikkhipitvā jaṅghabalaṁ nissāya bhikkhācariyāya laddhena missakabhatteneva santuṭṭhāti attho.
atk-s0508a12:558_0: Āraddhavīriyāti uttamatthassa adhigamāya āditova pageva sampāditavīriyā. Pahitattāti
atk-s0508a12:558_1: ninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena kālena kālaṁ samāpajjanena ca nibbānaṁ patipesitacittā.
atk-s0508a12:558_3: asithilaparakkamā. Ramanti dhammaratiyā, hitvāna lokiyaṁ ratinti loke viditatāya
atk-s0508a12:558_4: lokapariyāpannatāya ca lokiyaṁ rūpārammaṇādiratiṁ pahāya maggapaññāya pajahitvā lokuttaradhammaratiyā
atk-s0508a12:561_0: Ayoniso manasikārāti āyasmato nandattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṁ kira padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a12:561_1: bhagavato kāle haṁsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto bhagavato santike
atk-s0508a12:561_2: dhammaṁ suṇanto satthāraṁ ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ indriyesu guttadvārānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṁ
atk-s0508a12:561_3: disvā sayampi taṁ ṭhānantaraṁ patthento bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca pūjāsakkārabahulaṁ
atk-s0508a12:561_4: mahādānaṁ pavattetvā, ‘‘ahampi anāgate tumhādisassa buddhassa evarūpo sāvako bhaveyya’’nti
atk-s0508a12:561_5: paṇidhānaṁ katvā tato paṭṭhāya devamanussesu saṁsaranto atthadassissa bhagavato kāle
atk-s0508a12:561_6: vinatāya nāma nadiyā mahanto kacchapo hutvā nibbatto ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ nadiyā
atk-s0508a12:561_7: pāraṁ gantuṁ tīre ṭhitaṁ disvā sayaṁ bhagavantaṁ tāretukāmo satthu pādamūle nipajji
atk-s0508a12:561_8: . Satthā tassa ajjhāsayaṁ oloketvā piṭṭhiṁ abhiruhi. So haṭṭhatuṭṭho vegena sotaṁ
atk-s0508a12:561_9: chindanto sīghataraṁ paratīrameva pāpesi. Bhagavā tassa anumodanaṁ vadanto bhāviniṁ
atk-s0508a12:562_0: So tena puññakammena sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde kapilavatthusmiṁ
atk-s0508a12:562_1: suddhodanamahārājassa putto hutvā mahāpajāpatiyā gotamiyā kucchimhi nibbatti. Tassa
atk-s0508a12:562_2: nāmaggahaṇadivase ñātisaṅghaṁ nandento jātoti nandotveva nāmaṁ akaṁsu. Tassa vayappattakāle
atk-s0508a12:562_3: satthā pavattavaradhammacakko lokānuggahaṁ karonto kapilavatthuṁ gantvā ñātisamāgame
atk-s0508a12:562_4: pokkharavassaṁ aṭṭhuppattiṁ katvā vessantarajātakaṁ (jā. 2.22.1655 ādayo) kathetvā
atk-s0508a12:562_5: dutiyadivase piṇḍāya paviṭṭho ‘‘uttiṭṭhe nappamajjeyyā’’ti (dha. pa. 168) gāthāya
atk-s0508a12:562_6: pitaraṁ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā nivesanaṁ gantvā ‘‘dhammaṁ care sucarita’’nti
atk-s0508a12:562_7: (dha. pa. 169) gāthāya mahāpajāpatiṁ sotāpattiphale rājānaṁ sakadāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0508a12:562_9: piṇḍāya pavisitvā nandakumārassa hatthe pattaṁ datvā maṅgalaṁ vatvā tassa hatthato
atk-s0508a12:562_10: pattaṁ agahetvāva vihāraṁ gato taṁ pattahatthaṁ vihāraṁ āgataṁ anicchamānaṁyeva pabbājetvā
atk-s0508a12:562_11: tathā pabbajitattāyeva anabhiratiyā pīḷitaṁ ñatvā upāyena tassa taṁ anabhiratiṁ vinodesi.
atk-s0508a12:562_12: So yoniso paṭisaṅkhāya vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena
atk-s0508a12:572: Sukhaṁ me tādisaṁ natthi, phuṭṭhe pādatale yathā.
atk-s0508a12:576: Ayañca kacchapo rājā, tāresi mama paññavā.
atk-s0508a12:590_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā vimuttisukhaṁ anubhavanto ‘‘aho satthu upāyakosallaṁ, yenāhaṁ
atk-s0508a12:590_1: bhavapaṅkato uddharitvā nibbānathale patiṭṭhāpito’’ti attano pahīnasaṁkilesaṁ paṭiladdhañca
atk-s0508a12:596: Yoniso paṭipajjitvā, bhave cittaṁ udabbahi’’nti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:597_0: Tattha ayoniso manasikārāti anupāyamanasikārato asubhaṁ kāyaṁ subhato manasi karitvā
atk-s0508a12:597_1: subhato manasikārahetu, asubhaṁ kāyaṁ subhasaññāyāti attho. Maṇḍananti hatthūpagādiābharaṇehi
atk-s0508a12:597_2: ceva mālāgandhādīhi ca attabhāvassa alaṅkaraṇaṁ. Anuyuñjisanti anuyuñjiṁ, sarīrassa
atk-s0508a12:597_3: vibhūsanappasuto ahosinti attho. Uddhatoti jātigottarūpayobbanamadādīhi uddhato avūpasantacitto.
atk-s0508a12:597_4: Capaloti vanamakkaṭo viya anavaṭṭhitacittatāya lolo, kāyamaṇḍanavatthamaṇḍanādicāpalye
atk-s0508a12:597_5: yuttatāya vā capalo ca. Āsinti ahosiṁ. Kāmarāgenāti vatthukāmesu chandarāgena aṭṭito
atk-s0508a12:598_0: Upāyakusalenāti vineyyānaṁ damanūpāyacchekena kovidena buddhena bhagavatā hetubhūtena.
atk-s0508a12:598_1: Hetuatthe hi etaṁ karaṇavacanaṁ. Paluṭṭhamakkaṭīdevaccharādassanena hi upakkitavādacodanāya
atk-s0508a12:598_2: attano kāmarāgāpanayanaṁ sandhāya vadati. Bhagavā hi āyasmantaṁ nandattheraṁ paṭhamaṁ
atk-s0508a12:598_3: janapadakalyāṇiṁ upādāya ‘‘yathāyaṁ makkaṭī, evaṁ kakuṭapādiniyo upādāya janapadakalyāṇī’’ti
atk-s0508a12:598_4: mahatiyā āṇiyā khuddakaṁ āṇiṁ nīharanto chaḍḍako viya, sinehapānena sarīraṁ kiledetvā
atk-s0508a12:598_5: vamanavirecanehi dosaṁ nīharanto bhisakko viya ca kakuṭapādinidassanena janapadakalyāṇiyaṁ
atk-s0508a12:598_6: virattacittaṁ kāretvā puna upakkitavādena kakuṭapādinīsupi cittaṁ virājetvā sammadeva
atk-s0508a12:598_7: samathavipassanānuyogena ariyamagge patiṭṭhāpesi. Tena vuttaṁ ‘‘yoniso paṭipajjitvā,
atk-s0508a12:598_8: bhave cittaṁ udabbahi’’nti. Upāyena ñāyena sammadeva samathavipassanāya visuddhipaṭipadaṁ
atk-s0508a12:598_9: paṭipajjitvā bhave saṁsārapaṅke nimuggañca me cittaṁ ariyamaggena hatthena uttāriṁ,
atk-s0508a12:599_0: Imaṁ udānaṁ udānetvā thero punadivase bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā evamāha – ‘‘yaṁ me,
atk-s0508a12:599_1: bhante, bhagavā pāṭibhogo pañcannaṁ accharāsatānaṁ paṭilābhāya kakuṭapādānaṁ, muñcāmahaṁ,
atk-s0508a12:599_2: bhante, bhagavantaṁ etasmā paṭissavā’’ti (udā. 22). Bhagavāpi, ‘‘yadeva kho te, nanda,
atk-s0508a12:599_3: anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuttaṁ, athāhaṁ mutto etasmā paṭissavā’’ti (udā. 22) āha.
atk-s0508a12:599_4: Athassa bhagavā savisesaṁ indriyesu guttadvārataṁ ñatvā taṁ guṇaṁ vibhāvento, ‘‘etadaggaṁ,
atk-s0508a12:599_5: bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ indriyesu guttadvārānaṁ yadidaṁ nando’’ti (a.
atk-s0508a12:599_6: ni. 1.219, 230) indriyesu guttadvārabhāvena aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Thero hi ‘‘yamevāhaṁ
atk-s0508a12:599_7: indriyānaṁ asaṁvaraṁ nissāya imaṁ vippakāraṁ patto, tamevāhaṁ suṭṭhu niggahessāmī’’ti
atk-s0508a12:599_8: ussāhajāto balavahirottappo tattha ca katādhikārattā indriyasaṁvare ukkaṁsapāramiṁ agamāsīti.
atk-s0508a12:602_0: Pare ca naṁ pasaṁsantīti āyasmato sirimattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a12:602_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato pāramiyo
atk-s0508a12:602_2: pūretvā tusitabhavane ṭhitakāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto tiṇṇaṁ vedānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:602_3: pāragū sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānaṁ sakkharappabhedānaṁ itihāsapañcamānaṁ padako veyyākaraṇo
atk-s0508a12:602_4: lokāyatamahāpurisalakkhaṇesu anavayo nekkhammajjhāsayatāya kāme pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṁ
atk-s0508a12:602_5: pabbajitvā caturāsītisahassaparimāṇena tāpasagaṇena parivuto himavantappadese devatābhinimmite
atk-s0508a12:602_6: assame jhānābhiññāyo nibbattetvā vasanto purimabuddhesu katādhikāratāya lakkhaṇamantesu
atk-s0508a12:602_7: āgataniyāmena ca buddhaguṇe anussaritvā atīte buddhe uddissa aññatarasmiṁ nadīnivattane
atk-s0508a12:602_8: pulinacetiyaṁ katvā pūjāsakkārābhirato ahosi. Taṁ disvā tāpasā, ‘‘kaṁ uddissa ayaṁ
atk-s0508a12:602_9: pūjāsakkāro karīyatī’’ti pucchiṁsu. So tesaṁ lakkhaṇamante āharitvā tattha āgatāni
atk-s0508a12:602_10: mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni vibhajitvā tadanusārena attano bale ṭhatvā buddhaguṇe kittesi.
atk-s0508a12:602_11: Taṁ sutvā tepi tāpasā pasannamānasā tato paṭṭhāya sammāsambuddhaṁ uddissa thūpapūjaṁ karontā viharanti.
atk-s0508a12:603_0: Tena ca samayena padumuttarabodhisatto tusitakāyā cavitvā mātukucchiṁ okkanto hoti.
atk-s0508a12:603_1: Carimabhave dvattiṁsa pubbanimittāni pāturahesuṁ , sabbe ca acchariyabbhūtadhammā.
atk-s0508a12:603_2: Tāpaso tāni antevāsikānaṁ dassetvā bhiyyosomattāya sammāsambuddhesu tesaṁ pasādaṁ
atk-s0508a12:603_3: vaḍḍhetvā kālaṁ katvā brahmaloke nibbattitvā tehi attano sarīrassa pūjāya karīyamānāya
atk-s0508a12:603_4: dissamānarūpo āgantvā, ‘‘ahaṁ tumhākaṁ ācariyo brahmaloke nibbatto, tumhe appamattā
atk-s0508a12:603_5: pulinacetiyapūjamanuyuñjatha, bhāvanāya ca yuttappayuttā hothā’’ti vatvā brahmalokameva gato.
atk-s0508a12:604_0: Evaṁ so devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṁ gahapatikule nibbatti,
atk-s0508a12:604_1: tassa jātadivasato paṭṭhāya tasmiṁ kule sirisampattiyā vaḍḍhamānattā sirimātveva
atk-s0508a12:604_2: nāmaṁ akaṁsu. Tassa padasā gamanakāle kaniṭṭhabhātā nibbatti, tassa ‘‘ayaṁ siriṁ
atk-s0508a12:604_3: vaḍḍhento jāto’’ti sirivaḍḍhoti nāmaṁ akaṁsu. Te ubhopi jetavanappaṭiggahaṇe buddhānubhāvaṁ
atk-s0508a12:604_4: disvā paṭiladdhasaddhā pabbajiṁsu. Tesu sirivaḍḍho na tāva uttarimanussadhammassa
atk-s0508a12:604_5: lābhī ahosi, catunnaṁ paccayānaṁ lābhī, gahaṭṭhapabbajitānaṁ sakkato garukato, sirimatthero
atk-s0508a12:604_6: pana pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya tādisena kammacchiddena appalābhī ahosi bahujanāsambhāvito,
atk-s0508a12:604_7: samathavipassanāsu kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne
atk-s0508a12:606: Tattha me caṅkamo āsi, amanussehi māpito.
atk-s0508a12:614: Sabbe sissā samāgantvā, etamatthaṁ pucchiṁsu maṁ.
atk-s0508a12:615: ‘‘Pulinena kato thūpo, yaṁ tvaṁ deva namassasi;
atk-s0508a12:616: Mayampi ñātumicchāma, puṭṭho ācikkha no tuvaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:618: Te kho ahaṁ namassāmi, buddhaseṭṭhe mahāyase.
atk-s0508a12:624: Na tesaṁ jāṇu nadati, sandhisaddo na suyyati.
atk-s0508a12:626: Paṭhamaṁ dakkhiṇaṁ pādaṁ, buddhānaṁ esa dhammatā.
atk-s0508a12:628: Nevukkaṁsenti attānaṁ, no ca vambhenti pāṇinaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:644: Sabbe sissā samāgantvā, āgacchuṁ mama santike.
atk-s0508a12:651: ‘‘Balañca vata me khīṇaṁ, byādhinā paramena taṁ;
atk-s0508a12:658: Ahaṁ ācariyo tumhaṁ, mā socittha sumedhasā.
atk-s0508a12:660: Mā vo pamattā ahuttha, khaṇo vo paṭipādito.
atk-s0508a12:674_0: Chaḷabhiññañhi samānaṁ āyasmantaṁ sirimattheraṁ ‘‘ariyo’’ti ajānantā puthujjanā bhikkhū
atk-s0508a12:674_1: sāmaṇerā ca appalābhitāya lokassa anabhigatabhāvena asambhāventā yaṁkiñci kathetvā
atk-s0508a12:674_2: garahanti. Sirivaḍḍhattheraṁ pana paccayānaṁ lābhibhāvena lokassa sakkatagarukatabhāvato
atk-s0508a12:674_3: sambhāventā pasaṁsanti. Thero ‘‘avaṇṇārahassa nāma vaṇṇabhaṇanaṁ, vaṇṇārahassa ca
atk-s0508a12:674_4: avaṇṇabhaṇanaṁ assa puthujjanabhāvassa doso’’ti puthujjanabhāvañca garahanto –
atk-s0508a12:676: ‘‘Pare ca naṁ pasaṁsanti, attā ce asamāhito;
atk-s0508a12:677: Moghaṁ pare pasaṁsanti, attā hi asamāhito.
atk-s0508a12:679: ‘‘Pare ca naṁ garahanti, attā ce susamāhito;
atk-s0508a12:680: Moghaṁ pare garahanti, attā hi susamāhito’’ti.
atk-s0508a12:682_0: Tattha pareti attato aññe pare nāma, idha pana paṇḍitehi aññe bālā pareti adhippetā.
atk-s0508a12:682_1: Tesañhi ajānitvā apariyogāhetvā bhāsanato garahā viya pasaṁsāpi appamāṇabhūtā. Nanti
atk-s0508a12:682_2: naṁ puggalaṁ. Pasaṁsantīti aviddasubhāvena taṇhāvipannatāya vā, atha vā abhūtaṁyeva
atk-s0508a12:682_3: puggalaṁ ‘‘asuko bhikkhu jhānalābhī, ariyo’’ti vā abhūtaguṇaropanena kittenti abhitthavanti.
atk-s0508a12:682_4: Yo panettha ca-saddo, so attūpanayattho. Tena pare naṁ puggalaṁ pasaṁsanti ca, tañca
atk-s0508a12:682_5: kho tesaṁ pasaṁsanamattaṁ, na pana tasmiṁ pasaṁsāya vatthu atthīti imamatthaṁ dasseti.
atk-s0508a12:682_6: Attā ce asamāhitoti yaṁ puggalaṁ pare pasaṁsanti, so ce sayaṁ asamāhito maggasamādhinā
atk-s0508a12:682_7: phalasamādhinā upacārappanāsamādhimatteneva vā na samāhito, samādhānassa paṭipakkhabhūtānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:682_8: kilesānaṁ appahīnattā vikkhitto vibbhantacitto hoti ceti attho. ‘‘Asamāhito’’ti ca
atk-s0508a12:682_9: etena samādhinimittānaṁ guṇānaṁ abhāvaṁ dasseti. Moghanti bhāvanapuṁsakaniddeso ‘‘visamaṁ
atk-s0508a12:682_10: candimasūriyā parivattantī’’tiādīsu viya. Pare pasaṁsantīti ye taṁ asamāhitaṁ puggalaṁ
atk-s0508a12:682_11: pasaṁsanti, te moghaṁ mudhā amūlakaṁ pasaṁsanti. Kasmā? Attā hi asamāhito yasmā tassa
atk-s0508a12:683_0: Dutiyagāthāyaṁ garahantīti attano aviddasubhāvena dosantarāya vā ariyaṁ jhānalābhiñca
atk-s0508a12:683_1: samānaṁ ‘‘asuko bhikkhu jāgariyaṁ nānuyuñjati antamaso goduhanamattampi kālaṁ kevalaṁ
atk-s0508a12:683_2: kāyadaḷhibahulo niddārāmo bhassārāmo saṅgaṇikārāmo viharatī’’tiādinā appaṭipajjamānatāvibhāvanena
atk-s0508a12:683_3: vā guṇaparidhaṁsanena vā garahanti nindanti, upakkosanti vāti attho. Sesaṁ paṭhamagāthāya
atk-s0508a12:683_4: vuttapariyāyena veditabbaṁ. Evaṁ therena imāhi gāthāhi attano nikkilesabhāve sirivaḍḍhassa
atk-s0508a12:683_5: ca sakilesabhāve pakāsite taṁ sutvā sirivaḍḍho saṁvegajāto vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0508a12:683_6: nacirasseva sadatthaṁ paripūresi, garahakapuggalā ca theraṁ khamāpesuṁ.
atk-s0508a12:688_0: Khandhāmayā pariññātāti āyasmato uttarattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a12:688_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ kusalaṁ upacinanto ito catunavute
atk-s0508a12:688_2: kappe siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto sāsane laddhappasādo
atk-s0508a12:688_3: hutvā upāsakattaṁ paṭivedesi. So satthari parinibbute attano ñātake sannipātetvā
atk-s0508a12:688_4: bahuṁ pūjāsakkāraṁ sambharitvā dhātupūjaṁ akāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0508a12:688_5: saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sākete brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā uttaroti laddhanāmo
atk-s0508a12:688_6: vayappatto kenacideva karaṇīyena sāvatthiṁ gato kaṇḍambamūle kataṁ yamakapāṭihāriyaṁ
atk-s0508a12:688_7: disvā pasīditvā puna kāḷakārāmasuttadesanāya (a. ni. 4.24) abhivaḍḍhamānasaddho pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a12:688_8: satthārā saddhiṁ rājagahaṁ gantvā upasampajjitvā tattheva vasanto vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0508a12:688_9: nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 2.49.106-110) –
atk-s0508a12:694_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā satthari sāvatthiyaṁ viharante buddhupaṭṭhānatthaṁ rājagahato
atk-s0508a12:694_1: sāvatthiṁ upagato bhikkhūhi ‘‘kiṁ, āvuso, pabbajjākiccaṁ tayā matthakaṁ pāpita’’nti
atk-s0508a12:697: Bhāvitā mama bojjhaṅgā, patto me āsavakkhayo.
atk-s0508a12:700: Bhāvayitvāna bojjhaṅge, nibbāyissaṁ anāsavo’’ti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:701_0: Tattha khandhāti pañcupādānakkhandhā. Pariññātāti ‘‘idaṁ dukkhaṁ, na ito bhiyyo’’ti
atk-s0508a12:701_1: paricchijja ñātā bhāvitā. Tena dukkhassa ariyasaccassa pariññābhisamayamāha. Taṇhāti
atk-s0508a12:701_2: tasati paritasatīti taṇhā. Susamūhatāti samugghāṭitā. Etena samudayasaccassa pahānābhisamayaṁ
atk-s0508a12:701_3: vadati. Bhāvitā mama bojjhaṅgāti bodhisaṅkhātāya satiādidhammasāmaggiyā, taṁsamaṅgino
atk-s0508a12:701_5: maggapariyāpannā dhammā mayā bhāvitā uppāditā vaḍḍhitā. Bojjhaṅgaggahaṇeneva cettha
atk-s0508a12:701_6: taṁsahacaritatāya sabbe maggadhammā, sabbe ca bodhipakkhiyadhammā gahitāti daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0508a12:701_7: Eteneva maggasaccassa bhāvanābhisamayaṁ dasseti. Patto me āsavakkhayoti kāmāsavādayo
atk-s0508a12:701_8: āsavā khīyanti etthāti āsavakkhayoti laddhanāmo asaṅkhatadhammo mayā patto adhigato.
atk-s0508a12:701_9: Etena nirodhasaccassa sacchikiriyābhisamayaṁ katheti. Ettāvatā attano saupādisesanibbānasampattiṁ dasseti.
atk-s0508a12:702_0: Idāni pana anupādisesanibbānasampattiṁ dassento ‘‘soha’’ntiādinā dutiyaṁ gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a12:702_1: Tassattho – sohaṁ evaṁ vuttanayena khandhe pariññāya parijānitvā, tathā parijānanto
atk-s0508a12:702_3: punappunaṁ pavattisaṅkhātaṁ jālaṁ etassa atthīti jālinīti laddhanāmaṁ taṇhaṁ abbahitvāna
atk-s0508a12:702_4: mama cittasantānato uddharitvā, tathā naṁ uddharantoyeva vuttappabhede bojjhaṅge
atk-s0508a12:702_5: bhāvayitvāna te bhāvanāpāripūriṁ pāpetvā tato eva anāsavo hutvā ṭhito idāni carimakacittanirodhena
atk-s0508a12:705_0: Panādonāma so rājāti āyasmato bhaddajittherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṁ kira padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a12:705_1: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto brāhmaṇānaṁ vijjāsippesu pāraṁ
atk-s0508a12:705_2: gantvā kāme pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā araññāyatane assamaṁ kāretvā vasanto
atk-s0508a12:705_3: ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ ākāsena gacchantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso añjaliṁ paggayha aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0508a12:705_4: Satthā tassa ajjhāsayaṁ ñatvā ākāsato otari. Otiṇṇassa pana bhagavato madhuñca bhisamuḷālañca
atk-s0508a12:705_5: sappiñca khīrañca upanāmesi, tassa taṁ bhagavā anukampaṁ upādāya paṭiggahetvā anumodanaṁ
atk-s0508a12:705_6: vatvā pakkāmi. So tena puññakammena tusite nibbatto tattha yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā tato
atk-s0508a12:705_7: aparāparaṁ sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto vipassissa bhagavato kāle mahaddhano seṭṭhi hutvā
atk-s0508a12:706_0: Evaṁ bahuṁ kusalaṁ katvā devaloke nibbattitvā tattha yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā tato cavitvā
atk-s0508a12:706_1: manussesu uppanno buddhasuññe loke pañca paccekabuddhasatāni catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0508a12:706_2: tato cuto rājakule nibbattitvā rajjaṁ anusāsanto puttaṁ paccekabodhiṁ adhigantvā
atk-s0508a12:706_3: ṭhitaṁ upaṭṭhahitvā tassa parinibbutassa dhātuyo gahetvā cetiyaṁ katvā pūjesi. Evaṁ
atk-s0508a12:706_4: tattha tattha tāni puññāni katvā imasmiṁ buddhuppāde bhaddiyanagare asītikoṭivibhavassa
atk-s0508a12:706_5: bhaddiyaseṭṭhissa ekaputtako hutvā nibbatti, bhaddajītissa nāmaṁ ahosi. Tassa kira
atk-s0508a12:707_0: Tadā satthā sāvatthiyaṁ vassaṁ vasitvā bhaddajikumāraṁ saṅgaṇhituṁ mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena
atk-s0508a12:707_1: saddhiṁ bhaddiyanagaraṁ gantvā jātiyāvane vasi tassa ñāṇaparipākaṁ āgamayamāno. Sopi
atk-s0508a12:707_2: upari pāsāde nisinno sīhapañjaraṁ vivaritvā olokento bhagavato santike dhammaṁ sotuṁ
atk-s0508a12:707_3: gacchantaṁ mahājanaṁ disvā ‘‘katthāyaṁ mahājano gacchatī’’ti pucchitvā taṁ kāraṇaṁ
atk-s0508a12:707_4: sutvā sayampi mahatā parivārena satthu santikaṁ gantvā dhammaṁ suṇanto sabbābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍitova
atk-s0508a12:707_5: sabbakilese khepetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 2.56.98-116) –
atk-s0508a12:709: Uddharāmi bhisaṁ tattha, ghāsahetu ahaṁ tadā.
atk-s0508a12:715: Madhuṁ bhisehi sahitaṁ, khīraṁ sappiṁ muḷālikaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:725: Bhisaṁ rukkhe laggetvāna, mama dānaṁ anussariṁ.
atk-s0508a12:727: Ākāso abhinādittha, asanī ca phalī tadā.
atk-s0508a12:729: Sohaṁ nisinnako santo, tattha kālaṅkato ahaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:735: Bhoge me ūnatā natthi, bhisadānassidaṁ phalaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:741_0: Arahatte pana tena adhigate satthā bhaddiyaseṭṭhiṁ āmantesi – ‘‘tava putto alaṅkatapaṭiyatto
atk-s0508a12:741_1: dhammaṁ suṇanto arahatte patiṭṭhāsi, tenassa idāneva pabbajituṁ yuttaṁ, no ce pabbajati,
