atk-s0508a12:741_2: parinibbāyissatī’’ti. Seṭṭhi ‘‘na mayhaṁ puttassa daharasseva sato parinibbānena
atk-s0508a12:741_3: kiccaṁ atthi, pabbājetha na’’nti āha. Taṁ satthā pabbājetvā upasampādetvā tattha
atk-s0508a12:741_4: sattāhaṁ vasitvā koṭigāmaṁ pāpuṇi, so ca gāmo gaṅgātīre. Koṭigāmavāsino buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0508a12:741_5: bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṁ pavattesuṁ. Bhaddajitthero satthārā anumodanāya āraddhamattāya
atk-s0508a12:741_6: bahigāmaṁ gantvā ‘‘gaṅgātīre maggasamīpe satthu āgatakāle vuṭṭhahissāmī’’ti samāpattiṁ
atk-s0508a12:741_7: samāpajjitvā nisīdi. Mahātheresu āgacchantesupi avuṭṭhahitvā satthu āgatakāleyeva
atk-s0508a12:741_8: vuṭṭhahi. Puthujjanabhikkhū, ‘‘ayaṁ adhunā pabbajito mahātheresu āgacchantesu mānatthaddho
atk-s0508a12:741_9: hutvā na vuṭṭhāsī’’ti ujjhāyiṁsu. Koṭigāmavāsino satthu bhikkhusaṅghassa ca bahū
atk-s0508a12:741_10: nāvāsaṅghāṭe bandhiṁsu, satthā ‘‘handassa ānubhāvaṁ pakāsemī’’ti nāvāsaṅghāṭe ṭhatvā,
atk-s0508a12:741_11: ‘‘kahaṁ, bhaddajī’’ti pucchi. Bhaddajitthero ‘‘esohaṁ, bhante’’ti satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0508a12:741_12: añjaliṁ katvā aṭṭhāsi. Satthā, ‘‘ehi, bhaddaji, amhehi saddhiṁ ekanāvaṁ abhiruhā’’ti.
atk-s0508a12:741_13: So uppatitvā satthu ṭhitanāvāyaṁ aṭṭhāsi. Satthā gaṅgāmajjhaṁ gatakāle, ‘‘bhaddaji,
atk-s0508a12:741_14: tayā mahāpanādarājakāle ajjhāvuṭṭharatanapāsādo kaha’’nti āha. ‘‘Imasmiṁ ṭhāne nimuggo’’ti.
atk-s0508a12:741_15: ‘‘Tena hi, bhaddaji, sabrahmacārīnaṁ kaṅkhaṁ chindā’’ti. Tasmiṁ khaṇe thero satthāraṁ
atk-s0508a12:741_16: vanditvā iddhibalena gantvā pāsādathūpikaṁ pādaṅgulantarena sannirumbhitvā pañcavīsatiyojanaṁ
atk-s0508a12:741_17: pāsādaṁ gahetvā ākāse uppati, uppatanto ca paññāsa yojanāni pāsādaṁ udakato ukkhipi.
atk-s0508a12:741_18: Athassa purimabhave ñātakā pāsādagatena lobhena macchakacchapamaṇḍūkā hutvā tasmiṁ
atk-s0508a12:741_19: pāsāde uṭṭhahante parivattitvā udake patiṁsu. Satthā te patante disvā ‘‘ñātakā te,
atk-s0508a12:741_20: bhaddaji, kilamantī’’ti āha. Thero satthu vacanena pāsādaṁ vissajjesi. Pāsādo yathāṭhāne
atk-s0508a12:741_21: eva patiṭṭhahi. Satthā pāraṅgato bhikkhūhi ‘‘kadā, bhante, bhaddajittherena ayaṁ
atk-s0508a12:741_22: pāsādo ajjhāvuṭṭho’’ti puṭṭho mahāpanādajātakaṁ (jā. 1.3.40-41) kathetvā mahājanaṁ
atk-s0508a12:741_23: dhammāmataṁ pāyesi. Thero pana attano ajjhāvuṭṭhapubbaṁ suvaṇṇapāsādaṁ dassetvā –
atk-s0508a12:743: ‘‘Panādo nāma so rājā, yassa yūpo suvaṇṇayo;
atk-s0508a12:747: Anaccuṁ tattha gandhabbā, cha sahassāni sattadhā’’ti. –
atk-s0508a12:749_0: Tattha panādo nāma so rājāti atīte panādo nāma so rājā ahosīti attabhāvaantarahitatāya
atk-s0508a12:749_1: attānaṁ paraṁ viya niddisati. So eva hi rajje ṭhitakālato paṭṭhāya sadā ussāhasampattiādinā
atk-s0508a12:749_2: mahatā rājānubhāvena mahatā ca kittisaddena samannāgatattā ‘‘rājā mahāpanādo’’ti
atk-s0508a12:749_3: paññāyittha. Yassa yūpo suvaṇṇayoti yassa rañño ayaṁ yūpo pāsādo suvaṇṇamayo. Tiriyaṁ
atk-s0508a12:749_4: soḷasubbedhoti vitthārato soḷasakaṇḍapātappamāṇo. So pana aḍḍhayojanamatto hoti.
atk-s0508a12:749_5: Ubbhāmāhu sahassadhāti ubbhaṁ uccaṁ evamassa pāsādassa sahassadhā sahassakaṇḍappamāṇamāhu.
atk-s0508a12:749_6: So pana yojanato pañcavīsatiyojanappamāṇo hoti. Keci panettha gāthāsukhatthaṁ ‘‘āhū’’ti
atk-s0508a12:749_7: dīghaṁ kataṁ. Āhu ahosīti atthaṁ vadanti.
atk-s0508a12:750_0: Sahassakaṇḍoti sahassabhūmiko. Satageṇḍūti anekasataniyyūhako. Dhajālūti tattha tattha
atk-s0508a12:750_3: naṭā. Cha sahassāni sattadhāti chamattāni gandhabbasahassāni sattadhā tassa pāsādassa
atk-s0508a12:750_4: sattasu ṭhānesu rañño abhiramāpanatthaṁ nacciṁsūti attho. Te evaṁ naccantāpi rājānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:750_5: hāsetuṁ nāsakkhiṁsu. Atha sakko devarājā devanaṭe pesetvā samajjaṁ kāresi, tadā rājā hasīti.
atk-s0508a12:753_0: Satimā paññavāti āyasmato sobhitattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a12:753_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle
atk-s0508a12:753_2: haṁsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā vayappatto satthu dhammadesanaṁ suṇanto satthāraṁ
atk-s0508a12:753_3: ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ pubbenivāsañāṇalābhīnaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṁ disvā sayampi
atk-s0508a12:753_4: taṁ ṭhānantaraṁ uddissa patthanaṁ katvā puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto sumedhassa
atk-s0508a12:753_5: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto brāhmaṇānaṁ vijjāsippesu nipphattiṁ
atk-s0508a12:753_6: gantvā nekkhammādhimutto gharāvāsaṁ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā himavantassa
atk-s0508a12:753_7: samīpe araññāyatane assamaṁ kāretvā vanamūlaphalāphalena yāpento buddhuppādaṁ sutvā
atk-s0508a12:753_8: sabbattha ekarattivāseneva bhaddavatīnagare satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a12:753_9: ‘‘tuvaṁ satthā ca ketu cā’’tiādīhi chahi gāthāhi abhitthavi , satthā cassa bhāviniṁ
atk-s0508a12:753_10: sampattiṁ pakāsesi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a12:753_11: sāvatthiyaṁ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti. Sobhitotissa nāmaṁ akaṁsu. So aparena samayena
atk-s0508a12:753_12: satthu dhammadesanaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā chaḷabhiñño
atk-s0508a12:753_13: ahosi. Pubbenivāsañāṇe ciṇṇavasī ca ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 2.49.46-74) –
atk-s0508a12:760: ‘‘Nāhaṁ suṇomi sambuddhaṁ, napi me koci saṁsati;
atk-s0508a12:767: Uddharanto bahū satte, deseti amataṁ padaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:770: ‘‘Tuvaṁ satthā ca ketu ca, dhajo yūpo ca pāṇinaṁ;
atk-s0508a12:771: Parāyano patiṭṭhā ca, dīpo ca dvipaduttamo.
atk-s0508a12:775: Na tveva tava sabbaññu, ñāṇaṁ sakkā pametave.
atk-s0508a12:779: Natveva tava sabbaññu, sīlaṁ sakkā pametave.
atk-s0508a12:795: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a12:801: Bhoge me ūnatā natthi, phalaṁ ñāṇassa thomane.
atk-s0508a12:807_0: So arahattaṁ pana patvā attano pubbenivāsaṁ anupaṭipāṭiyā anussaranto yāva asaññabhave
atk-s0508a12:807_1: acittakapaṭisandhi, tāva addasa. Tato pañca kappasatāni cittappavattiṁ adisvā avasāneva
atk-s0508a12:807_2: disvā ‘‘kimeta’’nti āvajjento nayavasena ‘‘asaññabhavo bhavissatī’’ti niṭṭhaṁ agamāsi.
atk-s0508a12:807_3: Tenāha bhagavā – ‘‘atthi, bhikkhave, asaññasattā nāma dīghāyukā devā, tato cuto sobhito
atk-s0508a12:807_4: idhūpapanno, so etaṁ bhavaṁ jānāti, sobhito anussaratī’’ti (pārā. 232 atthato samānaṁ).
atk-s0508a12:807_5: Evaṁ nayavasena anussarantassa anussaraṇakosallaṁ disvā satthā theraṁ pubbenivāsaṁ
atk-s0508a12:807_6: anussarantānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Tato eva cāyaṁ āyasmā savisesaṁ attano pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṁ
atk-s0508a12:807_7: tassa ca paccayabhūtaṁ paṭipattiṁ paccavekkhitvā somanassajāto tadatthadīpanaṁ udānaṁ udānento –
atk-s0508a12:813: Pañca kappasatānāhaṁ, ekarattiṁ anussari’’nti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:814_0: Tattha satimāti sayaṁ samudāgamanasampannāya satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāpāripūriyā sativepullappattiyā
atk-s0508a12:814_1: ca satimā. Paññavāti chaḷabhiññāpāripūriyā paññāvepullappattiyā ca paññavā. Bhinnakilesatāya
atk-s0508a12:814_3: āraddhabalavīriyo. Saddhādīnañhettha balaggahaṇena gahaṇaṁ satipi satiādīnaṁ balabhāve,
atk-s0508a12:814_4: yathā ‘‘gobalibaddhā puññañāṇasambhārā’’ti. Pañca kappasatānāhaṁ, ekarattiṁ anussarinti
atk-s0508a12:814_5: ekarattiṁ viya anussariṁ. Viya-saddo hi idha luttaniddiṭṭho, etena pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇe
atk-s0508a12:815_0: Idāni yāya paṭipattiyā attano satimantādibhāvo sātisayaṁ pubbenivāsañāṇañca siddhaṁ,
atk-s0508a12:815_1: taṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘cattāro’’tiādinā dutiyaṁ gāthamāha. Tattha cattāro satipaṭṭhāneti
atk-s0508a12:815_2: kāyānupassanādike attano visayabhedena catubbidhe lokiyalokuttaramissake satisaṅkhāte
atk-s0508a12:815_3: satipaṭṭhāne. Sattāti satta bojjhaṅge. Aṭṭhāti aṭṭha maggaṅgāni. Satipaṭṭhānesu hi
atk-s0508a12:815_4: suppatiṭṭhitacittassa satta bojjhaṅgā bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gatā eva honti, tathā ariyo
atk-s0508a12:815_5: aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo. Tenāha dhammasenāpati – ‘‘catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacittā
atk-s0508a12:815_6: satta bojjhaṅge yathābhūtaṁ bhāvetvā’’tiādīhi (dī. ni. 3.143) sattakoṭṭhāsikesu sattatiṁsāya
atk-s0508a12:815_7: bodhipakkhiyadhammesu ekasmiṁ koṭṭhāse bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchante itare agacchantā
atk-s0508a12:815_8: nāma natthīti. Bhāvayanti bhāvanāhetu. Sesaṁ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0508a12:818_0: Yaṁkiccaṁ daḷhavīriyenātiādikā āyasmato valliyattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a12:818_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a12:818_2: kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto vijjāsippesu nipphattiṁ gato asītikoṭivibhavaṁ
atk-s0508a12:818_3: pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā pabbatapāde araññāyatane ekissā nadiyā tīre assamaṁ
atk-s0508a12:818_4: kāretvā viharanto attano anuggaṇhanatthaṁ upagataṁ satthāraṁ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a12:818_5: ajinacammaṁ pattharitvā adāsi . Tattha nisinnaṁ bhagavantaṁ pupphehi ca candanena
atk-s0508a12:818_6: ca pūjetvā ambaphalāni datvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vandi. Tassa bhagavā nisinnāsanasampattiṁ
atk-s0508a12:818_7: pakāsento anumodanaṁ vatvā pakkāmi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto
atk-s0508a12:818_8: imasmiṁ buddhuppāde vesāliyaṁ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā ‘‘kaṇhamitto’’ti laddhanāmo
atk-s0508a12:818_9: vayappatto satthu vesāligamane buddhānubhāvaṁ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho mahākaccānattherassa
atk-s0508a12:818_10: santike pabbaji. So mandapañño dandhaparakkamo ca hutvā ciraṁ kālaṁ viññuṁ sabrahmacāriṁ
atk-s0508a12:818_11: nissāyeva vasati. Bhikkhū ‘‘yathā nāma valli rukkhādīsu kiñci anissāya vaḍḍhituṁ
atk-s0508a12:818_12: na sakkoti, evamayampi kañci paṇḍitaṁ anissāya vaḍḍhituṁ na sakkotī’’ti valliyotveva
atk-s0508a12:818_13: samudācariṁsu. Aparabhāge pana veṇudattattheraṁ upasaṅkamitvā tassa ovāde ṭhatvā
atk-s0508a12:818_14: sato sampajāno hutvā viharanto ñāṇassa paripākaṁ gatattā paṭipattikkamaṁ theraṁ pucchanto –
atk-s0508a12:824: Ahaṁ monena monissaṁ, gaṅgāsotova sāgara’’nti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:825_0: Tattha yaṁ kiccaṁ daḷhavīriyenāti daḷhena vīriyena thirena parakkamena, daḷhavīriyena
atk-s0508a12:825_1: vā purisadhorayhena yaṁ kiccaṁ kātabbaṁ paṭipajjitabbaṁ. Yaṁ kiccaṁ boddhumicchatāti
atk-s0508a12:825_2: cattāri ariyasaccāni nibbānameva vā boddhuṁ bujjhituṁ icchantena paṭivijjhitukāmena
atk-s0508a12:825_3: yaṁ kiccaṁ karaṇīyaṁ. Karissaṁ nāvarajjhissanti tamahaṁ dāni karissaṁ na virādhessaṁ,
atk-s0508a12:825_4: yathānusiṭṭhaṁ paṭipajjissāmi. Passa vīriyaṁ parakkamanti yathā paṭipajjamāne dhamme
atk-s0508a12:825_5: vidhinā īraṇato ‘‘vīriyaṁ’’, paraṁ paraṁ ṭhānaṁ akkamanato ‘‘parakkamo’’ti ca laddhanāmaṁ
atk-s0508a12:825_6: sammāvāyāmaṁ passa na saddhamevāti attano kattukāmataṁ dasseti.
atk-s0508a12:826_0: Tvañcāti kammaṭṭhānadāyakaṁ kalyāṇamittaṁ ālapati. Meti mayhaṁ. Maggamakkhāhīti ariyamaggaṁ
atk-s0508a12:826_1: kathehi, lokuttaramaggasampāpakaṁ catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṁ kathehīti attho. Añjasanti
atk-s0508a12:826_2: ujukaṁ majjhimapaṭipadābhāvena antadvayassa anupagamanato. Amate nibbāne sampāpakabhāvena
atk-s0508a12:826_3: patiṭṭhitattā amatogadhaṁ. Monenāti ñāṇena maggapaññāya. Monissanti jānissaṁ nibbānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:826_4: paṭivijjhissaṁ pāpuṇissaṁ. Gaṅgāsotova sāgaranti yathā gaṅgāya soto sāgaraṁ samuddaṁ
atk-s0508a12:826_5: avirajjhanto ekaṁsato ogāhati, evaṁ ‘‘ahaṁ kammaṭṭhānaṁ anuyuñjanto maggañāṇena nibbānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:826_6: adhigamissāmi, tasmā taṁ kammaṭṭhānaṁ me ācikkhathā’’ti theraṁ kammaṭṭhānaṁ yāci.
atk-s0508a12:827_0: Taṁ sutvā veṇudattatthero tassa kammaṭṭhānaṁ adāsi. Sopi kammaṭṭhānaṁ anuyuñjanto
atk-s0508a12:827_1: nacirasseva vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 2.49.75-105) –
atk-s0508a12:836: ‘‘Ko vā tvaṁ kassa vā putto, mahābrahmā idhāgato;
atk-s0508a12:837: Virocesi disā sabbā, udayaṁ sūriyo yathā.
atk-s0508a12:839: Ko vā tvaṁ kassa vā putto, kathaṁ jānemu taṁ mayaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:841: Namhi devā na gandhabbo, namhi sakko purindado.
atk-s0508a12:842: ‘‘Brahmabhāvo ca me natthi, etesaṁ uttamo ahaṁ;
atk-s0508a12:857: Mama kammaṁ pakittesi, hāsayanto mamaṁ tadā.
atk-s0508a12:875: Bhoge me ūnatā natthi, yamhi gabbhe vasāmahaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:887: Arahattaṁ pana patvā aññaṁ byākaronto thero imāyeva gāthā abhāsīti.
atk-s0508a12:890_0: Kese me olikhissantītiādikā āyasmato vītasokattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a12:890_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a12:890_2: kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā brāhmaṇānaṁ vijjāsippesu nipphattiṁ gato kāme pahāya
atk-s0508a12:890_3: isipabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā mahatā isigaṇena parivuto araññe vasanto buddhuppādaṁ sutvā
atk-s0508a12:890_4: haṭṭhatuṭṭho ‘‘udumbarapupphasadisā dullabhadassanā buddhā bhagavanto, idāneva upagantabbā’’ti
atk-s0508a12:890_5: mahatiyā parisāya saddhiṁ satthāraṁ daṭṭhuṁ gacchanto diyaḍḍhayojane sese byādhiko
atk-s0508a12:890_6: hutvā buddhagatāya saññāya kālaṅkato devesu uppajjitvā aparāparaṁ devamanussesu saṁsaranto
atk-s0508a12:890_7: imasmiṁ buddhuppāde aṭṭhārasavassādhikānaṁ dvinnaṁ vassasatānaṁ matthake dhammāsokarañño
atk-s0508a12:890_8: kaniṭṭhabhātā hutvā nibbatti, tassa vītasokoti nāma ahosi. So vayappatto khattiyakumārehi
atk-s0508a12:890_9: sikkhitabbavijjāsippesu nipphattiṁ gato giridattattheraṁ nissāya gihibhūto suttantapiṭake
atk-s0508a12:890_10: abhidhammapiṭake ca visārado hutvā ekadivasaṁ massukammasamaye kappakassa hatthato
atk-s0508a12:890_11: ādāsaṁ gahetvā kāyaṁ olokento valitapalitādīni disvā sañjātasaṁvego vipassanāya cittaṁ
atk-s0508a12:890_12: otāretvā bhāvanaṁ ussukkāpetvā tasmiṁyeva āsane sotāpanno hutvā giridattattherassa
atk-s0508a12:890_13: santike pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 2.49.9-26) –
atk-s0508a12:897: ‘‘Mama aññataro sisso, sissānaṁ so kathesi me;
atk-s0508a12:898: Sutvāna te etamatthaṁ, ārocesuṁ mamaṁ tadā.
atk-s0508a12:900: Tassānuvattati jano, lābho amhaṁ na vijjati.
atk-s0508a12:909: ‘‘Buddho loke samuppanno, cakkhuṁ lacchāma no bhavaṁ;
atk-s0508a12:928: Sabbe coḷā samucchinnā, natthi dāni punabbhavo’’ti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:929_0: Tattha kese me olikhissanti, kappako upasaṅkamīti gihikāle massukammasamaye ‘‘mama
atk-s0508a12:929_1: kese olikhissaṁ kappemī’’ti kesādīnaṁ chedanādivasena kappanato kappako nhāpito maṁ
atk-s0508a12:929_2: upagacchi. Tatoti kappakato. Sarīraṁ paccavekkhisanti sabbakāyike ādāse palitavalitamukhanimittādidassanamukhena
atk-s0508a12:929_3: ‘‘abhibhūto vata jarāya me kāyo’’ti jarābhibhūtaṁ attano sarīraṁ paccavekkhiṁ. Evaṁ
atk-s0508a12:929_4: paccavekkhato ca tuccho kāyo adissittha niccadhuvasukhasabhāvādīhi ritto hutvā me
atk-s0508a12:929_5: kāyo adissatha paññāyi. Kasmā? Andhakāre tamo byagā yena ayonisomanasikārasaṅkhātena
atk-s0508a12:929_6: tamasā attano kāye andhagatā vijjamānampi asubhādisabhāvaṁ apassantā avijjamānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:929_7: subhādiākāraṁ gaṇhanti, tasmiṁ andhakāre andhakaraṇaṭṭhāne kāye yonisomanasikārasaṅkhātena
atk-s0508a12:929_8: ñāṇālokena avijjātamo vigato, tato eva sabbe coḷā samucchinnā corā viya kusalabhaṇḍacchedanato,
atk-s0508a12:929_9: sādhūhi alātabbato asaṅgahetabbato saṅkārakūṭādīsu chaḍḍitapilotikakhaṇḍaṁ viya issarajanena
atk-s0508a12:929_10: ariyajanena jigucchitabbatāya coḷā viyāti vā ‘‘coḷā’’ti laddhanāmā kilesā samucchinnā.
atk-s0508a12:929_11: Aggamaggena samugghāṭitattā eva ca nesaṁ natthi dāni punabbhavo āyatiṁ punabbhavābhinibbatti natthīti.
atk-s0508a12:932_0: Pañca nīvaraṇe hitvātiādikā āyasmato puṇṇamāsattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a12:932_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto tissassa bhagavato
atk-s0508a12:932_2: kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ satthari araññe viharante paṁsukūlacīvaraṁ
atk-s0508a12:932_3: dumasākhāya laggetvā gandhakuṭiṁ paviṭṭhe dhanuhattho gahanaṁ paviṭṭho satthu paṁsukūlaṁ
atk-s0508a12:932_4: disvā pasannamānaso dhanuṁ nikkhipitvā buddhaguṇe anussaritvā paṁsukūlaṁ vandi. So
atk-s0508a12:932_5: tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṁ kuṭumbiyakule
atk-s0508a12:932_6: nibbatti. Tassa kira jātadivase tasmiṁ gehe sabbabhājanāni suvaṇṇaratanamayehi māsehi
atk-s0508a12:932_7: paripuṇṇāneva ahesuṁ. Tenassa puṇṇamāsotveva nāmaṁ akaṁsu. So vayappatto dārapariggahaṁ
atk-s0508a12:932_8: katvā ekasmiṁ putte uppanne gharāvāsaṁ pahāya pabbajitvā gāmakāvāse vasanto ghaṭento
atk-s0508a12:932_9: vāyamanto chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 2.49.1-8) –
atk-s0508a12:938: Cāpaṁ tattheva nikkhippa, sire katvāna añjaliṁ.
atk-s0508a12:944_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā sāvatthiṁ upagantvā satthāraṁ vanditvā susāne vasati, tassa
atk-s0508a12:944_1: ca acirāgatasseva sato putto kālamakāsi. Dārakamātā therassa āgatabhāvaṁ sutvā, ‘‘mā
atk-s0508a12:944_2: idaṁ aputtakaṁ sāpateyyaṁ rājāno hareyyu’’nti taṁ uppabbājetukāmā mahatā parivārena
atk-s0508a12:944_3: therassa santikaṁ gantvā paṭisanthāraṁ katvā palobhetuṁ ārabhi. Thero attano vītarāgabhāvajānāpanatthaṁ
atk-s0508a12:944_4: ākāse ṭhatvā attano paṭipattikittanamukhena tassā dhammaṁ desento –
atk-s0508a12:950: Ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca, tuccho kāyo adissathā’’ti. –
atk-s0508a12:952_0: Tattha pañca nīvaraṇe hitvāti kāmacchandādike pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya jhānādhigamena
atk-s0508a12:952_1: viddhaṁsetvā. Yogakkhemassa pattiyāti kāmayogādīhi catūhi yogehi khemassa anupaddutassa
atk-s0508a12:952_2: nibbānassa adhigamāya. Dhammādāsanti dhammabhūtaṁ ādāsaṁ. Yathā hi ādāso olokentassa
atk-s0508a12:952_3: rūpakāye guṇāguṇaṁ ādaṁseti, evaṁ vipassanāsaṅkhāto dhammānaṁ sāmaññavisesāvabodhanato
atk-s0508a12:952_5: ca visesato nāmakāye guṇaṁ ādaṁseti. Tenāha –
atk-s0508a12:955_0: Imaṁ kāyaṁ dhammasamūhaṁ mama attabhāvaṁ ajjhattikabāhirāyatanabhāvato santarabāhiraṁ
atk-s0508a12:955_2: patiavekkhiṁ ñāṇacakkhunā passiṁ. Evaṁ passatā ca mayā ajjhattañca bahiddhā cāti
atk-s0508a12:955_3: attano santāne parasantāne ca tuccho kāyo adissatha niccasārādivirahito tuccho khandhapañcakasaṅkhāto
atk-s0508a12:955_4: attabhāvakāyo ñāṇacakkhunā yāthāvato apassittha. Sakalampi hi khandhapañcakaṁ ‘‘avijjānivutassa,
atk-s0508a12:955_5: bhikkhave, bālassa taṇhāsaṁyuttassa evamayaṁ kāyo samudāgato’’tiādīsu (saṁ. ni. 2.19)
atk-s0508a12:955_6: ‘‘kāyo’’ti vuccati. ‘‘Adissathā’’ti ca iminā yadeva kāye daṭṭhabbaṁ, taṁ diṭṭhaṁ,
atk-s0508a12:955_7: na dānissa kiñci mayā passitabbaṁ atthīti katakiccataṁ dassento aññaṁ byākāsi. Evaṁ
atk-s0508a12:955_8: thero imāhi gāthāhi purāṇadutiyikāya dhammaṁ desetvā taṁ saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca sampatiṭṭhāpetvā uyyojesi.
atk-s0508a12:958_0: Yathāpibhaddo ājaññoti āyasmato nandakattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a12:958_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto sikhissa bhagavato kāle paccantadese
atk-s0508a12:958_2: uppajjitvā viññutaṁ patto vanacāriko hutvā vicaranto ekadivasaṁ satthu caṅkamanaṭṭhānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:958_3: disvā pasannacitto vālukā okiri. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ
atk-s0508a12:958_4: buddhuppāde campāyaṁ gahapatikule nibbatti, tassa nandakoti nāmaṁ akaṁsu. Jeṭṭhakabhātā
atk-s0508a12:958_5: panassa bharato nāma. Tassa pubbayogo anantaravatthusmiṁ āvibhavissati. Te ubhopi
atk-s0508a12:958_6: viññutaṁ patvā āyasmantaṁ soṇaṁ koḷivisaṁ pabbajitaṁ sutvā ‘‘soṇopi nāma tathāsukhumālo
atk-s0508a12:958_7: pabbaji, kimaṅgaṁ pana maya’’nti pabbajiṁsu. Tesu bharato nacirasseva vipassanaṁ
atk-s0508a12:958_8: vaḍḍhetvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Nandako pana kilesānaṁ balavabhāvena tāva vipassanaṁ
atk-s0508a12:958_9: ussukkāpetuṁ nāsakkhi, vipassanāya kammaṁ karoti eva. Athassa bharatatthero āsayaṁ
atk-s0508a12:958_10: ñatvā avassayo bhavitukāmo taṁ pacchāsamaṇaṁ katvā vihārato nikkhamitvā maggasamīpe
atk-s0508a12:959_0: Tena ca samayena sakaṭasatthe gacchante eko sakaṭe yutto goṇo cikkhallaṭṭhāne sakaṭaṁ
atk-s0508a12:959_1: uddharituṁ asakkonto paripati. Tato naṁ satthavāho sakaṭā mocetvā tiṇañca pānīyañca
atk-s0508a12:959_2: datvā parissamaṁ apanetvā puna dhure yojesi. Tato goṇo vūpasantaparissamo laddhabalo
atk-s0508a12:959_3: taṁ sakaṭaṁ cikkhallaṭṭhānato uddharitvā thale patiṭṭhāpesi. Atha bharatatthero nandakassa
atk-s0508a12:959_4: ‘‘passasi no tvaṁ, āvuso nandaka, imassa kamma’’nti taṁ nidassetvā tena ‘‘passāmī’’ti
atk-s0508a12:959_5: vutte ‘‘imamatthaṁ suṭṭhu upadhārehī’’ti āha. Itaro ‘‘yathāyaṁ goṇo vūpasantaparissamo
atk-s0508a12:959_6: paṅkaṭṭhānato bhāraṁ ubbahati, evaṁ mayāpi saṁsārapaṅkato attā uddharitabbo’’ti tamevārammaṇaṁ
atk-s0508a12:959_7: katvā vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne
atk-s0508a12:967: Arahattaṁ pana patvā attano jeṭṭhabhātikassa bharatattherassa santike aññaṁ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a12:970: Bhiyyo laddhāna saṁvegaṁ, adīno vahate dhuraṁ.
atk-s0508a12:973: Ājānīyaṁ maṁ dhāretha, puttaṁ buddhassa orasa’’nti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:974_0: Tattha bhiyyo laddhāna saṁvegaṁ, adīno vahate dhuranti ‘‘mayhaṁ jātibalavīriyānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:974_1: ananucchavikametaṁ yadidaṁ āgatassa bhārassa avahana’’nti saṁvegaṁ labhitvā adīno
atk-s0508a12:974_2: adīnamānaso alīnacitto. ‘‘Alīno’’ti vā pāṭho, so eva attho. Bhiyyo punappunaṁ bhiyyosomattāya
atk-s0508a12:974_3: attano dhuraṁ bhāraṁ vahate ubbahati. Sesaṁ heṭṭhā ramaṇīyavihārittherassa gāthāvaṇṇanāyaṁ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0508a12:977_0: Ehi, nandaka, gacchāmāti āyasmato bharatattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṁ kira anomadassissa
atk-s0508a12:977_1: bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ manuññadassanaṁ mudusukhasamphassaṁ
atk-s0508a12:977_2: upāhanadvayaṁ gahetvā gacchanto satthāraṁ caṅkamantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso upāhanā
atk-s0508a12:977_3: upanāmetvā, ‘‘abhiruhatu bhagavā upāhanā, yaṁ mama assa dīgharattaṁ hitāya sukhāyā’’ti
atk-s0508a12:977_4: āha. Abhiruhi bhagavā tassa anuggaṇhanatthaṁ upāhanā. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0508a12:977_5: saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde campānagare gahapatikule nibbatti, bharatotissa nāmaṁ
atk-s0508a12:977_6: ahosi. So viññutaṁ patto soṇattherassa pabbajitabhāvaṁ sutvā ‘‘sopi nāma pabbajī’’ti
atk-s0508a12:977_7: sañjātasaṁvego pabbajitvā katapubbakicco vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño
atk-s0508a12:985: Ito phalaṁ labhissāmi, so me attho samijjhatu.
atk-s0508a12:988: ‘‘Yo pānadhiṁ me adāsi, pasanno sehi pāṇibhi;
atk-s0508a12:997: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a12:1007: Datvāna pānadhiṁ ekaṁ, pattomhi acalaṁ padaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1011_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā attano kaniṭṭhabhātikena nandakattherena heṭṭhā vuttanayena
atk-s0508a12:1011_1: aññābyākaraṇe kate ‘‘idāni nandakopi arahā jāto, handa mayaṁ ubhopi satthu santikaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1011_2: gantvā vusitabrahmacariyataṁ nivedessāmāti uppannaṁ parivitakkaṁ nandakattherassa kathento –
atk-s0508a12:1017: So no attho anuppatto, sabbasaṁyojanakkhayo’’ti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:1018_0: Tattha nandakāti ālapanaṁ. Ehīti tassa attano santikakaraṇaṁ. Gacchāmāti tena attanā
atk-s0508a12:1018_1: ca ekajjhaṁ kātabbakiriyāvacanaṁ, upajjhāyassāti sammāsambuddhassa, sammāsambuddho
atk-s0508a12:1018_2: hi samantacakkhunā buddhacakkhunā ca sattānaṁ āsayānusayacaritādīnaṁ yathābhūtavilokanena
atk-s0508a12:1018_3: sadevakassa lokassa vajjāvajjaṁ upanijjhāyatīti visesato upajjhāyoti vattabbataṁ
atk-s0508a12:1018_4: arahati. Yadatthaṁ gamanaṁ, taṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘sīhanādaṁ nadissāma, buddhaseṭṭhassa sammukhā’’ti
atk-s0508a12:1018_5: āha. Yathābhuccaguṇābhibyāhāratāya abhītanādabhāvato sīhanādaṁ buddhassa sammāsambuddhassa
atk-s0508a12:1018_6: tato eva sabbasattuttamatāya seṭṭhassa, buddhānaṁ vā sāvakabuddhādīnaṁ seṭṭhassa
atk-s0508a12:1019_0: Yathā pana sīhanādaṁ naditukāmo, taṁ dassento ‘‘yāyā’’ti gāthamāha. Tattha yāyāti
atk-s0508a12:1019_1: yadatthaṁ, yāya yadatthānuppattiyāti attho. Noti amhākaṁ. Anukampāyāti anuggaṇhanena
atk-s0508a12:1019_2: amhe dvepi pabbājayi pabbājesi. Munīti bhagavā. So no attho anuppattoti so attho
atk-s0508a12:1019_3: sabbesaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ khayabhūtaṁ arahattaphalaṁ no amhehi anuppatto, adhigatoti attho.
atk-s0508a12:1022_0: Nadanti evaṁ sappaññāti āyasmato bhāradvājattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a12:1022_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito ekatiṁse kappe kulagehe nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a12:1022_2: viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ sumanaṁ nāma paccekabuddhaṁ piṇḍāya carantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a12:1022_3: paripakkaṁ vallikāraphalaṁ adāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ
atk-s0508a12:1022_4: buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā gottanāmena bhāradvājotveva paññāyittha.
atk-s0508a12:1022_5: So vayappatto gharāvāsaṁ vasanto ekaputtaṁ labhi. Tassa ‘‘kaṇhadinno’’ti nāmaṁ akāsi.
atk-s0508a12:1022_6: Tassa viññutaṁ pattakāle ‘‘tāta, asukassa nāma ācariyassa santike sippaṁ sikkhitvā
atk-s0508a12:1022_7: ehī’’ti taṁ takkasilaṁ pesesi. So gacchanto antarāmagge satthu sāvakaṁ aññataraṁ
atk-s0508a12:1022_8: mahātheraṁ kalyāṇamittaṁ labhitvā tassa santike dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a12:1022_9: katapubbakicco vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1025: ‘‘Ekatiṁse ito kappe, yaṁ phalaṁ adadiṁ tadā;
atk-s0508a12:1028_0: Athassa pitā bhāradvājo veḷuvane viharantaṁ bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṁ sutvā
atk-s0508a12:1028_1: pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahattaṁ sacchākāsi. Atha putto satthāraṁ vandituṁ rājagahaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1028_2: āgato satthu santike nisinnaṁ pitaraṁ disvā tuṭṭhacitto ‘‘pitāpi kho me pabbajito,
atk-s0508a12:1028_3: kiṁ nu kho tena pabbajjākiccaṁ matthakaṁ pāpita’’nti vīmaṁsanto khīṇāsavabhāvaṁ ñatvā
atk-s0508a12:1028_4: taṁ sīhanādaṁ nadāpetukāmo, ‘‘sādhu, kho tumhehi kataṁ pabbajantehi, pabbajjākiccaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1028_5: pana matthakaṁ pāpita’’nti pucchi. Bhāradvājo puttassa adhigamaṁ dīpento –
atk-s0508a12:1033: ‘‘Satthā ca pariciṇṇo me, dhammo saṅgho ca pūjito;
atk-s0508a12:1034: Ahañca vitto sumano, puttaṁ disvā anāsava’’nti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:1035_0: Tattha nadantīti yathābhuccaguṇābhibyāhāravasena abhītanādaṁ nadanti gajjanti. Evanti
atk-s0508a12:1035_4: devaputtamārañca jetvā sabbaso vijitasaṅgāmā nadanti sappaññāti sambandho.
atk-s0508a12:1036_0: Evaṁ vijetabbavijayena sīhanādaṁ dassetvā idāni ārādhetabbasamārādhanena icchitabbasiddhiyā
atk-s0508a12:1036_1: ca taṁ dassetuṁ, ‘‘satthā ca pariciṇṇo me’’ti dutiyaṁ gāthamāha. Tattha satthā ca
atk-s0508a12:1036_2: pariciṇṇo meti mama satthā sammāsambuddho yathānusiṭṭhaṁ ovādānusāsanīkaraṇena mayā
atk-s0508a12:1036_3: pariciṇṇo upāsito, na dhammādhikaraṇaṁ visositoti adhippāyo. Dhammo saṅgho ca pūjitoti
atk-s0508a12:1036_5: ariyasaṅgho ca mayā pūjito mānito. Ahañca vitto sumano, puttaṁ disvā anāsavanti mama
atk-s0508a12:1036_6: puttaṁ anāsavaṁ sabbaso khīṇāsavaṁ disvā dassanahetu ahampi vitto nirāmisāya pītiyā
atk-s0508a12:1036_7: tuṭṭho, tatoyeva nirāmisena somanassena sumano jātoti attho.
atk-s0508a12:1039_0: Upāsitāsappurisāti āyasmato kaṇhadinnattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a12:1039_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito catunavute kappe kulagehe
atk-s0508a12:1039_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ sobhitaṁ nāma paccekabuddhaṁ disvā pasannacitto
atk-s0508a12:1039_3: punnāgapupphehi pūjaṁ akāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ
atk-s0508a12:1039_4: buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā kaṇhadinnoti laddhanāmo vayappatto
atk-s0508a12:1039_5: upanissayasampattiyā codiyamāno dhammasenāpatiṁ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a12:1039_6: pabbajitvā vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 2.48.61-65) –
atk-s0508a12:1050: ‘‘Bhavarāgahatassa me sato, bhavarāgo puna me na vijjati;
atk-s0508a12:1051: Na cāhu na ca me bhavissati, na ca me etarahi vijjatī’’ti. –
atk-s0508a12:1053_0: Tattha upāsitāti paricaritā paṭipattipayirupāsanāya payirupāsitā. Sappurisāti santehi
atk-s0508a12:1053_1: sīlādiguṇehi samannāgatā purisā, ariyapuggalā sāriputtattherādayo. Etena purimacakkadvayasampattimattano
atk-s0508a12:1053_2: dasseti. Na hi patirūpadesavāsena vinā sappurisūpanissayo sambhavati. Sutā dhammāti
atk-s0508a12:1053_4: bāhusaccaṁ dassento pacchimacakkadvayasampattiṁ dasseti. Abhiṇhasoti bahuso na kālena
atk-s0508a12:1053_5: kālaṁ. Idañca padaṁ ‘‘upāsitā sappurisā’’ti etthāpi yojetabbaṁ. Sutvāna paṭipajjissaṁ,
atk-s0508a12:1053_6: añjasaṁ amatogadhanti te dhamme sutvā tattha vuttarūpārūpadhamme salakkhaṇādito pariggahetvā
atk-s0508a12:1053_7: anukkamena vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā amatogadhaṁ nibbānapatiṭṭhaṁ taṁsampāpakaṁ añjasaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1054_0: Bhavarāgahatassame satoti bhavarāgena bhavataṇhāya anādimati saṁsāre hatassa upaddutassa
atk-s0508a12:1054_1: mama sato samānassa, aggamaggena vā hatabhavarāgassa. Bhavarāgo puna me na vijjatīti
atk-s0508a12:1054_2: tato eva puna idāni bhavarāgo me natthi. Na cāhu na me bhavissati, na ca me etarahi
atk-s0508a12:1054_3: vijjatīti yadipi pubbe puthujjanakāle sekkhakāle ca me bhavarāgo ahosi, aggamaggappattito
atk-s0508a12:1054_4: pana paṭṭhāya na cāhu na ca ahosi, āyatimpi na me bhavissati, etarahi adhunāpi na
atk-s0508a12:1054_5: ca me vijjati na ca upalabbhati, pahīnoti attho. Bhavarāgavacaneneva cettha tadekaṭṭhatāya
atk-s0508a12:1054_6: mānādīnampi abhāvo vuttoti sabbaso parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojanataṁ dasseti.
atk-s0508a12:1059_0: Yatoahaṁ pabbajitoti āyasmato migasirattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a12:1059_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto kassapassa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0508a12:1059_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ disvā pasannacitto kusaṭṭhakaṁ adāsi.
atk-s0508a12:1059_3: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0508a12:1059_4: paṭisandhiṁ gahetvā migasiranakkhattena jātattā migasiroti laddhanāmo vayappatto
atk-s0508a12:1059_5: brāhmaṇānaṁ vijjāsippesu nipphattiṁ gato chavasīsamantaṁ nāma sikkhi, yaṁ parijappetvā
atk-s0508a12:1059_6: tivassamatthake matānampi sīsaṁ nakhena ākoṭetvā ‘‘ayaṁ satto asukaṭṭhāne nibbatto’’ti jānāti.
atk-s0508a12:1060_0: So gharāvāsaṁ anicchanto paribbājakapabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā taṁ vijjaṁ nissāya lokena
atk-s0508a12:1060_1: sakkato garukato lābhī hutvā vicaranto sāvatthiṁ upagato satthu santikaṁ gantvā attano
atk-s0508a12:1060_2: ānubhāvaṁ pakāsento – ‘‘ahaṁ, bho gotama, matānaṁ nibbattaṭṭhānaṁ jānāmī’’ti vatvā,
atk-s0508a12:1060_3: ‘‘kathaṁ pana tvaṁ jānāsī’’ti vutte, ‘‘chavasīsāni āharāpetvā mantaṁ parijappetvā
atk-s0508a12:1060_4: nakhena sīsaṁ ākoṭento nirayādikaṁ tehi tehi nibbattaṭṭhānaṁ jānāmī’’ti kathesi.
atk-s0508a12:1060_5: Athassa bhagavā parinibbutassa bhikkhuno sīsakapālaṁ āharāpetvā, ‘‘kathehi tāva tassa
atk-s0508a12:1060_6: gatiṁ, yassidaṁ sīsakapāla’’nti āha. So taṁ kapālaṁ mantaṁ parijappetvā nakhena ākoṭetvā
atk-s0508a12:1060_7: neva antaṁ na koṭiṁ passati. Atha satthārā, ‘‘na sakkosi paribbājakā’’ti vutte ,
atk-s0508a12:1060_8: ‘‘upaparikkhissāmi tāvā’’ti vatvā punappunaṁ parivattentopi na passateva. Bāhirakamantena
atk-s0508a12:1060_9: hi khīṇāsavassa gatiṁ kathaṁ jānissati, athassa matthakato kacchehi ca sedo mucci.
atk-s0508a12:1060_10: So lajjitvā tuṇhībhūto aṭṭhāsi. Satthā ‘‘kilamasi paribbājakā’’ti āha. So ‘‘āma,
atk-s0508a12:1060_11: kilamāmi, na imassa gatiṁ jānāmi, tumhe pana jānāthā’’ti. ‘‘Ahaṁ etaṁ jānāmi, ito
atk-s0508a12:1060_12: uttaritarampi jānāmī’’ti vatvā ‘‘nibbānaṁ gato so’’ti āha. Paribbājako ‘‘imaṁ vijjaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1060_13: mayhaṁ dethā’’ti āha. ‘‘Tena hi pabbajā’’ti vatvā taṁ pabbājetvā paṭhamaṁ samathakammaṭṭhāne
atk-s0508a12:1060_14: niyojetvā jhānābhiññāsu patiṭṭhitassa vipassanāya kammaṁ upadisi. So vipassanāya
atk-s0508a12:1060_15: kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 2.48.56-60) –
atk-s0508a12:1072: Akuppā me vimuttīti, sabbasaṁyojanakkhayā’’ti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:1073_0: Tattha yato ahaṁ pabbajito, sammāsambuddhasāsaneti yato pabhuti ahaṁ pabbajito buddhassa
atk-s0508a12:1073_1: bhagavato sāsane, pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya. Vimuccamāno uggacchinti saṁkilesapakkhato
atk-s0508a12:1073_2: paṭhamaṁ tāva samathavipassanāhi vimuccamāno vodānadhammasavanena uṭṭhahiṁ. Evaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1073_3: uggacchanto kāmadhātuṁ upaccagaṁ anāgāmimaggena accantameva kāmadhātuṁ atikkamiṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1074_0: Brahmuno pekkhamānassa, tato cittaṁ vimucci meti sadevakassa lokassa aggabhūtattā
atk-s0508a12:1074_1: seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahmuno buddhassa bhagavato mahākaruṇāyogena ‘‘ayaṁ kulaputto mama
atk-s0508a12:1074_2: sāsane pabbajitvā kathaṁ nu kho paṭipajjatī’’ti pekkhantassa tato anāgāmimaggādhigamato
atk-s0508a12:1074_3: pacchā aggamaggādhigamena mama cittaṁ sabbasaṁkilesato accantameva mucci. Akuppāme
atk-s0508a12:1074_4: vimuttīti, sabbasaṁyojanakkhayāti tathāvimuttacittattā eva sabbesaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1074_5: khayā parikkhayā iti evaṁ akuppā me vimuttīti aññaṁ byākāsi.
atk-s0508a12:1077_0: Aniccānigahakānīti āyasmato sivakattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a12:1077_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a12:1077_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ bhagavantaṁ piṇḍāya carantaṁ passitvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a12:1077_3: pattaṁ ādāya kummāsassa pūretvā adāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto
atk-s0508a12:1077_4: imasmiṁ buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇakule nibbatti, sivakotissa nāmaṁ ahosi. So vayappatto
atk-s0508a12:1077_5: vijjāsippesu nipphattiṁ gato nekkhammajjhāsayatāya kāme pahāya paribbājakapabbajjaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1077_6: pabbajitvā vicaranto satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a12:1077_7: vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa.
atk-s0508a12:1079: Rittakaṁ pattaṁ disvāna, kummāsaṁ pūrayiṁ ahaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1089: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, thūṇikā ca vidālitā;
atk-s0508a12:1090: Vimariyādikataṁ cittaṁ, idheva vidhamissatī’’ti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:1091_0: Tattha aniccāni gahakāni, tattha tattha punappunanti tasmiṁ tasmiṁ bhave punappunaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1091_1: nibbattamānāni gahakāni attabhāvagehāni na nibbāni anavaṭṭhitāni ittarāni parittakālāni.
atk-s0508a12:1091_2: Gahakāraṁ gavesantoti imassa attabhāvagehassa kārakaṁ taṇhāvaḍḍhakiṁ pariyesanto
atk-s0508a12:1091_3: ettakaṁ kālaṁ anuvicarinti adhippāyo. Dukkhā jāti punappunanti idaṁ gahakārakagavesanassa
atk-s0508a12:1091_4: kāraṇavacanaṁ . Yasmā jarābyādhimaraṇamissatāya jāti nāmesā punappunaṁ upagantuṁ
atk-s0508a12:1091_5: dukkhā, na ca sā tasmiṁ adiṭṭhe nivattati, tasmā taṁ gavesanto vicarinti attho.
atk-s0508a12:1092_0: Gahakārakadiṭṭhosīti idāni pana yena so sakkā daṭṭhuṁ, tena ariyamaggañāṇacakkhunā
atk-s0508a12:1092_1: gahakāraka diṭṭho asi. Puna gehanti puna imasmiṁ saṁsāravaṭṭe attabhāvasaṅkhātaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1092_2: mama gehaṁ na kāhasi na karissasi. Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggāti tava sabbā anavasesakilesaphāsukā
atk-s0508a12:1092_3: mayā bhaggā. Thūṇikā ca vidālitāti idāni tayā kātabbassa attabhāvagehassa avijjāsaṅkhātā
atk-s0508a12:1092_4: kaṇṇikā ca bhinnā. Vimariyādikataṁ cittanti mama cittaṁ vigatantaṁ kataṁ, āyatiṁ
atk-s0508a12:1092_5: anuppattidhammataṁ āpāditaṁ. Tato eva idheva vidhamissati imasmiṁyeva bhave viddhaṁsissati,
atk-s0508a12:1095_0: Arahaṁ sugatoti āyasmato upavāṇattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayaṁ kira padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a12:1095_1: bhagavato kāle daliddakule nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto bhagavati parinibbute tassa
atk-s0508a12:1095_3: thūpe kate tattha sudhotaṁ attano uttarāsaṅgaṁ veḷagge ābandhitvā dhajaṁ katvā pūjaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1095_4: akāsi. Taṁ gahetvā abhisammatako nāma yakkhasenāpati devehi cetiyapūjārakkhaṇatthaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1095_5: ṭhapito adissamānakāyo ākāse dhārento cetiyaṁ tikkhattuṁ padakkhiṇaṁ akāsi. So taṁ
atk-s0508a12:1095_6: disvā bhiyyosomattāya pasannamānaso ahosi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto
atk-s0508a12:1095_7: imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṁ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā upavāṇoti laddhanāmo vayappatto
atk-s0508a12:1095_8: jetavanapaṭiggahaṇe buddhānubhāvaṁ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya
atk-s0508a12:1095_9: kammaṁ karonto arahattaṁ patvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 2.56.122-178) –
atk-s0508a12:1115: Manussā ceva devā ca, buddhathūpaṁ akaṁsu te.
atk-s0508a12:1123: Manussā devanāgā ca, buddhapūjaṁ akaṁsu te.
atk-s0508a12:1126: ‘‘Sabbaṁ maṇimayaṁ thūpaṁ, akaruṁ te ca kañcukaṁ;
atk-s0508a12:1131: Manussā ceva devā ca, nāgā ca garuḷā tathā.
atk-s0508a12:1133: Mā no pamattā assumha, appamattā sadevakā.
atk-s0508a12:1139: Manussā devanāgā ca, garuḷā ca kumbhaṇḍakā.
atk-s0508a12:1141: Mā no pamattā assumha, appamattā sadevakā.
atk-s0508a12:1147: Manujā devatā nāgā, kumbhaṇḍā garuḷā tathā.
atk-s0508a12:1150: ‘‘Vediyo satta katvāna, dhajaṁ chattaṁ akaṁsu te;
atk-s0508a12:1153: Rattindivā na ñāyanti, āloko hoti sabbadā.
atk-s0508a12:1156: ‘‘Tena kālena ye keci, thūpaṁ pūjenti mānusā;
atk-s0508a12:1157: Na te thūpaṁ āruhanti, ambare ukkhipanti te.
atk-s0508a12:1159: Dhajaṁ vā pupphadāmaṁ vā, abhiropeti uttariṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1160: ‘‘Na te passanti taṁ yakkhaṁ, dāmaṁ passanti gacchato;
atk-s0508a12:1161: Evaṁ passitvā gacchantā, sabbe gacchanti suggatiṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1162: ‘‘Viruddhā ye pāvacane, pasannā ye ca sāsane;
atk-s0508a12:1165: Āmoditaṁ janaṁ disvā, evaṁ cintesahaṁ tadā.
atk-s0508a12:1167: Imā ca janatā tuṭṭhā, kāraṁ kubbaṁ na tappare.
atk-s0508a12:1173: Vāteritaṁ dhajaṁ disvā, bhiyyo hāsaṁ janesahaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1175: Taṁ bhikkhuṁ abhivādetvā, vipākaṁ pucchahaṁ dhaje.
atk-s0508a12:1191: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a12:1198: ‘‘Satasahasse kataṁ kammaṁ, phalaṁ dassesi me idha;
atk-s0508a12:1201: Tīṇi yojanāni sāmantā, ussīyanti dhajā sadā.
atk-s0508a12:1205_0: Athāyasmā upavāṇo bhagavato upaṭṭhāko ahosi. Tena ca samayena bhagavato vātābādho
atk-s0508a12:1205_1: uppajji. Therassa ca gihisahāyo devahito nāma brāhmaṇo sāvatthiyaṁ paṭivasati. So
atk-s0508a12:1205_2: theraṁ catūhi paccayehi pavedesi. Athāyasmā upavāṇo nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya tassa
atk-s0508a12:1205_3: brāhmaṇassa nivesanaṁ upagacchi. Brāhmaṇo ‘‘kenaci aññena payojanena thero āgato’’ti
atk-s0508a12:1205_4: ñatvā, ‘‘vadeyyātha, bhante, kenattho’’ti āha. Thero tassa brāhmaṇassa payojanaṁ ācikkhanto –
atk-s0508a12:1208: Sace uṇhodakaṁ atthi, munino dehi brāhmaṇa.
atk-s0508a12:1211: Apacitopaceyyānaṁ, tassa icchāmi hātave’’ti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:1212_0: Tassattho – yo imasmiṁ loke pūjaneyyānaṁ pūjetabbehi sakkādīhi devehi mahābrahmādīhi
atk-s0508a12:1212_1: ca brahmehi pūjito, sakkareyyānaṁ sakkātabbehi bimbisārakosalarājādīhi sakkato, apaceyyānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1212_2: apacāyitabbehi mahesīhi khīṇāsavehi apacito, kilesehi ārakattādinā arahaṁ, sobhanagamanādinā
atk-s0508a12:1212_3: sugato sabbaññū muni mayhaṁ satthā devadevo sakkānaṁ atisakko brahmānaṁ atibrahmā,
atk-s0508a12:1212_4: so dāni vātehi vātahetu vātakkhobhanimittaṁ ābādhiko jāto. Sace, brāhmaṇa, uṇhodakaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1212_5: atthi, tassa vātābādhavūpasamanatthaṁ taṁ hātave upanetuṁ icchāmīti. Taṁ sutvā brāhmaṇo
atk-s0508a12:1212_6: uṇhodakaṁ tadanurūpaṁ vātārahañca bhesajjaṁ bhagavato upanāmesi. Tena ca satthu rogo
atk-s0508a12:1215_0: Diṭṭhāmayāti āyasmato isidinnattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a12:1215_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a12:1215_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto bījaniṁ gahetvā bodhiyā pūjaṁ akāsi. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a12:1215_3: devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sunāparantajanapade seṭṭhikule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a12:1215_4: isidinnoti laddhanāmo vayappatto satthu candanamāḷapaṭiggahaṇe pāṭihāriyaṁ disvā
atk-s0508a12:1215_5: pasannamānaso satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṁ sutvā sotāpanno hutvā agāraṁ ajjhāvasati.
atk-s0508a12:1217: ‘‘Diṭṭhā mayā dhammadharā upāsakā, kāmā aniccā iti bhāsamānā;
atk-s0508a12:1218: Sārattarattā maṇikuṇḍalesu, puttesu dāresu ca te apekkhā.
atk-s0508a12:1220: ‘‘Addhā na jānanti yatodha dhammaṁ, kāmā aniccā iti cāpi āhu;
atk-s0508a12:1221: Rāgañca tesaṁ na balatthi chettuṁ, tasmā sitā puttadāraṁ dhanañcā’’ti. –
atk-s0508a12:1223_0: Tattha diṭṭhā mayā dhammadharā upāsakā, kāmā aniccā iti bhāsamānāti idhekacce pariyattidhammadharā
atk-s0508a12:1223_1: upāsakā mayā diṭṭhā, pariyattidhammadharattā eva ‘‘kāmā nāmete aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā’’ti
atk-s0508a12:1223_2: kāmesu ādīnavapaṭisaṁyuttaṁ dhammaṁ bhāsamānā, sayaṁ pana sārattarattā maṇikuṇḍalesu,
atk-s0508a12:1223_3: puttesu dāresu ca te apekkhāti sārattā hutvā bahalarāgarattā maṇīsu kuṇḍalesu ca,
atk-s0508a12:1223_4: maṇicitesu vā kuṇḍalesu, puttesu puttadhītāsu dāresu ca adhigatasnehā, aññaṁ bhaṇantā
atk-s0508a12:1224_0: Yatoti yasmā te upāsakā sārattarattā maṇikuṇḍalesu puttesu dāresu ca apekkhavanto,
atk-s0508a12:1224_1: tasmā idha imasmiṁ buddhasāsane dhammaṁ yāthāvato addhā ekaṁsena na jānanti. Evaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1224_2: bhūtā ca ‘‘kāmā aniccā’’iti cāpi āhu ahosi, sattapakati vicittasabhāvāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0508a12:1224_3: Rāgañca tesaṁ na balatthi chettunti tesaṁ upāsakānaṁ yasmā rāgaṁ chettuṁ samucchindituṁ
atk-s0508a12:1224_4: tādisaṁ ñāṇabalaṁ natthi, tasmā tena kāraṇena sitā taṇhāvasena nissitā puttadāraṁ
atk-s0508a12:1224_5: dhanañca allīnā na vissajjentīti sabbametaṁ devatā taṁyeva upāsakaṁ uddissa aññāpadesena
atk-s0508a12:1224_6: kathesi. Taṁ sutvā upāsako saṁvegajāto pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena
atk-s0508a12:1230: Arahattaṁ pana patvā aññaṁ byākaronto imā eva gāthā abhāsīti.
atk-s0508a12:1233_0: Devocāti āyasmato sambulakaccānattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a12:1233_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto ito catunavutikappamatthake kulagehe
atk-s0508a12:1233_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ sataraṁsiṁ nāma paccekabuddhaṁ nirodhā vuṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0508a12:1233_3: piṇḍāya carantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso tālaphalaṁ adāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0508a12:1233_4: saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe gahapatikule nibbattitvā ‘‘sambulo’’ti
atk-s0508a12:1234_0: So vayappatto satthu santike dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā himavantasamīpe
atk-s0508a12:1234_1: bheravāya nāma pabbataguhāyaṁ vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto viharati. Athekadivasaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1234_2: mahā akālamegho satapaṭalasahassapaṭalo thanento gajjanto vijjullatā nicchārento
atk-s0508a12:1234_3: gaḷagaḷāyanto uṭṭhahitvā vassituṁ ārabhi, asaniyo phaliṁsu. Taṁ saddaṁ sutvā acchataracchuvanamahiṁsahatthiādayo
atk-s0508a12:1234_4: bhītatasitā bhītaravaṁ viraviṁsu. Thero pana āraddhavipassanattā kāye jīvite ca nirapekkho
atk-s0508a12:1234_5: vigatalomahaṁso taṁ acintento vipassanāyameva kammaṁ karonto ghammāpagamena utusappāyalābhena
atk-s0508a12:1234_6: samāhitacitto tāvadeva vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā saha abhiññāhi arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena
atk-s0508a12:1242: Arahattaṁ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṁ paccavekkhitvā somanassajāto udānavasena aññaṁ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a12:1246: Tassa mayhaṁ ekakassa bherave bile viharato,
atk-s0508a12:1247: Natthi bhayaṁ vā chambhitattaṁ vā lomahaṁso vā.
atk-s0508a12:1249: ‘‘Dhammatā mamesā yassa me, ekakassa bherave bile;
atk-s0508a12:1250: Viharato natthi bhayaṁ vā, chambhitattaṁ vā lomahaṁso vā’’ti. –
atk-s0508a12:1252_0: Tattha devo ca vassati, devo ca gaḷagaḷāyatīti devo megho vassati ca, ‘‘gaḷagaḷā’’ti
atk-s0508a12:1252_1: ca karonto gajjatīti attho. Gajjantassa hi anukaraṇametaṁ. Ekako cāhaṁ bherave bile
atk-s0508a12:1252_2: viharāmīti ahañca ekako asahāyo sappaṭibhayāyaṁ pabbataguhāyaṁ vasāmi, tassa mayhaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1252_3: evaṁbhūtassa me sato natthi bhayaṁ vā chambhitattaṁ vā lomahaṁso vāti cittutrāsasaññitaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1252_4: bhayaṁ vā taṁnimittakaṁ sarīrassa chambhitattaṁ vā lomahaṁsanamattaṁ vā natthi.
atk-s0508a12:1253_0: Kasmāti tattha kāraṇamāha ‘‘dhammatā mamesā’’ti. Apariññātavatthukassa hi tattha
atk-s0508a12:1253_1: appahīnacchandarāgatāya bhayādinā bhavitabbaṁ, mayā pana sabbaso tattha pariññātaṁ,
atk-s0508a12:1253_2: tattha ca chandarāgo samucchinno, tasmā bhayādīnaṁ abhāvo dhammatā mamesā mama dhammasabhāvo
atk-s0508a12:1256_0: Kassaselūpamaṁ cittanti āyasmato nitakattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a12:1256_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto vipassissa bhagavato kāle bandhumatīnagare
atk-s0508a12:1256_2: ārāmagopako hutvā jīvanto ekadivasaṁ bhagavantaṁ ākāsena gacchantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a12:1256_3: nāḷikeraphalaṁ dātukāmo ahosi. Satthā taṁ anuggaṇhanto ākāseyeva ṭhatvā paṭiggaṇhi.
atk-s0508a12:1256_4: So taṁ datvā uḷāraṁ pītisomanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0508a12:1256_5: saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā nitakoti laddhanāmo
atk-s0508a12:1256_6: viññutaṁ patto satthu santike dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1256_7: gahetvā araññe viharanto ghaṭento arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 2.51.91-99) –
atk-s0508a12:1270_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā there phalasukhena nibbānasukhena viharante padhānapariggāhako
atk-s0508a12:1270_1: thero taṁ āraññāyatanaṁ gantvā tattha vasantānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pariggaṇhanatthaṁ ‘‘kassa
atk-s0508a12:1271_0: 191. Tattha kassa selūpamaṁ cittaṁ, ṭhitaṁ nānupakampatīti imasmiṁ araññāyatane vasantesu
atk-s0508a12:1271_1: kassa bhikkhuno cittaṁ aggaphalādhigamena ekaghanasilāmayapabbatūpamaṁ sabbesaṁ iñjanānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1271_2: abhāvato vasībhāvappattiyā ca ṭhitaṁ sabbehipi lokadhammehi nānukampati na vedhati.
atk-s0508a12:1271_3: Idānissa akampanākāraṁ saddhiṁ kāraṇena dassetuṁ ‘‘viratta’’ntiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha
atk-s0508a12:1271_4: virattaṁ rajanīyesūti virāgasaṅkhātena ariyamaggena rajanīyesu rāguppattihetubhūtesu
atk-s0508a12:1271_5: tebhūmakadhammesu virattaṁ, tattha sabbaso samucchinnarāganti attho. Kuppanīyeti
atk-s0508a12:1271_6: paṭighaṭṭhānīye, sabbasmimpi āghātavatthusmiṁ. Na kuppatīti na dussati na vikāraṁ
atk-s0508a12:1271_7: āpajjati. Yassevaṁ bhāvitaṁ cittanti yassa ariyapuggalassa cittaṁ mano evaṁ vuttanayena
atk-s0508a12:1271_8: tādibhāvena bhāvitaṁ, kuto taṁ dukkhamessatīti taṁ puggalaṁ kuto sattato saṅkhārato
atk-s0508a12:1271_9: vā dukkhaṁ upagamissati, na tādisassa dukkhaṁ atthīti attho.
atk-s0508a12:1272: 192. Evaṁ aniyamavasena pucchitamatthaṁ nitakatthero attūpanāyikaṁ katvā vissajjento ‘‘mama selūpamaṁ citta’’ntiādinā dutiyagāthāya aññaṁ byākāsi. Taṁ vuttatthameva.
atk-s0508a12:1275_0: Na tāva supituṁ hotīti āyasmato soṇassa poṭiriyaputtassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a12:1275_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro sikhissa bhagavato kāle vanacaro hutvā jīvanto ekadivasaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1275_2: satthāraṁ disvā pasannacitto kurañjiyaphalaṁ satthuno adāsi. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a12:1275_3: devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde kapilavatthusmiṁ poṭiriyassa nāma gāmabhojakassa
atk-s0508a12:1275_4: putto hutvā nibbatti, soṇotissa nāmaṁ ahosi. So vayappatto bhaddiyassa sākiyarañño
atk-s0508a12:1275_5: senāpati ahosi. Atha bhaddiyarāje heṭṭhā vuttanayena pabbajite, senāpati ‘‘rājāpi
atk-s0508a12:1275_6: nāma pabbaji, kiṁ mayhaṁ gharāvāsenā’’ti pabbaji? Pabbajitvā pana niddārāmo viharati,
atk-s0508a12:1275_7: na bhāvanamanuyuñjati. Taṁ bhagavā anupiyāyaṁ ambavane viharanto attano obhāsaṁ pharāpetvā
atk-s0508a12:1275_8: tenassa satiṁ janetvā imāya gāthāya taṁ ovadanto –
atk-s0508a12:1281: Saṅgāme me mataṁ seyyo, yañce jīve parājito’’ti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:1282_0: Tattha na tāva supituṁ hoti, ratti nakkhattamālinīti aṭṭhahi akkhaṇehi vajjitaṁ navamaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1282_1: khaṇaṁ labhitvā ṭhitassa viññujātikassa yāva na arahattaṁ hatthagataṁ hoti, tāva
atk-s0508a12:1282_2: ayaṁ nakkhattamālinī ratti supituṁ niddāyituṁ na hoti, supanassa kālo na hoti. Apica
atk-s0508a12:1282_3: kho paṭijaggitumevesā, ratti hoti vijānatāti esā ratti nāma manussānaṁ migapakkhīnañca
atk-s0508a12:1282_4: niddūpagamanena visesato nissaddavelābhūtā paṭipattiṁ attani sañjaggituṁ jāgariyānuyogamanuyuñjitumeva
atk-s0508a12:1283_0: Taṁ sutvā soṇo saṁviggataramānaso hirottappaṁ paccupaṭṭhapetvā abbhokāsikaṅgaṁ adhiṭṭhāya
atk-s0508a12:1283_1: vipassanāya kammaṁ karonto ‘‘hatthikkhandhova patita’’nti dutiyaṁ gāthamāha. Tattha
atk-s0508a12:1283_2: avapatitanti avamukhaṁ patitaṁ uddhaṁpādaṁ adhomukhaṁ patitaṁ. Kuñjaro ce anukkameti
atk-s0508a12:1283_3: kuñjaro anukkameyya ce. Idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti – yadāhaṁ hatthimāruhitvā saṅgāmaṁ paviṭṭho
atk-s0508a12:1283_4: hatthikkhandhato patito, tadāhaṁ saṅgāme tena hatthinā maddito mato ahosiṁ ce, taṁ
atk-s0508a12:1283_5: me maraṇaṁ seyyo, yañce idāni kilesehi parājito jīveyyaṁ, taṁ na seyyoti. Imaṁ gāthaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1283_6: vadantoyeva vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 2.52.1-6) –
atk-s0508a12:1288: ‘‘Ekatiṁse ito kappe, yaṁ phalaṁ adadiṁ tadā;
atk-s0508a12:1291: Arahattaṁ pana patvā ‘‘satthārā vuttaṁ, attanā vutta’’nti ubhayañhi gāthaṁ ‘‘hatthikkhandhāvapatita’’ntiādinā paccudāhāsi. Tena idameva aññābyākaraṇaṁ ahosīti.
atk-s0508a12:1294_0: Pañcakāmaguṇe hitvāti āyasmato nisabhattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a12:1294_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a12:1294_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ piṇḍāya carantaṁ disvā pasannacitto
atk-s0508a12:1294_3: kapitthaphalamadāsi. So tena puññakammena sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a12:1294_4: koliyajanapade kulagehe nibbattitvā nisabhoti laddhanāmo vayappatto sākiyakoliyānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1294_5: saṅgāme buddhānubhāvaṁ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā tadaheva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0508a12:1300: So arahattaṁ pana patvā attano sahāyabhikkhū pamādavihārena kālaṁ vītināmente disvā te ovadanto –
atk-s0508a12:1305_1: manorame rūpādike pañca kāmaguṇe kāmakoṭṭhāse hitvā pahāya pariccajitvā kammaphalasaddhāya
atk-s0508a12:1305_2: ratanattayasaddhāya ca vasena gharā gharabandhanato nikkhamma nikkhamitvā pabbajjaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1305_3: upagato viññujātiko pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya ghaṭento vāyamanto vaṭṭadukkhassa antakaro
atk-s0508a12:1305_4: bhave bhaveyyāti. Evaṁ te bhikkhū ovaditvā ‘‘ayaṁ pare eva saññāpento viharati, ‘‘sayaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1305_5: pana akārako’ti mā cintayitthā’’ti tesaṁ attano paṭipannabhāvaṁ pakāsento –
atk-s0508a12:1309_0: Dutiyagāthāya aññaṁ byākāsi. Tattha nābhinandāmi maraṇanti maraṇaṁ na abhikaṅkhāmi.
atk-s0508a12:1309_1: Nābhinandāmi jīvitanti idaṁ pana tassa kāraṇavacanaṁ, yasmā nābhinandāmi jīvitaṁ,
atk-s0508a12:1309_2: tasmā nābhinandāmi maraṇanti. Yo hi āyatiṁ jātijarāmaraṇāya kilesābhisaṅkhāre ācinoti
atk-s0508a12:1309_3: upacinoti, so punabbhavābhinibbattiṁ abhinandanto nāntariyakatāya attano maraṇampi
atk-s0508a12:1309_4: abhinandati nāma kāraṇassa appahīnattā, khīṇāsavo pana sabbaso ācayagāmidhamme pahāya
atk-s0508a12:1309_5: apacayagāmidhamme patiṭṭhito pariññātavatthuko sabbaso jīvitaṁ anabhinandanto maraṇampi
atk-s0508a12:1309_6: anabhinandati nāma kāraṇassa eva suppahīnattā. Tenāha – ‘‘nābhinandāmi maraṇaṁ, nābhinandāmi
atk-s0508a12:1309_7: jīvita’’nti. Yadi evaṁ khīṇāsavassa parinibbānābhikaṅkhā, yāva parinibbānā avaṭṭhānañca
atk-s0508a12:1309_8: kathanti āha ‘‘kālañca paṭikaṅkhāmi, sampajāno patissato’’ti, kilesaparinibbāne siddhe
atk-s0508a12:1309_9: satipaññāvepullappattiyā sato sampajāno kevalaṁ khandhaparinibbānakālaṁ paṭikaṅkhāmi,
atk-s0508a12:1309_10: taṁ udikkhamāno āgamayamāno viharāmi, na pana me maraṇe jīvite vā abhinandanā atthi
atk-s0508a12:1312_0: Ambapallavasaṅkāsanti āyasmato usabhattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a12:1312_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a12:1312_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ piṇḍāya carantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a12:1312_3: kosambaphalaṁ adāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a12:1312_4: kapilavatthusmiṁ sākiyarājakule nibbattitvā usabhoti laddhanāmo vayappatto satthu
atk-s0508a12:1312_5: ñātisamāgame buddhānubhāvaṁ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbaji. So pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0508a12:1312_6: samaṇadhammaṁ akatvā divā saṅgaṇikārāmo sakalarattiṁ niddāyamāno vītināmeti. So ekadivasaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1312_7: muṭṭhassati asampajāno niddaṁ okkanto supine kesamassuṁ ohāretvā ambapallavavaṇṇaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1312_8: cīvaraṁ pārupitvā hatthigīvāyaṁ nisīditvā nagaraṁ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhaṁ tattheva manusse
atk-s0508a12:1312_9: sampatte disvā lajjāya hatthikkhandhato oruyha attānaṁ disvā paṭibuddho, ‘‘īdisaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1312_10: nāma supinaṁ muṭṭhassatinā asampajānena niddāyamānena mayā diṭṭha’’nti uppannasaṁvego
atk-s0508a12:1312_11: vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 2.52.12-16) –
atk-s0508a12:1315: ‘‘Ekatiṁse ito kappe, yaṁ phalaṁ adadiṁ tadā;
atk-s0508a12:1318: Atha thero yathādiṭṭhaṁ supinaṁ aṅkusaṁ katvā arahattassa adhigatattā tasseva supinassa kittanavasena aññaṁ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a12:1324: Sohaṁ ditto tadā santo, patto me āsavakkhayo’’ti. – gāthādvayamāha;
atk-s0508a12:1325_0: Tattha ambapallavasaṅkāsaṁ, aṁse katvāna cīvaranti ambapallavākāraṁ pavāḷavaṇṇaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1325_1: cīvaraṁ khandhe karitvā uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā. Gāmanti attano rājadhāniṁ hatthikkhandhe
atk-s0508a12:1325_2: nisinno piṇḍāya pāvisiṁ, paviṭṭhamattova mahājanena olokiyamāno hatthikkhandhato
atk-s0508a12:1325_3: oruyha ṭhito paṭibujjhiṁ, pabuddhova saṁvegaṁ alabhiṁ tadā ‘‘muṭṭhassati asampajāno
atk-s0508a12:1325_4: hutvā niddāyokkamanena etaṁ jāta’’nti. Apare pana ‘‘rājāva hutvā rattibhāge evarūpaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1325_5: supinaṁ disvā vibhātāya rattiyā hatthikkhandhaṁ āruyha nagaravīthiyaṁ caranto taṁ
atk-s0508a12:1325_6: supinaṁ saritvā hatthikkhandhato oruyha saṁvegaṁ labhitvā satthu santike pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a12:1325_7: arahattaṁ patvā udānaṁ udānento imā gāthā abhāsī’’ti vadanti. Dittoti tasmiṁ rājakāle
atk-s0508a12:1328_0: Ayamitikappaṭoti āyasmato kappaṭakurattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti. Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a12:1328_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a12:1328_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ bhagavantaṁ vinatāya nāma nadiyā tīre aññatarasmiṁ
atk-s0508a12:1328_3: rukkhamūle nisinnaṁ disvā pasannamānaso ketakapupphehi pūjaṁ akāsi. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a12:1328_4: devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṁ duggatakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0508a12:1328_5: yāva vayappatti, tāva aññaṁ upāyaṁ ajānanto kappaṭakhaṇḍanivāsano sarāvahattho tattha
atk-s0508a12:1328_6: tattha kuraṁ pariyesanto vicari, tena kappaṭakurotveva paññāyittha. So vayappatto
atk-s0508a12:1328_7: tiṇaṁ vikkiṇitvā jīvikaṁ kappento ekadivasaṁ tiṇalāvanatthaṁ araññaṁ gato tattha
atk-s0508a12:1328_8: aññataraṁ khīṇāsavattheraṁ disvā taṁ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā nisīdi. Tassa thero dhammaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1328_9: kathesi. So dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho ‘‘kiṁ me imāya kicchajīvikāyā’’ti pabbajitvā
atk-s0508a12:1328_10: attano nivatthakappaṭacoḷaṁ ekasmiṁ ṭhāne nikkhipi. Yadā cassa anabhirati uppajjati,
atk-s0508a12:1328_11: tadā taṁ kappaṭaṁ olokentassa anabhirati vigacchati, saṁvegaṁ paṭilabhi. Evaṁ karonto
atk-s0508a12:1328_12: sattakkhattuṁ uppabbaji. Tassa taṁ kāraṇaṁ bhikkhū bhagavato ārocesuṁ. Athekadivasaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1328_13: kappaṭakuro bhikkhu dhammasabhāyaṁ parisapariyante nisinno niddāyati, taṁ bhagavā codento –
atk-s0508a12:1333: ‘‘Mā kho tvaṁ kappaṭa pacālesi, mā tvaṁ upakaṇṇamhi tāḷessaṁ;
atk-s0508a12:1334: Na hi tvaṁ kappaṭa mattamaññāsi, saṅghamajjhamhi pacalāyamāno’’ti. –
atk-s0508a12:1336_0: Tattha ayamiti kappaṭo kappaṭakuroti kappaṭakuro bhikkhu ‘‘ayaṁ mama kappaṭo, imaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1336_1: paridahitvā yathā tathā jīvāmī’’ti evaṁ uppannamicchāvitakko acchāya atibharitāya
atk-s0508a12:1336_2: amataghaṭikāyaṁ mama amataghaṭe tahaṁ tahaṁ vassante ‘‘amatamadhigataṁ ahamanusāsāmi,
atk-s0508a12:1336_3: ahaṁ dhammaṁ desemi’’ (mahāva. 12; ma. ni. 1.286; 2.342). ‘‘Andhībhūtasmiṁ lokasmiṁ,
atk-s0508a12:1336_4: āhañchaṁ amatadundubhi’’ntiādinā (mahāva. 11; ma. ni. 1.285; 2.341) ghosetvā mayā
atk-s0508a12:1336_5: dhammāmate pavassiyamāne katapadaṁ jhānāni ocetuṁ lokiyalokuttarajjhānāni upacetuṁ
atk-s0508a12:1336_6: bhāvetuṁ katapadaṁ kaṭamaggavihitabhāvanāmaggaṁ idaṁ mama sāsanaṁ, tathāpi dhammakaṭamatto
atk-s0508a12:1336_7: mama sāsanadhammato ukkaṇṭhacitto apagatamānaso kappaṭakuroti taṁ codetvā punapissa
atk-s0508a12:1336_8: sahoḍḍhaṁ coraṁ gaṇhanto viya pamādavihāraṁ dassento ‘‘mā kho tvaṁ, kappaṭa, pacālesī’’ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0508a12:1337_0: Tattha mā kho tvaṁ, kappaṭa, pacālesīti tvaṁ, kappaṭakura, ‘‘mama dhammaṁ suṇissāmī’’ti
atk-s0508a12:1337_1: nisīditvā mā kho pacālesi mā pacalāhi mā niddaṁ upagacchi. Mā tvaṁ upakaṇṇamhi tāḷessanti
atk-s0508a12:1337_2: taṁ niddāyamānaṁ upakaṇṇamhi kaṇṇasamīpe desanāhatthena ahaṁ mā patāḷessaṁ. Yathā
atk-s0508a12:1337_3: ito paraṁ kilesappahānāya ahaṁ taṁ na ovadeyyaṁ, tathā paṭipajjāhīti attho. Na hi
atk-s0508a12:1337_4: tvaṁ, kappaṭa, mattamaññāsīti tvaṁ, kappaṭa, saṅghamajjhamhi pacalāyamāno mattaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1337_5: pamāṇaṁ na vā maññasi, ‘‘ayamatidullabho khaṇo paṭiladdho, so mā upajjhagā’’ti ettakampi
atk-s0508a12:1337_6: na jānāsi, passa yāva ca te aparaddhanti codesi.
atk-s0508a12:1338_0: Evaṁ bhagavatā dvīhi gāthāhi gāḷhaṁ taṁ niggayha codanāya katāya aṭṭhivedhaviddho
atk-s0508a12:1338_1: viya caṇḍagajo maggaṁ otaranto viya ca sañjātasaṁvego vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva
atk-s0508a12:1338_2: arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 2.52.17-22) –
atk-s0508a12:1346: Arahattaṁ pana patvā satthārā vuttagāthādvayameva attano arahattādhigamanassa aṅkusabhūtanti paccudāhāsi. Tenassa tadeva aññābyākaraṇaṁ ahosīti.
atk-s0508a12:1351_0: Ahobuddhā aho dhammāti āyasmato kumārakassapattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a12:1351_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa
atk-s0508a12:1351_2: bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṁ pāpuṇi. ‘‘Kulagehe’’ti pana aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1351_3: (a. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.217) vuttaṁ. So satthu santikaṁ gantvā dhammaṁ suṇanto satthāraṁ
atk-s0508a12:1351_4: ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ cittakathikānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṁ disvā sayampi taṁ ṭhānantaraṁ
atk-s0508a12:1351_5: ākaṅkhanto paṇidhānaṁ katvā tadanurūpāni puññāni karonto kassapassa bhagavato kāle
atk-s0508a12:1351_6: samaṇadhammaṁ katvā sugatīsuyeva saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde rājagahe seṭṭhidhītāya
atk-s0508a12:1351_7: kucchimhi paṭisandhiṁ gaṇhi. Sā kira kumārikākāleyeva pabbajitukāmā hutvā mātāpitaro
atk-s0508a12:1351_8: yācitvā pabbajjaṁ alabhamānā kulagharaṁ gatāpi gabbhasaṇṭhitampi ajānantī sāmikaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1351_9: ārādhetvā tena anuññātā bhikkhunīsu pabbajitā. Tassā gabbhinibhāvaṁ disvā bhikkhuniyo
atk-s0508a12:1351_10: devadattaṁ pucchiṁsu. So ‘‘assamaṇī’’ti āha. Puna dasabalaṁ pucchiṁsu. Satthā upālittheraṁ
atk-s0508a12:1351_11: paṭicchāpesi. Thero sāvatthinagaravāsīni kulāni visākhañca upāsikaṁ pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0508a12:1351_12: sarājikāya parisāya vinicchinanto ‘‘pure laddho gabbho, pabbajjā arogā’’ti āha. Satthā
atk-s0508a12:1352_0: Sā bhikkhunī suvaṇṇabimbasadisaṁ puttaṁ vijāyi. Taṁ rājā pasenadikosalo posesi. ‘‘Kassapo’’ti
atk-s0508a12:1352_1: cassa nāmaṁ akaṁsu. Aparabhāge alaṅkaritvā satthu santikaṁ netvā pabbājesi. Kumārakāle
atk-s0508a12:1352_2: pabbajitattā bhagavatā ‘‘kassapaṁ pakkosatha, idaṁ phalaṁ vā khādanīyaṁ vā kassapassa
atk-s0508a12:1352_4: rañño posāvanikaputtattā ca vuḍḍhakālepi kumārakassapotveva paññāyittha.
atk-s0508a12:1353_0: So pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya vipassanāya ceva kammaṁ karoti, buddhavacanañca uggaṇhāti.
atk-s0508a12:1353_1: Atha tena saddhiṁ pabbatamatthake samaṇadhammaṁ katvā anāgāmī hutvā suddhāvāse nibbatto
atk-s0508a12:1353_2: mahābrahmā ‘‘vipassanāya mukhaṁ dassetvā maggaphalappattiyā upāyaṁ karissāmī’’ti
atk-s0508a12:1353_3: pañcadasa pañhe abhisaṅkharitvā andhavane vasantassa therassa ‘‘ime pañhe satthāraṁ
atk-s0508a12:1353_4: puccheyyāsī’’ti ācikkhitvā gato. So te pañhe bhagavantaṁ pucchi. Bhagavāpissa byākāsi.
atk-s0508a12:1353_5: Thero satthārā kathitaniyāmeneva te uggaṇhitvā vipassanaṁ gabbhaṁ gaṇhāpetvā arahattaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1365: Nipacca pādamūlamhi, taṁ ṭhāna patthayiṁ ahaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1373: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
atk-s0508a12:1383: Sākhena cattā me mātā, nigrodhaṁ saraṇaṁ gatā.
atk-s0508a12:1387: Nigrodhasmiṁ mataṁ seyyo, yañce sākhamhi jīvitaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1388: ‘‘Tenānusiṭṭhā migayūthapena, ahañca mātā ca tathetare ca;

atk-s0508a12:1405: Arahattaṁ pana patvā cittakathikabhāvena satthārā etadagge ṭhapito attano paṭipattiṁ paccavekkhitvā ratanattayaguṇavibhāvanamukhena aññaṁ byākaronto –
atk-s0508a12:1407: ‘‘Aho buddhā aho dhammā, aho no satthu sampadā;
atk-s0508a12:1412: Jātimaraṇasaṁsāro, natthi dāni punabbhavo’’ti. – gāthādvayaṁ abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:1413_0: Tattha ahoti acchariyatthe nipāto. Buddhāti sabbaññubuddhā, gāravavasena bahuvacanaṁ,
atk-s0508a12:1413_1: aho acchariyā sambuddhāti attho. Dhammāti pariyattidhammena saddhiṁ nava lokuttaradhammā.
atk-s0508a12:1413_2: Aho no satthu sampadāti amhākaṁ satthu dasabalassa aho sampattiyo. Yatthāti yasmiṁ
atk-s0508a12:1413_3: satthari brahmacariyavāsena. Etādisaṁ dhammaṁ, sāvako sacchikāhitīti etādisaṁ evarūpaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1413_5: dhammaṁ sāvakopi nāma sacchikarissati, tasmā evaṁvidhaguṇavisesādhigamahetubhūtā
atk-s0508a12:1413_6: aho acchariyā buddhā bhagavanto, acchariyā dhammaguṇā, acchariyā amhākaṁ satthu sampattiyoti
atk-s0508a12:1413_7: ratanattayassa guṇādhimuttiṁ pavedesīti. Dhammasampattikittaneneva hi saṅghasuppaṭipatti kittitā hotīti.
atk-s0508a12:1414_0: Evaṁ sādhāraṇavasena dassitaṁ dhammassa sacchikiriyaṁ idāni attupanāyikaṁ katvā dassento
atk-s0508a12:1414_1: ‘‘asaṅkheyyesū’’ti gāthamāha. Tattha asaṅkheyyesūti gaṇanapathaṁ vītivattesu mahākappesu.
atk-s0508a12:1414_2: Sakkāyāti pañcupādānakkhandhā. Te hi paramatthato vijjamānadhammasamūhatāya ‘‘sakkāyā’’ti
atk-s0508a12:1414_3: vuccanti. Ahūti nivattanūpāyassa anadhigatattā anapagatā ahesuṁ. Tesamayaṁ pacchimako
atk-s0508a12:1414_4: carimoyaṁ samussayoti yasmā ayaṁ sabbapacchimako, tato eva carimo, tasmā jātimaraṇasahito
atk-s0508a12:1414_5: khandhādipaṭipāṭisaññito saṁsāro idāni āyatiṁ punabbhavābhāvato punabbhavo natthi,
atk-s0508a12:1417_0: Yo have daharo bhikkhūti āyasmato dhammapālattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a12:1417_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto atthadassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe
atk-s0508a12:1417_2: nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto kenacideva karaṇīyena vanantaṁ upagato satthāraṁ disvā
atk-s0508a12:1417_3: pasannamānaso pilakkhaphalamadāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto
atk-s0508a12:1417_4: imasmiṁ buddhuppāde satthari parinibbute avantiraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā dhammapāloti
atk-s0508a12:1417_5: laddhanāmo vayappatto takkasilaṁ gantvā sippaṁ uggahetvā paṭinivattento antarāmagge
atk-s0508a12:1417_6: ekasmiṁ vihāre aññataraṁ theraṁ disvā tassa santike dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0508a12:1417_7: pabbajitvā vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 1.39.21-25) –
atk-s0508a12:1423_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā samāpattisukhena vītināmento ekadivasaṁ tasmiṁ vihāre dve
atk-s0508a12:1423_1: sāmaṇere rukkhagge pupphāni ocinante ārūḷhasākhāya bhaggāya patante disvā thero iddhānubhāvena
atk-s0508a12:1423_2: hatthena gahetvā arogeyeva bhūmiyaṁ ṭhapetvā tesaṁ sāmaṇerānaṁ dhammaṁ desento –
atk-s0508a12:1426: Jāgaro sa hi suttesu, amoghaṁ tassa jīvitaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1429: Anuyuñjetha medhāvī, saraṁ buddhāna sāsana’’nti. – imā dve gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:1430_0: Tattha yoti aniyamavacanaṁ. Haveti daḷhatthe nipāto. Daharoti taruṇo. Bhikkhatīti
atk-s0508a12:1430_1: bhikkhu. Yuñjatīti ghaṭati vāyamati. Jāgaroti jāgaraṇadhammasamannāgato. Suttesūti
atk-s0508a12:1430_2: supantesu. Idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti yo bhikkhu daharova samāno taruṇo ‘‘tathāhaṁ pacchā vuḍḍhakāle
atk-s0508a12:1430_3: jānissāmī’’ti acintetvā buddhānaṁ sāsane appamādapaṭipattiyaṁ yuñjati samathavipassanābhāvanāya
atk-s0508a12:1430_4: yogaṁ karoti, so suttesu avijjāniddāya suttesu pamattesu saddhādijāgaradhammasamannāgamena
atk-s0508a12:1430_5: jāgaro, tato eva attahitaparahitapāripūriyā amoghaṁ avañjhaṁ tassa jīvitaṁ, yasmā
atk-s0508a12:1430_6: ca etadevaṁ, tasmā saddhañca ‘‘atthi kammaṁ atthi kammavipāko’’tiādinayappavattaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1430_8: ‘‘sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākhāto dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṅgho’’ti evaṁ pavattaratanattayappasādañca
atk-s0508a12:1430_10: dhammojapaññāya samannāgato bhikkhu buddhānaṁ sāsanaṁ ovādaṁ anusiṭṭhiṁ anussaranto
atk-s0508a12:1430_11: ādittampi attano sīsaṁ ajjhupekkhitvā anuyuñjetha, tattha anuyogaṁ ātappaṁ kareyyāti attho.
atk-s0508a12:1433_0: Kassindriyāni samathaṅgatānīti āyasmato brahmālittherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a12:1433_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ kusalaṁ upacinanto
atk-s0508a12:1433_2: vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ
atk-s0508a12:1433_3: piṇḍāya carantaṁ disvā pasannamānaso vanditvā pādaphalaṁ adāsi. Satthā anumodanaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1433_4: vatvā pakkāmi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a12:1433_5: kosalaraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā brahmālīti laddhanāmo viññutaṁ patto hetusampattiyā
atk-s0508a12:1433_6: codiyamāno saṁsāre sañjātasaṁvego tādisena kalyāṇamittasannissayena buddhasāsane
atk-s0508a12:1433_7: pabbajitvā patirūpakammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā araññe viharanto ñāṇassa paripākagatattā
atk-s0508a12:1433_8: nacirasseva vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 2.51.63-67) –
atk-s0508a12:1439: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā maggasukhena phalasukhena vītināmento ekadivasaṁ padhānapariggāhakena therena tasmiṁ araññāyatane bhikkhū uddissa vuttaṁ padhānānuyogaṁ pariggaṇhanto –
atk-s0508a12:1442: Pahīnamānassa anāsavassa, devāpi kassa pihayanti tādino.
atk-s0508a12:1445: Pahīnamānassa anāsavassa, devāpi mayhaṁ pihayanti tādino’’ti. –
atk-s0508a12:1447_0: Tassattho – imasmiṁ araññāyatane vasantesu bhikkhūsu kassa bhikkhuno therassa vā
atk-s0508a12:1447_1: navassa vā majjhimassa vā chekena sārathinā sudantā assā viya manacchaṭṭhāni indriyāni
atk-s0508a12:1447_2: samathaṁ dantabhāvaṁ nibbisevanabhāvaṁ gatāni. Kassa navavidhampi mānaṁ pahāya ṭhitattā
atk-s0508a12:1447_3: pahīnamānassa catunnampi āsavānaṁ abhāvena anāsavassa iṭṭhādīsu tādilakkhaṇappattiyā
atk-s0508a12:1447_4: tādino devāpi pihayanti manussāpi sammāpaṭipattidassanādinā ca ādarena patthentīti.
atk-s0508a12:1448_0: Tattha ca gāthāyaṁ purimaḍḍhena anāgāmimaggādhigamo puṭṭho, anāgāminopi hi indriyāni
atk-s0508a12:1448_1: pahīnakāmarāgabyāpādatāya samathaṁ nibbisevanataṁ gatāni honti. Itarena arahattamaggapaṭilābho,
atk-s0508a12:1448_2: arahā hi ‘‘pahīnamāno anāsavo tādī’’ti ca vuccati.
atk-s0508a12:1449_0: Athāyasmā brahmāli padhānapariggāhakena vuttaṁ ‘‘kassindriyānī’’ti gāthaṁ paccanubhāsi.
atk-s0508a12:1449_2: aññaṁ byākāsi, tattha mayhindriyānīti mama cakkhādīni indriyāni. Sesaṁ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0508a12:1452_0: Chavipāpakacittabhaddakāti āyasmato mogharājattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi

atk-s0508a12:1452_2: patto ekadivasaṁ satthu santike dhammaṁ suṇanto satthāraṁ ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ lūkhacīvaradharānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1452_3: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṁ disvā taṁ ṭhānantaraṁ ākaṅkhanto paṇidhānaṁ katvā tattha tattha
atk-s0508a12:1452_4: bhave puññāni karonto atthadassissa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā brāhmaṇānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1452_5: vijjāsippesu nipphattiṁ gato brāhmaṇamāṇave vijjāsippāni sikkhāpento ekadivasaṁ atthadassiṁ

atk-s0508a12:1452_7: vanditvā sirasi añjaliṁ katvā ‘‘yāvatā rūpino sattā’’tiādinā chahi gāthāhi abhitthavitvā
atk-s0508a12:1452_8: bhājanaṁ pūretvā madhuṁ upanāmesi. Satthā madhuṁ paṭiggahetvā anumodanaṁ akāsi.
atk-s0508a12:1453_0: So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto kassapassa bhagavato kāle kaṭṭhavāhanassa
atk-s0508a12:1453_1: nāma rañño amacco hutvā tena satthu ānayanatthaṁ purisasahassena pesito satthu santikaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1453_2: gantvā dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vīsativassasahassāni samaṇadhammaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1453_3: katvā tato cuto ekaṁ buddhantaraṁ sugatīsuyeva parivattento imasmiṁ buddhuppāde brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0508a12:1453_4: nibbattitvā mogharājāti laddhanāmo bāvarībrāhmaṇassa santike uggahitasippo saṁvegajāto
atk-s0508a12:1453_5: tāpasapabbajjaṁ pabbajitvā tāpasasahassaparivāro ajitādīhi saddhiṁ satthu santikaṁ

atk-s0508a12:1493_0: Arahattaṁ pana patvā satthalūkhaṁ suttalūkhaṁ rajanalūkhanti visesena tividhenapi
atk-s0508a12:1493_1: lūkhena samannāgataṁ paṁsukūlaṁ dhāresi. Tena naṁ satthā lūkhacīvaradharānaṁ aggaṭṭhāne
atk-s0508a12:1493_2: ṭhapesi. Aparabhāge purimakammappaccayā parihārassa akaraṇato therassa sarīre daddupīḷakādīni
atk-s0508a12:1493_3: uppajjitvā vaḍḍhiṁsu. So ‘‘senāsanaṁ dussatī’’ti hemantepi magadhakkhettesu palālasanthārāni
atk-s0508a12:1493_4: attharitvā seti. Taṁ ekadivasaṁ upaṭṭhānaṁ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1494_0: 207. Tattha chavipāpakāti daddukacchupīḷakāhi bhinnacchavibhāvato hīnacchavika duṭṭhacchavika
atk-s0508a12:1494_1: . Cittabhaddakāti anavasesakilesappahānena brahmavihārasevanāya ca bhaddacitta sundaracitta.
atk-s0508a12:1494_2: Mogharājāti tassa ālapanaṁ. Satataṁ samāhitoti aggaphalasamādhinā niccakālaṁ abhiṇhaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1494_4: cetaṁ upayogavacanaṁ. ‘‘Hemantikā sītakālarattiyo’’tipi pāḷi. Tattha hemantikāti
atk-s0508a12:1494_5: hemantogadhā hemantapariyāpannāti attho. Bhikkhu tvaṁ sīti bhikkhu ko tvaṁ asi, evaṁbhūto

atk-s0508a12:1494_7: yathāvutte sītakāle kathaṁ attabhāvaṁ pavattesīti satthā pucchi. Evaṁ pana puṭṭho
atk-s0508a12:1498_0: Tattha sampannasassāti nipphannasassā. Magadhāti magadharaṭṭhaṁ vadati. Magadhā nāma
atk-s0508a12:1498_1: jānapadino rājakumārā, tesaṁ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhīvasena ‘‘magadhā’’tveva bahuvacanena
atk-s0508a12:1498_2: vuccati. Kevalāti anavasesā. Iti me sutanti evaṁ mayā sutaṁ. Tattha yo adiṭṭho padeso,
