atk-s0508a12:1498_5: bhikkhū senāsanasappāyaṁ laddhā sundarehi attharaṇapāvuraṇehi sukhena sayanti, evaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1498_6: ahampi palālasanthārameva heṭṭhā santharitvā upari tiriyañca palālacchadaneneva chāditasarīratāya
atk-s0508a12:1498_7: palālacchannako seyyaṁ sayiṁ, seyyaṁ kappesinti attano yathālābhasantosaṁ vibhāveti.
atk-s0508a12:1501_0: Naukkhipe no ca parikkhipe pareti āyasmato visākhassa pañcālaputtassa gāthā. Kā uppatti?
atk-s0508a12:1501_1: Ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ puññaṁ upacinanto
atk-s0508a12:1501_2: ito cuddase kappe paccantagāme daliddakule nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1501_3: phalapariyesanaṁ carantehi tasmiṁ gāme manussehi saddhiṁ araññaṁ gato tattha ekaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1501_4: paccekabuddhaṁ disvā pasannamānaso valliphalaṁ adāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0508a12:1501_5: saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe maṇḍalikarājakule nibbattitvā visākhoti
atk-s0508a12:1501_6: laddhanāmo pañcālarājadhītuyā puttabhāvato pacchā pañcālaputtoti paññāyittha. So
atk-s0508a12:1501_7: pitari mate rajjaṁ kārento satthari attano gāmasamīpagate satthu santikaṁ gantvā
atk-s0508a12:1501_8: dhammaṁ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā satthārā saddhiṁ sāvatthiṁ gato vipassanaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1501_9: paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 1.39.31-36) –
atk-s0508a12:1509_0: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā thero ñātīnaṁ anukampāya jātibhūmiṁ agamāsi. Tattha manussā
atk-s0508a12:1509_1: theraṁ upasaṅkamitvā kālena kālaṁ dhammaṁ suṇantā ekadivasaṁ ‘‘katihi nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0508a12:1509_2: aṅgehi samannāgato dhammakathiko hotī’’ti dhammakathikalakkhaṇaṁ pucchiṁsu. Thero
atk-s0508a12:1511: ‘‘Na ukkhipe no ca parikkhipe pare, na okkhipe pāragataṁ na eraye;
atk-s0508a12:1512: Na cattavaṇṇaṁ parisāsu byāhare, anuddhato sammitabhāṇi subbato.
atk-s0508a12:1515: Saṁsevitabuddhasīlinā, nibbānaṁ na hi tena dullabha’’nti. –
atk-s0508a12:1517_0: Tattha na ukkhipeti attānaṁ na ukkhipeyya, jātiādīhi bāhusaccādīhi ca attukkaṁsanaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1517_1: na kareyya. No ca parikkhipe pareti pare parapuggale teheva jātiādīhi no parikkhipe
atk-s0508a12:1517_2: paricchinditvā na khipeyya guṇaparidhaṁsanavasena vā na khipeyya. Na okkhipe pare
atk-s0508a12:1517_3: iccevaṁ sambandho. Pare ojjhāpanavasena na okkhipe heṭṭhato katvā pare na olokāpeyya,
atk-s0508a12:1517_4: na ojjhāpeyyāti attho. ‘‘Na ukkhipe’’ti keci paṭhanti, so evattho. Pāragatanti saṁsārapāraṁ
atk-s0508a12:1517_5: viya vijjāya pāraṁ gataṁ khīṇāsavaṁ tevijjaṁ chaḷabhiññaṁ vā na eraye na ghaṭṭaye
atk-s0508a12:1517_6: na āsādeyya. Na cattavaṇṇaṁ parisāsu byāhareti attano vaṇṇaṁ guṇaṁ lābhasakkārasilokaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1517_7: nikāmayamāno khattiyaparisādīsu na bhāseyya. Anuddhatoti uddhaccarahito. Uddhatassa
atk-s0508a12:1517_8: hi vacanaṁ nādiyanti. Sammitabhāṇīti sammadeva mitabhāṇī, kālena sāpadesaṁ pariyantavatiṁ
atk-s0508a12:1517_9: atthasañhitameva vācaṁ bhāsanasīloti attho. Ito aññathā vadantassa vacanaṁ agahaṇīyaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1517_10: hoti. Subbatoti sundaravato sīlasampanno. ‘‘Siyā’’ti kiriyāpadaṁ ānetvā yojetabbaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1518_0: Evaṁ thero saṅkhepeneva dhammakathikalakkhaṇaṁ vatvā tesaṁ guṇānaṁ attani labbhamānataṁ
atk-s0508a12:1518_1: adhimuccitvā bhiyyosomattāya abhippasannaṁ mahājanaṁ ñatvā ‘‘evaṁvidhassa dhammakathikassa
atk-s0508a12:1518_2: vimuttāyatanasannissitassa na nibbānaṁ dullabhaṁ, atha kho sulabhamevā’’ti dassento
atk-s0508a12:1521_0: Nadanti morā susikhā supekhuṇāti āyasmato cūḷakattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi
atk-s0508a12:1521_1: purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ kusalaṁ upacinanto
atk-s0508a12:1521_2: ito ekatiṁse kappe sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1521_3: satthāraṁ disvā pasannamānaso chattapaṇṇiphalaṁ adāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu
atk-s0508a12:1521_4: saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā cūḷakoti laddhanāmo
atk-s0508a12:1521_5: vayappatto dhanapāladamane satthari laddhappasādo pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṁ karonto
atk-s0508a12:1521_6: indasālaguhāyaṁ vasati, so ekadivasaṁ guhādvāre nisinno magadhakkhettaṁ olokesi.
atk-s0508a12:1521_7: Tasmiṁ khaṇe pāvusakālamegho gambhīramadhuranigghoso satapaṭalasahassapaṭalo añjana
atk-s0508a12:1521_8: sikharasannikāso nabhaṁ pūretvā pavassati, mayūrasaṅghā ca meghagajjitaṁ sutvā haṭṭhatuṭṭhā
atk-s0508a12:1521_9: kekāsaddaṁ muñcitvā tattha tattha padese naccantā vicaranti. Therassapi āvāsagabbhe
atk-s0508a12:1521_10: meghavātaphassehi apagatadhammattā passaddhakarajakāye kallataṁ patte utusappāyalābhena
atk-s0508a12:1521_11: cittaṁ ekaggaṁ ahosi, kammaṭṭhānavīthiṁ otari, so taṁ ñatvā kālasampadādikittanamukhena
atk-s0508a12:1523: ‘‘Nadanti morā susikhā supekhuṇā, sunīlagīvā sumukhā sugajjino;
atk-s0508a12:1524: Susaddalā cāpi mahāmahī ayaṁ, subyāpitambu suvalāhakaṁ nabhaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1527: Susukkasukkaṁ nipuṇaṁ sududdasaṁ, phusāhi taṁ uttamamaccutaṁ pada’’nti. –
atk-s0508a12:1529_0: Tattha nadanti morā susikhā supekhuṇā, sunīlagīvā sumukhā sugajjinoti ete matthake
atk-s0508a12:1529_1: uṭṭhitāhi sundarāhi sikhāhi samannāgatattā susikhā, nānāvaṇṇehi anekehi sobhanehi
atk-s0508a12:1529_2: bhaddakapiñchehi samannāgatattā supekhuṇā, rājīvavaṇṇasaṅkāsāya sundarāya nīlavaṇṇāya
atk-s0508a12:1529_3: gīvāya samannāgatattā sunīlagīvā, sundaramukhatāya sumukhā, manuññavāditāya sugajjino,
atk-s0508a12:1529_4: morā sikhaṇḍino chajjasaṁvādī kekāsaddaṁ muñcantā nadanti ravanti. Susaddalā cāpi
atk-s0508a12:1529_5: mahāmahī ayanti ayañca mahāpathavī susaddalā sundaraharitatiṇā. Subyāpitambūti abhinavavuṭṭhiyā
atk-s0508a12:1529_6: tahaṁ tahaṁ vissandamānasalilatāya suṭṭhu byāpitajalā vitatajalā. ‘‘Susukkatambū’’tipi
atk-s0508a12:1529_7: pāṭho, suvisuddhajalāti attho. Suvalāhakaṁ nabhanti idañca nabhaṁ ākāsaṁ nīluppaladalasannibhehi
atk-s0508a12:1529_8: samantato pūretvā ṭhitehi sundarehi valāhakehi meghehi suvalāhakaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1530_0: Sukallarūposumanassa jhāyatanti idāni utusappāyalābhena suṭṭhu kallarūpo kammaniyasabhāvo
atk-s0508a12:1530_1: tvaṁ, nīvaraṇehi anajjhārūḷhacittatāya sundaramanassa yogāvacarassa yaṁ ārammaṇūpanijjhānavasena
atk-s0508a12:1530_2: lakkhaṇūpanijjhānavasena ca jhāyataṁ. Sunikkamo…pe… accutaṁ padanti evaṁ jhāyanto
atk-s0508a12:1530_3: ca sādhu subuddhassa sammāsambuddhassa sāsane sundaranikkamo hutvā suparisuddhasīlatāya
atk-s0508a12:1530_4: susukkaṁ, visuddhasabhāvatāya sabbassapi saṁkilesassa gocarabhāvānupagamanato sukkaṁ,
atk-s0508a12:1530_5: nipuṇañāṇagocaratāya nipuṇaṁ, paramagambhīratāya sududdasaṁ, paṇītabhāvena seṭṭhabhāvena
atk-s0508a12:1530_6: ca uttamaṁ, niccasabhāvatāya accutaṁ padaṁ taṁ nibbānaṁ phusāhi attapaccakkhakaraṇena
atk-s0508a12:1531: Evaṁ thero attānaṁ ovadantova utusappāyalābhena samāhitacitto vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 1.39.37-42) –
atk-s0508a12:1539: Arahattaṁ pana patvā thero attano paṭipattiṁ paccavekkhitvā pītisomanassajāto ‘‘nadanti morā’’tiādinā tāyeva gāthā paccudāhāsi. Tenassa idameva aññābyākaraṇaṁ ahosīti.
atk-s0508a12:1542_0: Nandamānāgataṁ cittāti āyasmato anūpamattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a12:1542_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṁ puññaṁ upacinanto ito ekatiṁse
atk-s0508a12:1542_2: kappe kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto ekadivasaṁ padumaṁ nāma paccekabuddhaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1542_3: piṇḍāya carantaṁ rathiyaṁ disvā pasannamānaso aṅkolapupphehi pūjesi. So tena puññakammena
atk-s0508a12:1542_4: devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe ibbhakule nibbattitvā rūpasampattiyā
atk-s0508a12:1542_5: anūpamoti laddhanāmo vayappatto upanissayasampannatāya kāme pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanāya
atk-s0508a12:1542_6: kammaṁ karonto araññe viharati. Tassa cittaṁ bahiddhā rūpādiārammaṇesu vidhāvati.
atk-s0508a12:1542_7: Kammaṭṭhānaṁ parivaṭṭati. Thero vidhāvantaṁ cittaṁ niggaṇhanto –
atk-s0508a12:1545: Tena teneva vajasi, yena sūlaṁ kaliṅgaraṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1548: Satthā te dullabho laddho, mānatthe maṁ niyojayī’’ti. –
atk-s0508a12:1550_0: Tattha nandamānāgataṁ cittāti nandamāna abhinandamāna citta abhinandamānaṁ āgataṁ
atk-s0508a12:1550_1: uppannaṁ . Sūlamāropamānakanti dukkhuppattiṭṭhānatāya sūlasadisattā sūlaṁ taṁ taṁ
atk-s0508a12:1550_2: bhavaṁ kammakilesehi ettakaṁ kālaṁ āropiyamānaṁ. Tena teneva vajasi, yena sūlaṁ kaliṅgaranti
atk-s0508a12:1550_3: yattha yattha sūlasaṅkhātā bhavā kaliṅgarasaṅkhātā adhikuṭṭanakā kāmaguṇā ca tena
atk-s0508a12:1550_4: teneva, pāpacitta, vajasi, taṁ tadeva ṭhānaṁ upagacchasi, attano anatthaṁ na sallakkhesi.
atk-s0508a12:1551_0: Tāhaṁ cittakaliṁ brūmīti taṁ tasmā pamattabhāvato cittakaliṁ cittakālakaṇṇiṁ ahaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1551_1: kathayāmi. Punapi taṁ brūmi kathemi cittadubbhakaṁ cittasaṅkhātassa attano bahūpakārassa
atk-s0508a12:1551_3: attho. Kinti brūhīti ce? Āha ‘‘satthā te dullabho laddho, mānatthe maṁ niyojayī’’ti.
atk-s0508a12:1551_4: Kappānaṁ asaṅkhyeyyampi nāma buddhasuñño loko hoti, satthari uppannepi manussattasaddhāpaṭilābhādayo
atk-s0508a12:1551_5: dullabhā eva, laddhesu ca tesu satthāpi dullabhoyeva hoti. Evaṁ dullabho satthā idāni
atk-s0508a12:1551_6: tayā laddho, tasmiṁ laddhe sampatipi anatthe ahite āyatiñca anatthāvahe dukkhāvahe
atk-s0508a12:1551_7: akusale maṁ mā niyojesīti. Evaṁ thero attano cittaṁ ovadanto eva vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0508a12:1551_8: arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṁ apadāne (apa. thera 1.37.16-19) –
atk-s0508a12:1553: Disvāna taṁ ahaṁ buddhaṁ, sayambhuṁ aparājitaṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1561_0: Saṁsaraṁdīghamaddhānanti āyasmato vajjitattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a12:1561_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito pañcasaṭṭhime kappe ekasmiṁ
atk-s0508a12:1561_2: paccantagāme nibbattitvā viññutaṁ patto vanacarako hutvā vicaranto ekadivasaṁ upasantaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1561_3: nāma paccekabuddhaṁ pabbataguhāyaṁ viharantaṁ addasa. So tassa upasamaṁ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0508a12:1561_4: campakapupphena pūjaṁ akāsi. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ
atk-s0508a12:1561_5: buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe ibbhakule nibbatto jātadivasato paṭṭhāya mātugāmahatthaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1561_6: gato rodati. Brahmalokato kira cavitvā idhāgato yasmā mātugāmasamphassaṁ na sahati,
atk-s0508a12:1561_7: tasmā mātugāmasamphassavajjanato vajjitotveva nāmaṁ jātaṁ. So vayappatto satthu yamakapāṭihāriyaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1561_8: disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā tadaheva chaḷabhiñño ahosi.
atk-s0508a12:1569: Chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā attano pubbenivāsaṁ anussaritvā dhammasaṁvegena –
atk-s0508a12:1575: Sabbā gatī samucchinnā, natthi dāni punabbhavo’’ti. – dve gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0508a12:1576_0: Tattha saṁsaranti saṁsaranto, tasmiṁ tasmiṁ bhave ādānanikkhepavasena aparāparaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1576_1: sandhāvanto. Dīghamaddhānanti cirakālaṁ anādimati saṁsāre aparimāṇakālaṁ. Gatīsūti
atk-s0508a12:1576_2: sukatadukkaṭānaṁ kammānaṁ vasena sugatiduggatīsu. Parivattisanti ghaṭīyantaṁ viya
atk-s0508a12:1576_3: paribbhamanto cavanupapajjanavasena aparāparaṁ parivattiṁ. Tassa pana parivattanassa
atk-s0508a12:1576_4: kāraṇamāha ‘‘apassaṁ ariyasaccāni, andhabhūto puthujjano’’ti. Dukkhādīni cattāri
atk-s0508a12:1576_5: ariyasaccāni ñāṇacakkhunā apassanto appaṭivijjhanto, tato eva avijjandhatāya andhabhūto
atk-s0508a12:1576_6: puthūnaṁ jananādīhi kāraṇehi puthujjano honto gatīsu parivattisanti yojanā, tenevāha bhagavā –
atk-s0508a12:1577_0: ‘‘Catunnaṁ , bhikkhave, ariyasaccānaṁ ananubodhā appaṭivedhā evamidaṁ dīghamaddhānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1577_1: sandhāvitaṁ saṁsaritaṁ mamañceva tumhākañcā’’ti (mahāva. 287; dī. ni. 2.155; saṁ.
atk-s0508a12:1578_0: Tassa mayhaṁ vuttanayena pubbe puthujjanasseva sato idāni satthārā dinnanayena appamattassa
atk-s0508a12:1578_1: appamādapaṭipattiyā samathavipassanābhāvanaṁ matthakaṁ pāpetvā ṭhitassa. Saṁsārā
atk-s0508a12:1578_2: vinaḷīkatāti saṁsaranti sattā etehīti ‘‘saṁsārā’’ti laddhanāmā kammakilesā aggamaggena
atk-s0508a12:1578_3: samucchinnattā vigatanaḷā nimmūlā katā. Sabbā gatī samucchinnāti evaṁ kammakilesavaṭṭānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1578_4: vinaḷīkatattā nirayādikā sabbāpi gatiyo sammadeva ucchinnā viddhaṁsitā, tato eva
atk-s0508a12:1578_5: natthi dāni āyatiṁ punabbhavoti idameva ca therassa aññābyākaraṇaṁ ahosīti.
atk-s0508a12:1581_0: Assatthe haritobhāseti āyasmato sandhitattherassa gāthā. Kā uppatti? Ayampi purimabuddhesu
atk-s0508a12:1581_1: katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito ekatiṁse kappe sikhissa bhagavato
atk-s0508a12:1581_2: kāle eko gopālako ahosi. So satthari parinibbute aññataraṁ theraṁ upasaṅkamitvā tassa
atk-s0508a12:1581_3: santike buddhaguṇapaṭisaṁyuttaṁ dhammaṁ sutvā pasannamānaso ‘‘kuhiṁ bhagavā’’ti pucchitvā
atk-s0508a12:1581_4: parinibbutabhāvaṁ sutvā ‘‘evaṁ mahānubhāvā buddhāpi nāma aniccatāvasaṁ gacchanti,
atk-s0508a12:1581_5: aho saṅkhārā addhuvā’’ti aniccasaññaṁ paṭilabhi. Taṁ thero bodhipūjāya ussāhesi.
atk-s0508a12:1581_6: So kālena kālaṁ bodhirukkhasamīpaṁ gantvā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā buddhaguṇe anussaranto
atk-s0508a12:1581_7: bodhiṁ vandati. So tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṁsaranto imasmiṁ buddhuppāde
atk-s0508a12:1581_8: kosalaraṭṭhe ibbhakule nibbattitvā sandhitoti laddhanāmo vayappatto aniccatāpaṭisaṁyuttaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1581_9: dhammakathaṁ sutvā saṁvegajāto pabbajitvā vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā ñāṇassa paripākaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1581_10: gatattā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. So attano pubbenivāsaṁ anussaranto sikhissa
atk-s0508a12:1581_11: bhagavato kāle bodhivandanaṁ buddhānussatiṁ aniccasaññāpaṭilābhañca anussaritvā tadupanissayena
atk-s0508a12:1587: Tassā saññāya vāhasā, patto me āsavakkhayo’’ti. –
atk-s0508a12:1589_0: Tattha assattheti assatthaṭṭhānīye, yvāyaṁ etarahi amhākaṁ bhagavato bodhirukkho
atk-s0508a12:1589_1: assattho, etassa ṭhāne tadā sikhissa bhagavato bodhirukkho puṇḍarīko ṭhitoti so assatthaṭṭhānīyatāya
atk-s0508a12:1589_2: ‘‘assatthe’’ti vuttaṁ. Sattānaṁ assāsajananato vā. Apare pana ‘‘assattharukkhamūle
atk-s0508a12:1589_3: nisīditvā tadā buddhānussatiyā bhāvitattā thero ‘assatthe’ti avocā’’ti vadanti. Haritobhāseti
atk-s0508a12:1589_4: haritehi sāramaṇivaṇṇehi obhāsamāne. Saṁvirūḷhamhīti suṭṭhu virūḷhe suppatiṭṭhite,
atk-s0508a12:1589_5: sughananicitapattapalāsapallavehi virūḷhasañchanneti ca vadanti. Pādapeti rukkhe.
atk-s0508a12:1589_6: Ekaṁ buddhagataṁ saññaṁ, alabhitthaṁ patissatoti buddhārammaṇaṁ ārammaṇassa ekajātiyattā
atk-s0508a12:1589_7: ekaṁ ‘‘itipi so bhagavā’’tiādinayappavattaṁ buddhānussatisahagataṁ saññaṁ buddhaguṇānaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1590_0: Kadā pana sā saññā laddhā, kīvatāya siddhāti āha ‘‘ekatiṁse ito kappe’’tiādi. Ito
atk-s0508a12:1590_1: bhaddakappato uddhaṁ ārohanavasena ekatiṁse kappe. Yaṁ saññanti yaṁ buddhānussatisahagataṁ
atk-s0508a12:1590_2: saññaṁ, yaṁ vā buddhānaṁ aniccataṁ disvā tadanusārena sabbāsaṅkhāresu tadā aniccasaññaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1590_3: alabhiṁ. Tassā saññāya vāhasāti tassā yathāvuttāya saññāya kāraṇabhāvena taṁ upanissayaṁ
atk-s0508a12:1590_4: katvā. Patto me āsavakkhayoti idāni mayā āsavānaṁ khayo nirodho adhigatoti imāyeva
atk-s0508a12:1590_5: ca imassa therassa apadānagāthāpi. Yathāha (apa. thera 1.22.27-30) –
